T02TD2589E:156a-1: ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri shuddho dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha n'a ma /
T02TD2589E:156a-3: nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba //
T02TD2589E:156a-4: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus par gyur pa //
T02TD2589E:156a-5: bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don thams cad sgrub pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i don gyi dgongs ba sbas pa phyin ci ma log pa'i man ngag las brgyud pa brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:156a-6: de nas yang dag bshad bgyi ba //
T02TD2589E:156a-7: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
T02TD2589E:156a-8: gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
T02TD2589E:156a-9: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2589E:156a-10: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02TD2589E:156a-11: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD2589E:156a-12: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:156b-0: sgo @156b khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02TD2589E:156b-1: rdo rje rin chen spras bar ni //
T02TD2589E:156b-2: dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po //
T02TD2589E:156b-3: de yi rim pa'i nang bzhugs la //
T02TD2589E:156b-5: thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya //
T02TD2589E:156b-6: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis par //
T02TD2589E:156b-7: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //
T02TD2589E:156b-8: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la //
T02TD2589E:156b-9: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni /
T02TD2589E:156b-11: 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas //
T02TD2589E:156b-12: dag pa thams cad rab tu gnas //
T02TD2589E:156b-13: de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni //
T02TD2589E:156b-16: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //
T02TD2589E:156b-17: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
T02TD2589E:156b-19: skra mchog chen po mthon ka'i rtse //
T02TD2589E:156b-20: sangs rgyas rin chen cod pan ldan //
T02TD2589E:156b-21: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
T02TD2589E:156b-22: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
T02TD2589E:156b-23: sna tshogs na bza' yang dag bsnams //
T02TD2589E:156b-24: byis pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag spung //
T02TD2589E:156b-25: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T02TD2589E:156b-26: dpe byad brgyad cus yang dag brgyan //
T02TD2589E:156b-27: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ches //
T02TD2589E:156b-28: phyag gnyis dag ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2589E:156b-29: ral gri mda' dang rdo rje yis //
T02TD2589E:156b-30: g-yas pa'i phyag mchog rnam par mdzes /
T02TD2589E:156b-31: shes rab pha rol phyin dang gzhu //
T02TD2589E:156b-32: rdo rje dril mchog g-yon pa na //
T02TD2589E:156b-33: dri med dpe bral bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2589E:156b-34: shes rab ye shes dri ma med //
T02TD2589E:156b-35: mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02TD2589E:156b-36: dkyil 'khor mdun gyi gtso gyur la //
T02TD2589E:156b-37: rdzogs sangs rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas //
T02TD2589E:156b-38: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni nges par dgod /
T02TD2589E:156b-40: seng ge'i gdan gyi stengs bzhugs shing //
T02TD2589E:156b-41: thams cad rin chen bdun bskor bar //
T02TD2589E:156b-43: gtsug tor chen po yi ge bdag / shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag bri //
T02TD2589E:156b-44: gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dag / nub kyi 'dab mar dgod par bya //
T02TD2589E:156b-45: gzi brjod phung po lho phyogs su //
T02TD2589E:156b-46: gtsug tor rnam rgyal byang phyogs su //
T02TD2589E:156b-47: rnam par 'thor ba dbang ldan phyogs / me yi phyogs su gyen 'byung dgod //
T02TD2589E:156b-48: gyen 'byung chen po bden bral phyogs //
T02TD2589E:157a-1: ba rlung gi phyogs su dgod //
T02TD2589E:157a-2: sngags rnams kun la'ang sgrub pa po //
T02TD2589E:157a-3: 'khor lo can ni de dag bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-4: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su //
T02TD2589E:157a-5: dkyil 'khor bzhi po dag tu ni //
T02TD2589E:157a-6: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi //
T02TD2589E:157a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya //
T02TD2589E:157a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'ang //
T02TD2589E:157a-9: sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba //
T02TD2589E:157a-10: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2589E:157a-11: go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02TD2589E:157a-12: de nyid kyi ni mtshams kyi char //
T02TD2589E:157a-13: sbyan dang de bzhin m'a ma k'i //
T02TD2589E:157a-14: gos dkar de bzhin sgrol ma ni //
T02TD2589E:157a-15: rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya //
T02TD2589E:157a-16: sgo rnams su yang sgo srung ni //
T02TD2589E:157a-17: rang gi mtshan mas phyag brgyan pa //
T02TD2589E:157a-18: rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan pas //
T02TD2589E:157a-19: rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya //
T02TD2589E:157a-20: rdo rje shugs kyis byung nas ni //
T02TD2589E:157a-21: dkyil 'khor mchog ni gnyis pa ru /
T02TD2589E:157a-22: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2589E:157a-23: sgo srung rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2589E:157a-24: dag pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2589E:157a-25: der ni cho ga bzhin bri bya //
T02TD2589E:157a-26: shar phyogs su ni sa rnams bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-27: de bzhin lho ni rab 'bar ba'i //
T02TD2589E:157a-28: pha rol phyin pa thams cad bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-29: nub tu dbang rnams bcu po ste //
T02TD2589E:157a-30: byang du gzungs ni thams cad bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-31: de bzhin mtshams su sgeg mo sogs //
T02TD2589E:157a-32: dngos grub bde ba kun sogs pa //
T02TD2589E:157a-33: gsang sngags don dang ldan par bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-34: rdo rje shugs kyis byung nas su //
T02TD2589E:157a-35: dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni //
T02TD2589E:157a-36: bskal ba bzang po thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:157a-37: de bzhin sgo srung rnams kyang bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-38: rdo rje me to ga la sogs pa'ang //
T02TD2589E:157a-39: go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02TD2589E:157a-40: de yi pho brang phyi rol bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-41: phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyis gnas //
T02TD2589E:157a-42: zlum zhing kun du bzang ba dang //
T02TD2589E:157a-43: sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes par yang //
T02TD2589E:157a-44: der ni tshangs pa la sogs pa //
T02TD2589E:157a-45: chung ma la sogs tshogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD2589E:157a-46: rgyan dang rang gi mtshan mar ldan //
T02TD2589E:157a-47: kun du rim bzhin legs par bri //
T02TD2589E:157a-48: phyi sgo'i shar gyi cha la ni //
T02TD2589E:157a-49: gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgya che //
T02TD2589E:157a-50: thams cad bsrungs la rab brtson pa //
T02TD2589E:157a-51: rnam pa kun du legs par gzhag / g-yon brkyang bas ni legs bzhugs shing //
T02TD2589E:157a-52: phyag g-yas dbyug pa 'phyar mdzad la //
T02TD2589E:157a-53: phyag g-yon thugs kar sdigs mdzub bsgreng //
T02TD2589E:157a-54: rab tu drag por bri bar bya //
T02TD2589E:157a-55: gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che //
T02TD2589E:157a-56: phyag rgya chen po lho phyogs su //
T02TD2589E:157a-57: khro bo chen po rta mgrin gyi /
T02TD2589E:157a-58: phyag rgya chen po nub phyogs su //
T02TD2589E:157b-0: rdo @157b rje 'jigs byed spyan gyis ni //
T02TD2589E:157b-1: phyag rgya chen po byang phyogs su //
T02TD2589E:157b-2: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02TD2589E:157b-3: bsrung ba'i phyir ni thams cad dgod //
T02TD2589E:157b-4: de yi phyi rol khor yug dang //
T02TD2589E:157b-5: khor yug chen po de bzhin bri //
T02TD2589E:157b-6: blo ldan yang dag kun rdzogs par //
T02TD2589E:157b-7: sngags zhes pas ni legs par bri //
T02TD2589E:157b-8: da ni sku mdog la sogs pa'i nges pa bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:157b-9: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni zla ba nya ba'i mdangs can gyi sku la //
T02TD2589E:157b-13: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i cod pan gyi steng du //
T02TD2589E:157b-14: sangs rgyas lha'i rin po che'i rtse bran can du byas te lhag ma ni gsal bas go bar zad do //
T02TD2589E:157b-15: 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad ni kun kyang gser gyi mdog can //
T02TD2589E:157b-16: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-17: rin po che'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2589E:157b-18: phyag g-yas na 'khor lo bstod de bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-19: phyag g-yon gyis gdan la mnyes pas brten par mdzad pa'o / zhe sdang chen po bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa ni //
T02TD2589E:157b-20: autpala sngon po'i mdog can zhal bzhi pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-21: phyag brgyad pa rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis glang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-22: rin po che'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2589E:157b-23: zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-24: zhal g-yas pa gdangs shing drag po //
T02TD2589E:157b-25: zhal g-yon pa tshems kyi sgros gnon pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-26: zhal rgyab ma mchog tu gdug pa thams cad skrag par mdzad pa /
T02TD2589E:157b-27: phyag g-yas pa rnams na ral gri dang /
T02TD2589E:157b-31: phyag g-yon rnams ni sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang /
T02TD2589E:157b-33: gzhu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:157b-34: chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2589E:157b-38: dmar po dang ldan pa phyag brgyad pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-39: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis rta'i gdan la bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-40: phyag g-yas rnams na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2589E:157b-44: phyag g-yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2589E:157b-46: gzhu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:157b-47: 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa ni sku mdog dmar po rin po che'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2589E:157b-50: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:157b-51: zhal sgeg pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dmar po dang nag po dang /
T02TD2589E:158a-2: phyag g-yas rnams ni rdo rje dang /
T02TD2589E:158a-10: khro bo chen po bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa ni sku mdog nag po rin po che'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2589E:158a-13: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis nam mkha' lding gi khri la bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:158a-14: zhal dang po mche ba gtsigs pa //
T02TD2589E:158a-15: kha dog nag po g-yas pa zhi ba /
T02TD2589E:158a-16: kha dog dkar po rgyab sgeg pa /
T02TD2589E:158a-18: g-yon pa zhi ba'i tshul can mdog dkar po //
T02TD2589E:158a-19: phyag g-yas pa rnams ral gri dang rdo rje dang //
T02TD2589E:158a-20: mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:158a-21: phyag g-yon rnams na dril bu dang //
T02TD2589E:158a-22: gzhu dang sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang /
T02TD2589E:158a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02TD2589E:158a-25: rang gi gdan gyi seng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:158a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'ang sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba //
T02TD2589E:158a-27: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2589E:158a-28: go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02TD2589E:158a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du //
T02TD2589E:158a-31: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD2589E:158a-32: phyag g-yas kyis rang gi thugs kar rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:158a-33: g-yon bsnyems pas dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158a-34: padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:158a-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan dang /
T02TD2589E:158a-37: dbu rgyan gyi nges pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:158a-38: thun mong yin la khyad par rnams ni bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:158a-39: rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dren zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158a-40: rdo rje chags pa sku mdog mar po mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158a-41: rdo rje legs pa margad kyi mdog chan phyag gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba stsol ba'o //
T02TD2589E:158a-42: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2589E:158a-43: rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su /
T02TD2589E:158a-44: phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158a-45: rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po /
T02TD2589E:158a-46: phyag gnyis kyis rang gi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-0: rdo rje @158b rgyal mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs //
T02TD2589E:158b-1: phyag gnyis yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-2: rdo rje bzhad pa ni sku mdog padma'i rtsa ltar dkar ba //
T02TD2589E:158b-3: so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya //
T02TD2589E:158b-5: phyag g-yon pa bsnyems pas padma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas padma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-6: rdo rje rnon po ni 'dir sku mdog gur gum lta bu phyag g-yas kyis ral gri 'phyar ba //
T02TD2589E:158b-7: phyag g-yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-8: rdo rje rgyu sku mdog gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-9: rdo rje smra ba sku mdog dmar po phyag g-yas pa lce'i phyag dang ldan pa //
T02TD2589E:158b-10: phyag g-yon pas dung bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-11: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2589E:158b-12: rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis na rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams nas spyi bor 'jog cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i don du gar mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-13: rdo rje srung ba sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po phyag gnyis kyis mche ba gnyis rang gi zhal du 'dzin cing gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-15: rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bsdams nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-16: mtshams rnams su spyan ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-17: m'a ma k'i ni mi bskyod pa dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-18: gos dkar mo ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-19: sgrol ma ni don yod par grub pa dong 'dra'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-20: sems ma bcu drug ni kun du bzang mo dang /
T02TD2589E:158b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang /
T02TD2589E:158b-22: dga' la chags ma dang legs ldan ma ste rdo rje rigs kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-23: rin po che'i gtso mo dang /
T02TD2589E:158b-25: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan dang /
T02TD2589E:158b-26: bkod pa dang ldan ma dang bzhi ni ratna'i rigs kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-27: rdo rje sa mo dang kun du 'khor lo ma dang rlan 'dzin ma dang /
T02TD2589E:158b-28: stong du zlos ma bzhi padma'o rigs kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-29: dngos grub kyi rtse mo dang /
T02TD2589E:158b-32: gzungs kyi phyag rgya rnams dang bzhi ni las kyi rigs kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:158b-33: sku mdog phyag mtshan sems dpa' bcu drug dang mthun no //
T02TD2589E:159a-0: @159a * // 'di'i lugs kyis spyan ma la rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpas bskor //
T02TD2589E:159a-1: m'a ma k'i la rin po che'i rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis bskor //
T02TD2589E:159a-2: gzhan gnyis po yang rigs mthu par bskor ba'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-3: 'dir rdo rje thig gi nang longs su ri mo zur bzhi pa byas pa'i brgyad cha'i sgo ste rta babs med pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-4: lhag ma ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2589E:159a-5: de'i shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-6: lho'i sgor rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog ser po phyag na rdo rje zhags pa bsnams pa g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-7: nub kyi sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsnams pa sa ga'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-8: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'bebs pa sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa zlum po'i 'dug stabs kyis bzhugs par bri bar bya ste nang gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2589E:159a-9: gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur te gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2589E:159a-10: gnyis pa der yang shar phyogs su sa bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:159a-11: kun kyang sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:159a-12: rin po che'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2589E:159a-13: phyag g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:159a-14: phyag g-yon na rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-15: de la mos pas spyod pa'i sa ni sku mdog padma ltar dmar ba phyag g-yon na padma dmar po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-16: rab tu dga' ba'i sa ni rin po che padma r'i ga'i mdog can /
T02TD2589E:159a-17: phyag g-yon na yid bzhin gyi ror bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-18: dri ma med pa'i sa ni ro bu tshon shel gyi mdog can //
T02TD2589E:159a-19: phyag g-yon gyis thams cad dag par so sor rtog pa'i padma dkar po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-20: 'od byed pa'i sa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can //
T02TD2589E:159a-21: phyag g-yon gyis sna tshogs padma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-22: 'od 'phro ba'i sa ni margad lta bu'i mdog can phyag g-yon na autpala bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-23: shin tu sbyangs dka' ba'i sa ni sku mdog ser po phyag g-yon pa pang bar bkan nas bzhag pas nor bu markata bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159a-24: mngon du gyur pa'i sa ni gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can //
T02TD2589E:159a-25: phyag g-yon gyis padma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-0: ring du song ba'i @159b sa ni nam mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs phyag g-yon gyis sna tshogs padma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o /
T02TD2589E:159b-1: mi g-yo ba'i sa ni ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba //
T02TD2589E:159b-2: phyag g-yon ba bsnyems pas padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rdo rje lda pa mdog dmar po ste //
T02TD2589E:159b-4: legs pa'i blo gros kyi ni sku mdog dmar skya phyag g-yon gyis autpa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-5: chos kyi sprin gyi ni gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yon gyis chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-6: sangs rgyas kyi kun du 'od ni nyi ma gung gi mdog can phyag g-yon pas padma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-7: lho phyogs su pha rol tu phyir pa bu gnyis sna tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:159b-9: gzon zhing dar la bab pa zhal gyi padma sgeg pa'i mnyams kyis rgyas pa /
T02TD2589E:159b-10: rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'i gser gyi gdu bus lag ngar bkang ba //
T02TD2589E:159b-13: phyag g-yas pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:159b-14: phyag g-yon pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-15: de la rin po che padma'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni padma dmar po ltar sku mdog dmar po phyag g-yon pas padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-16: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog dmar skya //
T02TD2589E:159b-17: phyag g-yon pas 'bru dang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-18: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi pa dku mdog dkar po phyag g-yon pas aa shva ka'i me tog gi mgo lcogs 'dab ma dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-19: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yon pas padma dkar po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-20: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa markat kyi mdog can //
T02TD2589E:159b-21: phyag g-yon pas autpala bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:159b-22: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g-yon pas padma dkar po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-1: tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-2: phyag g-yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-3: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri yang ku ltar sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yon pas padma dkar po'i steng du rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-4: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa autpala sngon po lta bu'i mdog can phyag g-yon gyis autpa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-5: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i mdog can phyag g-yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-6: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g-yon pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-7: rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag g-yon pas sna tshogs padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-8: nub phyogs su dbang bcu padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:160a-9: rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa mnga' ba /
T02TD2589E:160a-10: gzhon zhing dar la bab pa //
T02TD2589E:160a-11: sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa //
T02TD2589E:160a-12: zhal gyi padma cung zad 'dzum pa dang /
T02TD2589E:160a-13: spyan autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba //
T02TD2589E:160a-14: 'od mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2589E:160a-15: phyag g-yas na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:160a-16: g-yon na bsnyems pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02TD2589E:160a-17: de la tshe la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2589E:160a-18: phyag g-yon na padma r'a ga'i nor bu'i 'dab ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i sku bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-19: sems la dbang ba zla ba'i mdog can phyag g-yon gyis me tog bandu ka ltar dmar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-20: yo byad la dbang ba sku mdog ser po phyag g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-21: las la dbang ba markata lta bu'i mdog can phyag g-yon sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160a-22: skye ba la dbang ba sku mdog sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2589E:160a-23: phyag g-yon kha dog sna tshogs pa dz'a ti'i yal ga bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-0: rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yon na padma'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil @160b 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-1: mos pa la dbang ba padma'i rtsa ba ltar mdog dkar pa //
T02TD2589E:160b-2: phyag g-yon na me tog pri yang ku'i snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-3: smon lam la dbang ba gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yon autpa la sngon po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-4: ye shes la dang ba mthon ka chen po'i mdog can //
T02TD2589E:160b-5: phyag g-yon na autpa la sngon po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-6: chos la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2589E:160b-7: phyag g-yon na padma'i steng du bum pa bzang po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-8: yid bzhin nor bu'i tshon shel gyi mdog can /
T02TD2589E:160b-9: phyag g-yas na padma dkar po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-10: phyag g-yon na rin po che'i shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-11: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can phyag g-yas na padma ser po'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:160b-12: phyag g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-13: 'di gnyis kyi gdan dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i dbang rnams dang 'dra bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-14: byang phyogs su gzugs bcu gnyis sna tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2589E:160b-15: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2589E:160b-16: rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyi rtse bran can /
T02TD2589E:160b-17: phyag g-yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:160b-18: phyag g-yon gyis dkur brten pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-19: de la nor ldan gyi gzungs ni gser gyi mdog can //
T02TD2589E:160b-20: phyag g-yon na 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-21: rin chen sgrol ma'i gzungs ni padma r'a ka'i mdog can //
T02TD2589E:160b-22: phyag g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-23: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs ni sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD2589E:160b-24: phyag g-yon na nor bu chu shes kyi bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-25: 'od zer can gyi gzungs ni sku mdog dmar skya //
T02TD2589E:160b-26: phyag g-yon na khab dang sku pa bsnams pa'o//
T02TD2589E:160b-27: ri khrod lo ma can gyi gzungs ni //
T02TD2589E:160b-28: sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yon na lo ma sbom pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-29: dug sel ma'i gzungs ni sku mdog dkar po phyag g-yon na dug gi me tog gi snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-30: sgo mtha' yas pa'i gzungs ni sku mdog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser //
T02TD2589E:160b-31: phyag g-yon na padma dmar po'i steng du mi zad pa'i gter chen p'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:160b-32: sku la byed ma'i gzungs ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can /
T02TD2589E:161a-1: ba 'phyang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-2: shes rab 'phel ba'i gzungs ni ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g-yon na autpala sngon po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-3: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs ni nor bu ma rkang lta bu'i mdog can //
T02TD2589E:161a-4: phyag g-yon pa na rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i padma dmar skya bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-5: ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs ni //
T02TD2589E:161a-6: sku mdog dmar po phyag g-yon na rin po che'i za ma tog bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'i gzungs ni gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g-yon na kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sgrom bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-8: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor //
T02TD2589E:161a-9: chos so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2589E:161a-10: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2589E:161a-11: rin po che'i cod pan can phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-12: lho phyogs kyi sgor don so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog marka ta lta bu phyag na rin po che'i zhags pa bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:161a-13: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-14: nub phyogs kyi sgor nges pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par rig sku mdog dmar skya //
T02TD2589E:161a-15: phyag na mtha' gnyis su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:161a-16: gdan dang rgyan la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2589E:161a-17: byang phyogs kyi sgor spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog markata ltar ljang gu //
T02TD2589E:161a-18: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mchan pa'i dril bu bsnams pa ste lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2589E:161a-19: shar lho'i mtshams su lha mo sgeg mo gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba /
T02TD2589E:161a-20: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:161a-21: phyag gnyis ka rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang ba'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-22: lha nub mtshams su phreng ba sku mdog dmar skya //
T02TD2589E:161a-23: phyag na rin po che'i phreng ba bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:161a-24: bzhugs tshul la sogs ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-25: nub byang mtshams su glu ma sku mdog dmar po pi wang brdung ba la brtson pa ste //
T02TD2589E:161a-26: lhag ma ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2589E:161a-27: byang shar mtshams su gar ma sku mdog ljang gu //
T02TD2589E:161a-28: phyag gis mchog gi rtsed mo dang gar mdzad pa ste lhag ma ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-0: nang gi @161b dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srungs rnams ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2589E:161b-1: dkyil 'khor bar ma ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-2: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srung rnams ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin no //
T02TD2589E:161b-3: rim pa gsum pa'i shar phyogs su kun du bzang po gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
T02TD2589E:161b-4: rin po che'i dbu rgyan can phyag g-yas kyis mchog stsol ba /
T02TD2589E:161b-5: phyag g-yon gyis autpa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:161b-6: padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-7: blo gros mi zad pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-8: phyag g-yon gyis chos ston pa'i tshul gyis padma bsnams pa ste /
T02TD2589E:161b-10: bzhugs tshul la sogs pa ni kun du bzang po dang 'dra'o /
T02TD2589E:161b-11: sa'i snying po gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas kyis sa gnon //
T02TD2589E:161b-12: phyag g-yon padma'i steng na dpag bsam gyi shing bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-13: nam mkha'i snying po sku mdog marka ta ltar ljang ser phyag g-yas kyis rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa /
T02TD2589E:161b-14: phyag g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-15: lho phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-16: phyag g-yon na bum pa bzang po las 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:161b-17: phyag na rin po che sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yas pa rin po che sbyin pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2589E:161b-18: phyag g-yon pa na padma'i steng du byang chub kyi zla ba bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-19: rgya mtsho'i blo gros ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba //
T02TD2589E:161b-20: phyag g-yas na dung bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:161b-21: phyag g-yon ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-22: rdo rje snying po sku mdog autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu phyag g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:161b-23: phyag g-yon na sa bcu ston pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-24: nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can phyag g-yas kyis dam pa sbyin pa /
T02TD2589E:161b-25: phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-26: mthu chen po thob pa gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2589E:161b-27: phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:161b-28: phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:161b-29: zla ba'i 'od padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba //
T02TD2589E:161b-30: phyag g-yas na rdo rje'i 'khor lo bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:162a-1: padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-2: dra ba can gyi 'od sku mdog dmar skya phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-3: phyag g-yon na padma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:162a-4: byang phyogs su 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2589E:162a-5: phyag g-yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-6: phyag g-yon na padma'i steng du bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:162a-7: spobs pa brtsegs pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas kyis se gol brdebs par brtson pa phyag g-yon na padma'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:162a-8: mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gur gum gyi mdog can phyag g-yas na 'od 'phro ba mang po 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-9: phyag g-yon na mdung thung bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:162a-10: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-11: phyag g-yon na sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ba dan bsnams pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:162a-12: de dag thams cad kyi bzhugs tshul dang /
T02TD2589E:162a-14: dbu rgyan rnams ni kun du bzang po dang 'dre bar shes par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:162a-15: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan te khyad par ni de yod do //
T02TD2589E:162a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas de nyid kyi byang shar mtshams su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i mdog can /
T02TD2589E:162a-19: zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa ste /
T02TD2589E:162a-23: rgyab dpa' bo'i zhal dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-24: phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2589E:162a-25: de gnyis kyi thugs kar h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba /
T02TD2589E:162a-26: phyag g-yas rnams na ral gri dang lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2589E:162a-28: phyag g-yon rnams na gzhu dang /
T02TD2589E:162a-31: g-yon brkyang bar bzhugs pa'i zhabs g-yon pas dbang phyug chen po'i spyi bor gnon pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-32: zhabs g-yas pas au ma'i nu ma rgyas pa mnan pa /
T02TD2589E:162a-33: sangs rgyas kyi me tog gi phreng ba brgyus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /
T02TD2589E:162a-34: na bza' sna tshogs mnga' ba /
T02TD2589E:162a-35: gdug pa can thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i phyir nges par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:162b-0: shar lho mtshams su khro bo rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba char sprin gyi mdog can 'od can gyi phreng ba @162b 'bar bas kun du 'khrug pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-6: snying rje chen po la sogs pa nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-7: phyag g-yas rnams na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2589E:162b-11: phyag g-yon rnams ni dril bu dang /
T02TD2589E:162b-14: kha tv'am btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs pa bsnams pa //
T02TD2589E:162b-15: me ser skya 'bar ba'i sgra'i tshogs shin tu 'jigs su rung ba /
T02TD2589E:162b-16: sprul pa chen po'i gdu bu dang /
T02TD2589E:162b-17: dbu rgyan dang skar rags dang /
T02TD2589E:162b-22: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i 'khor lo dgod pa la mkhas pa las /
T02TD2589E:162b-23: g-yon brkyang bas khyab 'jug chung ma dang bcas pa gnon pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:162b-24: lho nub mtshams su khro bo chen po rdo rje khrag 'thung sku mdog mthing shun ltar sngo ba /
T02TD2589E:162b-28: zhal g-yas pa rab tu rmongs pa rnams sems rmongs par byed pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-29: zhal g-yon pa sgeg pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-30: zhal rgyab bam za bar byed pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-31: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-32: phyag g-yon dril bu dang ba dang dan bcas pa'i kha tv'a ga bsnams pa dang gar mdzad pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-33: yang gnyis kyis 'jigs byed chen po'i pags par lon pad lung gi gos 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-34: yang gnyis na mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-35: yang phyag g-yas na ma h'a ra ktas yongs su bkang ba'i ka p'a la'i thod tshal tsa sha ka bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-36: yang phyag g-yon na snying gi padma'i nang na ma h'a m'a sas bkang ba'i ka p'a la bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-37: sangs rgyas lngas mtshan pa'i thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi nor bu can cod pan mnga' ba /
T02TD2589E:162b-38: 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin mnga' ba /
T02TD2589E:162b-39: 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po mnga' ba /
T02TD2589E:162b-40: g-yon brkyang pas tshangs pa chung ma dang bcas pa mnan nas par bri'o /
T02TD2589E:162b-41: nub byang mtshams su rta mchog sku mdog ljang gu zhal bzhi pa zhabs bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-42: zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-45: zhal g-yon tshangs pa'i gdong dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:162b-46: spyi bo'i zhal ljang gu mchu dang spyi bo'i gtsug nas gyen du 'degs pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-0: @163a * // phyag g-yas kyis ba dan gsum pa lta bu'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pas 'degs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-1: phyag g-yon na kha tv'am ga sna tshogs padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-2: phyag g-yas pa'i gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa lta bus gyen du slong ba'i tshul du mdzad pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-3: phyag g-yon pa'i gnyis pa na mdung thung bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-4: yang phyag g-yas kyi gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-5: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na dbyug pa dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-6: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-7: g-yas pa gcig gis dbang po dang dbang mo mnan pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-8: gnyis pas dga' ba mo dang mgu ba mo mnan pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-9: g-yon gyi dang pos brgya byin dang khyab 'jug mnan pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-10: gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:163a-11: de nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed char sprin gyi mdog can /
T02TD2589E:163a-12: zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-13: zhal drug po sgeg pa dang /
T02TD2589E:163a-18: nyams rnam pa sna tshogs pas yongs su khyab cing rgyas pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-19: phyag g-yas na lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-20: phyag g-yon pas thugs kar sdigs mdzub bsgreng pa dang /
T02TD2589E:163a-22: yang phyag g-yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-23: phyag g-yon gnyis na gzhu dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-24: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan sbrul gyis brgyan pa stag gi pags pa bsnams pas /
T02TD2589E:163a-25: ma he'i steng du rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:163a-26: lho phyogs kyi spor [*sgor?] shes rab mthar byed ge sar ser po lta bu'i mdog can /
T02TD2589E:163a-27: zhal bzhi pa phag brgyad pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-29: zhal g-yas pa gdangs shing 'jigs su rung ba /
T02TD2589E:163a-31: zhal rgyab ma shin tu drag cing gtum pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-32: phyag g-yas na bzhugs par byed pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-33: de las gzhan pas rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163a-34: phyag g-yon pas thugs ka'i phyogs su lcags kyi dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bsgreng pa la brtson pa de las gzhan par dril bu dang mdung thung dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-0: mi bskyod @163b pa'i cod pan can /
T02TD2589E:163b-1: rol pa'i stang stabs kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-2: nub phyogs kyi sgor padma mthar byed sku mdog dmar po /
T02TD2589E:163b-4: phyag brgyad pa zhal dang po dang /
T02TD2589E:163b-5: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang /
T02TD2589E:163b-6: rgyab ma ste bzhi po grang ji lta ba bzhin du sgeg pa dang /
T02TD2589E:163b-7: drag po dang zhi ba dang /
T02TD2589E:163b-8: dgod pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-9: g-yas dang g-yon gyis gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-10: phyag g-yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral dri dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-11: phyag g-yon rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang /
T02TD2589E:163b-12: zhags pa dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-13: klu'i rgyal pos brgyan cing stag gi pags pa man bas pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-14: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la brtan par chags shing /
T02TD2589E:163b-16: padma dang nyi ma'i steng du rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-17: byang phyogs kyi sgor khro bo bgegs mthar byed sprin sngon po'i mdog can /
T02TD2589E:163b-20: zhal sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-21: phyag g-yas dang g-yon gnyis kyis rdo rje bcings pas dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-22: phyag g-yas rnams na ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-23: phyag g-yon rnams na sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:163b-24: gzhu dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-25: sku la sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2589E:163b-26: sangs rgyas kyi cod pan can g-yon brkyang bas tshogs kyi bdag po mnan nas bzhugs pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-27: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su ri mo bris la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:163b-28: me'i phyogs su me tog ma sku mdog ser ba phyag gnyis me tog gis bkang ba'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-29: bden bral gyi phyogs su bdug pa ma sku mdog sngo ba /
T02TD2589E:163b-30: phyag na spos khang bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-31: rlung gi phyogs su mar me ma sku mdog dmar ba phyag na mar me'i sdong bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-32: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su byug pa ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dung chos bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-33: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje gzugs ma sku mdog ser po phyag g-yas na me long bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:163b-34: lho phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje sgrol ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs /
T02TD2589E:163b-35: phyag na rdo rje pi wang bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-0: nub phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje dri sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dri'i snod bsnams @164a * //
T02TD2589E:164a-2: byang phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje ro sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag na ro'i snod bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-3: rdo rje shugs kyis byung la phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2589E:164a-4: yongs su bskor bar tshangs pa la sogs pa go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-5: de la byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan mdog dkar po ral pa dang cod pan yod pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-6: kha tv'am ga rtse gsum pa thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-7: lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar nas mgor bzhag pa ste /
T02TD2589E:164a-11: au ma dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-12: de bzhin du thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mos 'dud par byed pa la mchog tu gzhol ba /
T02TD2589E:164a-13: dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-14: de la 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad ni phyogs dang mtshams rnams su bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:164a-15: shar du brgya byin mdog ser po rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-16: glang po che dkar po la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-17: shar lhor me lha mdog dmar po lag pa bzhi pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-18: g-yas gnyis na blugs gzar dang dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-19: yon gnyis phreng ba dang gundhe thogs par skyes la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-20: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pas so sor ma smras so //
T02TD2589E:164a-21: lhor gshin rje mdog nag mo dbyug pa dang mdung thung thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-22: ma he la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-23: lho nub tu srin po'i bdag po mdog sngon po lag na ral gri dang phub thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-24: mi ro la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-25: nub tu cha lha mdog dkar po gyas dang gyon gnyis na dung dang sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa//
T02TD2589E:164a-26: chu srin la zhon pa gdongs ka bdun pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-27: nub byang du rlung lha nam mkha'i mdog can lag pa gnyis na ba dan thogs pa ri dags la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164a-28: byang du lus ngan po gser gyi mdog can g-yas na lcags kyu thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:164a-29: g-yon na dbyug ba thogs pa mi la zhon pa chung ma dang btsas par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-0: 'di dag gi chung @164b ma rnams kyi mdog la sogs pa ni de rang rang gi khyod dang 'dra par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-1: dbang ldan dang nye bar tshangs pa mdog ser po gdong bzhi pa /
T02TD2589E:164b-3: lag pa gnyis na pad ma dang phreng ba thogs nas phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2589E:164b-4: 'jog pa de las gzhan pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD2589E:164b-5: ngang pa la gzhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-6: de'i 'og tu khyab 'jug mdog nag mo lag pa bzhi pa gyas dang gyon gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang mdung thogs nas spyi bar thal mo sbyar te 'jog pa /
T02TD2589E:164b-7: de las gzhan pa gnyis kyis sha ra'i gzhu dang da byug pa 'dzin pa nam mkha' lding la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-8: dbang phyug chen po mdog dkar po lag pa gnyis na thod pa dang /
T02TD2589E:164b-9: rtse gsum thogs te thal mo sbyar ba zla ba'i rtse bran thogs pa khyu mchog la zhon pa chung ma'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor bar bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-10: gzhon nu k'arti ka mdog dmar po byis pa'i gzugs can dong drug pa /
T02TD2589E:164b-11: lag pa drug pa lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas la /
T02TD2589E:164b-12: yang lag pa gnyis na mdung thung dang rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:164b-13: yang gnyis na khyim bya dang /
T02TD2589E:164b-14: dril bu thogs pa rma bya la zho zhon par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-15: nag po chen po mdog po mdung rtse gsum pa dang thod pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-16: dga' byed dbang phyug ni mdog nag po rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa rdza rnga la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-17: nyi ma ni mdog dmar po lag pa gnyis na pad ma la gnas pa /
T02TD2589E:164b-18: nyi ma'i kyis 'khor thogs pa rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa'o /
T02TD2589E:164b-19: zla ba ni mdog dkar po lag pa gnyis na padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa dang pa la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-20: mig dmar ni mdog dmar po la lag pa rgyas pa na chu gri thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:164b-21: lag pa gyon pa na mi mgo za bar byed pa glang po che la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-22: gza' lag ni mdog ser po lag na mda' gzhung thogs pa pad ma la 'dug pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-23: phur bu mdog dkar po lag na phreng ba dang spyi blugs thogs pa pad ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-24: pa ba bsangs mdog dkar po phreng ba dang gu ne dha thogs pa bum pa la 'dug pa'o //
T02TD2589E:164b-25: spen pa mdog nag po dbyug pa thogs pa rus sbal la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-1: mdog dmar nag lag na nyi zla thogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-2: mjug rings mdog nag po ral gri dang sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-3: stobs bzang mdog nag po ral gri dang gshol thogs pa glang po che la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-4: rgyal bar byed pa mdog ljang gu me tig gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2589E:165a-5: mda' dang gzhu dang kham phor thogs pa //
T02TD2589E:165a-6: ko gi la'i shing rta la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-7: sbrang rtsir byed pa mdog dkar po lag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2589E:165a-8: mda' dang gzhu dang kham phor thogs pa ni tsho'i khri la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-9: dpyid kyi lha mdog dkar po lag na mda' dang gzhu dang /
T02TD2589E:165a-10: kham phor dang ral gri thogs pa sprin la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-11: mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang /
T02TD2589E:165a-17: rigs ldan te klu'i rgyal po brgyad de gdengs ka bdun bdun dang ldan pa //
T02TD2589E:165a-18: thal mo sbyar ba byas pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-20: rings ldan gnyis ni bram ze'i rigs te mdog dmar po me lha'i bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-21: nor rgyas dang dung skyong gnyis ni rgyal rigs te /
T02TD2589E:165a-22: mdog ser po brgya byin gyi bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-23: 'dzog po dang padma chen po gnyis ni da mngas rigs te mdog nag po rlung lha'i bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-24: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma gnyis ni rje'u rigs te /
T02TD2589E:165a-25: mdog dkar po chu lha'i bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-26: de dag kyang 'khor dang bcas pa bri'i //
T02TD2589E:165a-27: thags bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang /
T02TD2589E:165a-29: rnam par sang byed la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni mdog nag po ral gri dang phub la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa lag na go cha gon zhing chas pa 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-30: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams ni gshog rgyang ring ba kha dog sna tshogs pa pus mo'i lha nga'i bar du kha ba dkar ba //
T02TD2589E:165a-31: de'i steng su lte ba'i khung bu la thug gi bar du gser gyi mdog can //
T02TD2589E:165a-32: de nas lkog ma'i bar du nyi ma 'char mdog can //
T02TD2589E:165a-33: de nas klad pa'i steng gi mthar thig par ma lus par aanydz'a na bcag pa lta bu'i mdog can /
T02TD2589E:165a-34: nam mkha' lding du mas yongs su bskor ba'i bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165a-35: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ni mdog dmar skya //
T02TD2589E:165a-36: lag na po wang thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
T02TD2589E:165a-37: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-0: dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lda pa @165b ni gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2589E:165b-1: dri za'i rgyal po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-2: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po don thams cad grub pa ni gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can /
T02TD2589E:165b-3: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2589E:165b-4: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-5: gnod sbyin rnams kyang lag na panytsa pu ra dang ne'u le thogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-6: de la gang ba bzang po ni mdog sngon po /
T02TD2589E:165b-7: nor bu bzang po ni mdog ser po /
T02TD2589E:165b-8: nor sbyin ni mdog dmar po /
T02TD2589E:165b-9: rnam thos sras ni mdog ser po pi tsi gu nda li mdog dmar po ki li mi li mdog ljang gu sgo'i dbang po mdog ser po /
T02TD2589E:165b-10: sbyong pa'i dbang po mdog ser po /
T02TD2589E:165b-11: 'phrog ma gser gyi mdog can de la bu dang bcas pas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-12: de dag thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-13: tha skar sku ma dog dkar po /
T02TD2589E:165b-23: bre mdog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser /
T02TD2589E:165b-40: nam gru mdog ser skya ste /
T02TD2589E:165b-41: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag thams cad kyang rgyan dang ldan zhing gos gyon pa /
T02TD2589E:165b-43: bud med kyi gzugs su bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-44: tshangs pa ma ni tshangs pa dang 'dra bar bri'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-45: drag po ma ni drag po lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-46: khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-47: gzhon nu ma ni k'a rti ka lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-48: dpang po ma ni brgya byin lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-49: phag mo ni mdog nag po ste /
T02TD2589E:165b-52: thod pa lag na thogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-53: dga' bying ma ni mdog dmar po yi dgas la zhon pa /
T02TD2589E:165b-54: k'a ti ra dang thod pa lag na thogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-55: de dang nyi ba nyid du bri dga'i ri ti bri ste /
T02TD2589E:165b-56: ma mo bdun bhri nggi ri ti dang bcas par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:165b-57: tshogs kyi bdag po ni mdog dkar po lag pa bzhi pa /
T02TD2589E:166a-0: @166a * // glang po che'i mdog can lag pa g-yas dang g-yon pa na la du dang la phug thogs pa //
T02TD2589E:166a-1: de las gzhan pa gnyis nam dung rtse gsum dang dgra sta thogs pa //
T02TD2589E:166a-4: tshogs ru mas yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166a-5: lha gzhan dag kyang gzhal yas khang na gnas par bri'o //
T02TD2589E:166a-6: 'dir yang sgo srung rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa de dag nyid yin no //
T02TD2589E:166a-7: de ltar na nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ma lus shing /
T02TD2589E:166a-8: ma tshad ba med par bsgrub pa la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par 'gyur pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166a-9: de nas sngar nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa //
T02TD2589E:166a-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis gang gi tshe /
T02TD2589E:166a-11: slob mas lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab par gyur na //
T02TD2589E:166a-12: de'i tshe 'di ltar yid la bya ste /
T02TD2589E:166a-13: ngas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis bsdu bas sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166a-14: 'di la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bya'o zhes bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:166a-15: de nas slob ma de la che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par 'dod dam zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166a-16: gal te bdag 'tshal lo zhes zer na //
T02TD2589E:166a-17: des kyang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad tshogs sam /
T02TD2589E:166a-18: 'on te ma yin zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166a-19: gal te cung zad ni chogs so zer na /
T02TD2589E:166a-20: de nas de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs pa'i yi ge h'um bsam pa dang /
T02TD2589E:166a-21: snying gar yang las kyi sgrib pa'i ngo bo yi ge ka nag /
T02TD2589E:166a-22: bor bsams la yi ge h'um gi 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gyen du 'byin par byed cang sna bug g-yas pa nas nges par 'byung ba ni gcer bu gzugs mi sdug pa gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02TD2589E:166a-23: skra gyen du brdzes pa byung ba dang /
T02TD2589E:166a-24: yi ge h'um yang snying gar phyin pa dang /
T02TD2589E:166b-0: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi snang bur de nyid nas byung nas @166b gsang sngags de za bar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166b-1: aom badzra yaksha kh'a da ya kh'a da ya //
T02TD2589E:166b-2: sarba p'a pam a'a ba ra na a'a sya h'um phat /
T02TD2589E:166b-3: yang na h'um las byung ba'i ro stod khro bo'i gzugs la ro smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa'i phur bus gsang sngags 'di dang de nyid du phur bus gdab bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166b-4: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya //
T02TD2589E:166b-5: sarba bigh'am bandha bandha h'um phat //
T02TD2589E:166b-6: de nas slob ma de sam las byung ba'i kun du bzang po'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02TD2589E:166b-7: de'i sbi bor ham phyung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:166b-8: de ltar byas na mang gi bdag nyid can gyi bgegs rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:166b-9: yo byad ma tshogs pa rnams kyang bde blag tu tshang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:166b-10: slob ma yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2589E:166b-11: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas grog mkhar gyis dang /
T02TD2589E:166b-12: skra dang phub ma la sogs pa las rang rang gi phyogs skyong gi gzugs brnyan bya ste /
T02TD2589E:166b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs byed pa rnams sngags 'dis bkug la bcug ste /
T02TD2589E:166b-14: bcings la phur bus legs par btab ste /
T02TD2589E:166b-15: h'um bzhi ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:166b-16: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar ba byas la mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog lta bur mdud de /
T02TD2589E:166b-17: mdzub mo g-yas pa lcags kyur byas la bzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste sngags la /
T02TD2589E:166b-18: aom badzra aam gu sha ma h'a kro dha a'a karsha ya sarba sa ma yam h'um dza:/
T02TD2589E:166b-19: de nyid dang mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad nas zhags pa dang 'dra bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2589E:166b-20: sngags la aom badzra p'a sha ma h'a kro dha par be sha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um h'um /
T02TD2589E:166b-21: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar mdud pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2589E:166b-23: aom badzra spho ta ma h'a kro dha bandha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um bam /
T02TD2589E:166b-24: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcing sa la de rnams kyi mgo la yi ge h'um bkod de /
T02TD2589E:166b-25: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje thur bu bskyed la /
T02TD2589E:166b-26: rkad [*rkang?] pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar phur bus gdab par bsams te /
T02TD2589E:166b-27: bka' bsgo ba'i tshul gyis sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//
T02TD2589E:166b-28: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bighnam bandha h'um phat /
T02TD2589E:166b-29: de nas badzra k'i li k'i la ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2589E:166b-30: zhes bya ba lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar yi ge h'um 'bar pa lta bus brdeg par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:166b-31: chog 'di ni ji srid dkyil 'khor zhag gi bar du nyin te zhing nyi ma kung la bya'o //
T02TD2589E:167a-3: // / de nas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su spos chu la sogs pas nye bar byugs shing me tog sil ma gtor la bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:167a-4: ci snyed pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lda dang ldan pa dag tu stan nang tshangs can 'jam pa la 'dug ste /
T02TD2589E:167a-5: sngags 'di dag gis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:167a-6: aom barba p'a pam ka po ka pi ka po ci ka man so bh'a tam r'a ga de sha mo ha m'a da man aa bhishthi na ya rkri tam tre k'a li kam / h'um h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD2589E:167a-8: sarb p'a pa spo ta y'a mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:167a-9: aom sarba p'a pam pra ti de sha mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:167a-10: sarba ta th'a ga ta nam /
T02TD2589E:167a-11: aa tma bha ba na ni ry'a ta y'a mi ;
T02TD2589E:167a-12: sarba ta th'a ga ta pra ti krihnan tu mam sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:167a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu nye dznya na sam bha ram aa nu mo de y'a mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:167a-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta bha dra ma h'a badzra sa ma ya ma h'a bo dhi tsi tto tp'a ta mutpa da ya mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:167a-15: de nas aom sarba ta tha'a ga ta shvan si ta sarba sa ta dh'a nam /
T02TD2589E:167a-16: sarba siddha ya sam pa na dyan tam sarba ta th'a ga ta shtsa aadhi shtha n'a tam /
T02TD2589E:167a-17: sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dha rm'a:sv'a bh'a ba shu ddho& ham /
T02TD2589E:167a-18: zhes bya bas phyi deng nang gi chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:167a-19: de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsgom pa'i sems nyid nam mkha'i ngos kyi dbus su chud pa 'od kyi dra ba chen po dang ldan pa'i padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa la de'i steng du shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi yi ge mu kha dog dmar skya /
T02TD2589E:167a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o //
T02TD2589E:167a-21: de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal zla ba lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:167a-22: padma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2589E:167a-23: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang /
T02TD2589E:167a-25: phyag g-yon gnyis na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i glegs bam dang gzhu bsnams pa nyid de /
T02TD2589E:167a-26: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02TD2589E:167a-28: sangs rgyas lda'i cod pan can mnga' ba //
T02TD2589E:167a-29: byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2589E:167a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2589E:167a-33: rig pa'i lha mo thams cad spro ba dang /
T02TD2589E:167b-0: bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can du bdag nyid @167b rnam par bsams la //
T02TD2589E:167b-1: snying ga dang smin mtshams dang /
T02TD2589E:167b-2: lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02TD2589E:167b-3: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag la rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02TD2589E:167b-6: las kyi sems ma'i ngo bo nyid de //
T02TD2589E:167b-7: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la //
T02TD2589E:167b-10: de nas mdun du yi ge hr'i: las padma aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug la bcings te /
T02TD2589E:167b-11: dbang du bya ba nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD2589E:167b-15: dri la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2589E:167b-16: lta ba nyid du byas nas de bzhin du mchod cing dbang bskur la rang gi lus la gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:167b-17: ye shes sems dpa' de bltas nas rang gi lus la rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:167b-18: de nas gcig tu gyur pas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2589E:167b-19: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bdag nyid shes nas rdo rje nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2589E:167b-20: gan rkyal du khar bzhag ste /
T02TD2589E:167b-21: thams cad bskor la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:167b-22: aom badzra tsa kra h'um phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2589E:167b-23: mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2589E:167b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa mngon sum bzhin du yang dag par bltas la /
T02TD2589E:167b-25: 'og nas bshad pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis legs par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:167b-26: rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa thun bzhi'i rim gyis ji srid du mthong bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya ba'am //
T02TD2589E:167b-28: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir rmi lam mthong gi bar du /
T02TD2589E:167b-29: aom badzra t'i kashna zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am /
T02TD2589E:167b-30: gsang sngags gzhan dag bzla ba'am /
T02TD2589E:168a-0: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa spro ba dang @168a * //
T02TD2589E:168a-1: bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can skad cig ma'i ye shes las byung ba'i rje btsun 'jam dpal du bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2589E:168a-2: dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid sems tsam gyi sprul pa khong du chud pas sems kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par bltas la ji srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:168a-3: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2589E:168a-6: lo te nyid du ji ltar mngon par dga' bar bsgrub cing zla ba yar gyi do la cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:168a-7: de la rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am /
T02TD2589E:168a-9: blon po 'am blon po chen po rnams kyis ni khru lnga bcu 'am /
T02TD2589E:168a-12: tshong dpon chen po rnams kyis ni ni shu rtsa lnga'am /
T02TD2589E:168a-14: sgrub pa po rnams kyis ni khru bcu gnyis sam /
T02TD2589E:168a-17: de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad yang dag par ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs mngon par bsal la /
T02TD2589E:168a-18: bdag dang slob ma la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:168a-19: de nas sa spyad bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:168a-20: 'dom gang tsam mam khru gang tsam 'og tu brkos la dri zhi ma po'i chus gtor ba'i sas slar bkang la /
T02TD2589E:168a-21: rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste /
T02TD2589E:168a-22: kun du brdungs la shin tu mnyam pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la /
T02TD2589E:168a-23: sgo bzhi dang skar khung dra ba can la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba la mtha' ma rnams su legs par bris shing dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan bzang po gzugs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:168a-24: bla re dam pa bri ba dang /
T02TD2589E:168a-25: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa ba'i lci bas dang dag par sbyangs shing dros nye bar byugs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:168a-26: mtshams bzhir spos khang bzhag pa dang /
T02TD2589E:168a-27: me tog dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la //
T02TD2589E:168a-28: lag pa sa la bzhag se /
T02TD2589E:168b-0: yi ge brgya pa lan bdun yongs su bzlas par @168b bya'o //
T02TD2589E:168b-1: de nas khrus byas shing dris byugs la gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2589E:168b-2: ze'u ka bcings la me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim pos byugs la gdu bu dang /
T02TD2589E:168b-3: rna rgyan la sogs pas bdag nyid legs par brgyan te /
T02TD2589E:168b-4: zla ba nya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2589E:168b-5: phyi ma'i nya'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las byas pa'am //
T02TD2589E:168b-6: yar gyi ngo la tshes gcig nas brtsams pa'am //
T02TD2589E:168b-7: de bzhin nyid tshes brgyad dang /
T02TD2589E:168b-9: tshes bcu gsum dang tshes bcu bzhi rnams la brtsams nas nya'i bar du'am /
T02TD2589E:168b-10: snga dro'i dus su brtsams nas bya'o //
T02TD2589E:168b-11: de la dang por dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2589E:168b-12: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas /
T02TD2589E:168b-13: de nyid kyis na rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2589E:168b-14: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2589E:168b-15: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2589E:168b-16: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2589E:168b-17: de ltar mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la //
T02TD2589E:168b-18: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te /
T02TD2589E:168b-19: rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug / dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa ni //
T02TD2589E:168b-20: dam tshig chen po gsum zhes bya //
T02TD2589E:168b-22: dngos grub cho ga thams cad la //
T02TD2589E:168b-23: rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas //
T02TD2589E:168b-24: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang //
T02TD2589E:168b-26: de yang dang po sa'i lha mo yi ge pam las byung ba lag na bum pa thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la //
T02TD2589E:168b-28: me tog la sogs pas mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:168b-29: de la phyag rgya dang sngags 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:168b-30: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar la mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2589E:168b-31: mthe'u chung gnyis mdud pa bya ba ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2589E:168b-34: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2589E:168b-35: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang //
T02TD2589E:168b-36: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2589E:168b-37: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD2589E:168b-38: sh'a kya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2589E:168b-39: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD2589E:168b-40: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02TD2589E:169a-3: de nas de nyid du thim par gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:169a-4: de'i steng du rdo rje bcing ga ba thur du bstan te bcings la bzhag ste /
T02TD2589E:169a-7: de nas rdo rje bcing ba las byung ba'i hum 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi sa gzhi gtan pa la thug gi bar du rdo rjer gyur par rnam par bsams la 'di skad do //
T02TD2589E:169a-9: de nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:169a-10: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2589E:169a-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs su 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang na gnas nas mngon par byang chub mngon sum du byed cing /
T02TD2589E:169a-12: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs par rim pa 'dis bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:169a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba'am //
T02TD2589E:169a-14: phyin ci ma log par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i man ngag sbyin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par gyur nas //
T02TD2589E:169a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs pa gang na bder gshegs te /
T02TD2589E:169a-16: byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du bya ba rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2589E:169a-17: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs par bka' ba spyad pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing //
T02TD2589E:169a-18: ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam zhes gsung shing gan du byon te /
T02TD2589E:169a-19: badzrod tishtha zhes bya ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2589E:169a-20: se go la brdabs pas slong bar mdzad par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:169a-21: de nas langs nas mchog tu dad pas //
T02TD2589E:169a-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta badzra pra na mya na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi zhes brjod la phag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol te //
T02TD2589E:169a-23: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis ma 'tshal na de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
T02TD2589E:169a-24: de ltar na bsgrub par bgyi //
T02TD2589E:169b-1: de nas rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la /
T02TD2589E:169b-2: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar bzlas shing bsgrub par gyis shig / ces gsung zhing sems so sor rtogs pa'i man dag de stsol bar bsam par bya ba ni /
T02TD2589E:169b-3: aom tsi tta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes bya ba phung po dang /
T02TD2589E:169b-5: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba //
T02TD2589E:169b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa de'i bdag nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:169b-7: sems kyi rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa //
T02TD2589E:169b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2589E:169b-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:169b-10: de nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2589E:169b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so //
T02TD2589E:169b-12: de nas rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na /
T02TD2589E:169b-13: de lta bur sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te /
T02TD2589E:169b-14: dper na ras dkar po la tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas /
T02TD2589E:169b-15: slar yang byang chub kyi sems kyi man ngag ston par mdzad par bsam pa ni /
T02TD2589E:169b-16: aom bo shi tsi tta autpa'a da 'a mi zhes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:169b-17: de nas shin tu 'od gsal ba'i sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las //
T02TD2589E:169b-18: rim gyis nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2589E:169b-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
T02TD2589E:169b-20: de nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2589E:169b-21: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gad lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2589E:169b-22: shin tu rnam par dag cing nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa la spros pa thams cad par bral ba me long lta bur rnam par gnas so //
T02TD2589E:169b-23: aom dznya' na shashmi pri si dza h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par spros te /
T02TD2589E:169b-24: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs par gang zhing byung ste /
T02TD2589E:170a-0: byung ba de rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs nas zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad @170a * //
T02TD2589E:170a-2: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bcom ste /
T02TD2589E:170a-3: rtogs par byas nas rdo rje chen po'i gzugs gcig tu gyur nas byung ste /
T02TD2589E:170a-4: rtse lda pa spyi bo nas thugs kar bzhugs te /
T02TD2589E:170a-5: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so //
T02TD2589E:170a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis de legs par sgrubs shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:170a-7: sngags 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig / aom tishtha badzra /
T02TD2589E:170a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na badzra h'um h'um /
T02TD2589E:170a-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo //
T02TD2589E:170a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di //
T02TD2589E:170a-18: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so //
T02TD2589E:170a-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2589E:170a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong ngo //
T02TD2589E:170a-21: sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems pa'i rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan po'i dang rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos la sgoms shig / aom ya tha sarba ta th'a ga ta sta th'a aa ham /
T02TD2589E:170a-22: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par thams cad rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad ces sol to //
T02TD2589E:170b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @170b kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig /
T02TD2589E:170b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so //
T02TD2589E:170b-2: de nas skad cig de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2589E:170b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu //
T02TD2589E:170b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
T02TD2589E:170b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis dag go //
T02TD2589E:170b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to //
T02TD2589E:170b-7: de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2589E:170b-8: dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyang rang rang gi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar 'byung bar bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:170b-9: rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:170b-10: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas //
T02TD2589E:170b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed de /
T02TD2589E:170b-12: nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur //
T02TD2589E:170b-13: kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed //
T02TD2589E:170b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas //
T02TD2589E:170b-15: dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis phyogs bzhi nas yongs su bskor te /
T02TD2589E:170b-16: lhan cig yang dag par gnas so //
T02TD2589E:170b-17: de nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin pas byams pa dang snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas pa dang mi shes pa las 'dod chags dang /
T02TD2589E:171a-0: gti mug gis dkrugs par shes nas bdag 'dir @171a * //
T02TD2589E:171a-1: babs la skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs par sprul pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o zhes yid la nges par byas te /
T02TD2589E:171a-2: rim pa 'dis snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:171a-9: de nas nam mkha' las yi ge kham las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams la /
T02TD2589E:171a-10: de'i sku'i yan lag thams cad las chu'i rgyun spom po byung bas snod thams cad yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2589E:171a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du thim par gyur par rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2589E:171a-12: me dang chu'i bar du h'um lam h'um zhes bya ba rnam par bkod la /
T02TD2589E:171a-13: de bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba las sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur pa las gser gyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom //
T02TD2589E:171a-14: de'i steng du h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal po ring ba bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:171a-15: de'i steng du kham las khang pa brtsegs ma rnam par bsam la /
T02TD2589E:171a-16: de'i dbus su sa bon 'di rnams las padma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i grangs snyed kyi gdan rnam par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:171a-17: yi ge hr'i: las thams cad du padma bsam //
T02TD2589E:171a-18: aa si aa zhes bya ba 'dis dbus su 'khor lo can gyi seng ge'i gdan shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su /
T02TD2589E:171a-23: 'di dag las grangs ji lta ba bzhin du glang po che dang /
T02TD2589E:171a-26: nam mkha' lding gi gdan rnams bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:171a-27: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig babs te /
T02TD2589E:171a-28: seng ge'i gdan la legs par 'dug ste /
T02TD2589E:171a-29: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi glang po che'i gdan la sogs pa nye bar gnas par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:171a-30: bdag nyid zhal bzhi pa byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas gnas par bsgom zhing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal te /
T02TD2589E:171a-31: 'di ni dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to /
T02TD2589E:171a-33: // / rje btsun 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul gyis mngon par sangs rgyas te /
T02TD2589E:171b-0: rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba ni mtshan tsam gyis gzhan du gyur pa yin @171b pas na log par khong du chud par mi bya'o //
T02TD2589E:171b-1: de nas dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang rang gi gnas su 'og nas bshad pa'i snying pos phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:171b-2: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2589E:171b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa'i rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la //
T02TD2589E:171b-4: aom badzra sa ma y'a dza dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pa /
T02TD2589E:171b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs rnams byon pa dang /
T02TD2589E:171b-6: zhabs la phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas ched du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod ma thag tu bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi la zhugs par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:171b-8: ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:171b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a ta banda nam ka ro mi ae ma'o //
T02TD2589E:171b-11: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi ;
T02TD2589E:171b-12: / dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pas mdzes //
T02TD2589E:171b-14: de nas nus pa ma lus pa'i //
T02TD2589E:171b-15: shugs kyis byin gyis brlabs te byung nas //
T02TD2589E:171b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs kar zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing /
T02TD2589E:171b-17: chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:171b-18: de la ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:171b-19: ae ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2589E:171b-20: rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min //
T02TD2589E:171b-21: rdul phran thams cad drangs rnyed kyi //
T02TD2589E:171b-22: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02TD2589E:171b-23: de nas rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams rang gi las la yang dag par sbyar nas //
T02TD2589E:171b-24: de rnams kyi thugs ka'i zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba bsams la /
T02TD2589E:171b-25: lan bdun rnam brgyad kyis bzlas brjod byas nas //
T02TD2589E:171b-26: de rnams nyid kyis bdag nyid mchod par gyur par bsams pa'am //
T02TD2589E:171b-27: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes mchog tu yang nga rgyal bya ste /
T02TD2589E:171b-28: 'di ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2589E:171b-29: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thal mo sbyar nas cung zad btung de /
T02TD2589E:172a-1: bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2589E:172a-2: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par bdag nyid tshigs su bcad pa 'dis brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:172a-3: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis //
T02TD2589E:172a-4: bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis //
T02TD2589E:172a-5: theg pa chen po rtogs pa yis //
T02TD2589E:172a-6: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02TD2589E:172a-7: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2589E:172a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
T02TD2589E:172a-9: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi //
T02TD2589E:172a-10: cho ga mchog ni bshad du gsol //
T02TD2589E:172a-11: de nas sngags pas yang dag par byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa rang gi snying pos mchod yon phul la //
T02TD2589E:172a-12: lha rnams kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:172a-13: spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas //
T02TD2589E:172a-14: snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i yid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas gnas la /
T02TD2589E:172a-15: 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:172a-16: deng ni bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2589E:172a-17: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2589E:172a-18: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02TD2589E:172a-19: gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02TD2589E:172a-20: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02TD2589E:172a-21: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02TD2589E:172a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2589E:172a-23: deng bdag skye bar the chom med //
T02TD2589E:172a-24: deng bdag nyid ma dam pa ste //
T02TD2589E:172a-25: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02TD2589E:172a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD2589E:172a-27: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD2589E:172a-28: de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la bdug spos phul te /
T02TD2589E:172a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:172a-30: ma lus phyogs nas bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2589E:172a-31: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2589E:172a-32: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02TD2589E:172a-33: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2589E:172a-34: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2589E:172a-35: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2589E:172a-37: rang gi dam tshig phyag rgyas bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2589E:172a-38: rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo steng du nam mkha' la gzhag ste /
T02TD2589E:172a-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la /
T02TD2589E:172b-0: rkang mthil nas yongs @172b su bzung ste /
T02TD2589E:172b-1: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02TD2589E:172b-2: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du rdo rjer gyur par lhag par mos la /
T02TD2589E:172b-3: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te bskor la /
T02TD2589E:172b-4: sna tshogs rdo rje de dag nyid sa la 'bri zhing bgegs thams cad skrod pa la brtson par 'gro bar bya'o//
T02TD2589E:172b-6: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
