T02TD2589E:172b-7: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2589E:172b-8: badzra sa tva zhes brjod nas //
T02TD2589E:172b-9: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2589E:172b-10: sngags pas rdo rje sems zlos shing //
T02TD2589E:172b-11: rdo rje lta bas bltas nas ni //
T02TD2589E:172b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi char //
T02TD2589E:172b-13: nyes ldan pa yang dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:172b-15: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas //
T02TD2589E:172b-16: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas snying ga dang /
T02TD2589E:172b-18: lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2589E:172b-19: g-yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje chen po gsor zhing //
T02TD2589E:172b-20: g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu gsil nas khro bas 'bar ba'i lus dang /
T02TD2589E:172b-21: bskor ba lan gsum byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:172b-22: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2589E:172b-23: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nga 'dri yis //
T02TD2589E:172b-24: lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02TD2589E:172b-25: gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi dgas dang /
T02TD2589E:172b-32: rig sngags grub pa rgan po dang /
T02TD2589E:172b-33: rgan mo g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig / deng 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig / gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo bo tshal pa brgyar rnam par 'gas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:172b-34: de nas lha la sogs pa de rnams sa de spangs nas song bar bsams la //
T02TD2589E:172b-35: rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa ltar byas la /
T02TD2589E:173a-0: kha'i steng du kha sbub ste @173a * //
T02TD2589E:173a-2: mthun pa'i rkang stabs la sogs pas mchongs la /
T02TD2589E:173a-3: h'um badzra bam h'um zhes brjod la byis pa gzhon nu bzhin du bdag po lnga'i gnas su yongs su bskor //
T02TD2589E:173a-4: de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2589E:173a-5: bdag po'i gnas su rkang pa gnyis dang /
T02TD2589E:173a-6: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2589E:173a-7: shar phyogs su bltas nas snying ga la reg par byas la /
T02TD2589E:173a-8: de bzhin du gnas nas lag pa gnyis thad kar brkyang ste /
T02TD2589E:173a-9: bdag nyid sna tshogs rdo rje chen po zhig aa zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2589E:173a-10: de nas khro bo'i lta bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
T02TD2589E:173a-11: ra ba dang dra ba rnams bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-12: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um zhes brjod la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas //
T02TD2589E:173a-13: g-yas pas rdo rje gsor te bgegs rnams gzhom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-14: yang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang bgegs bsreg pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2589E:173a-15: aom badzra dzva la aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bha nydza ra na h'um phat /
T02TD2589E:173a-16: rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas pa'i sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas la /
T02TD2589E:173a-17: mthe bo rdo rje ltar bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-18: aom badzra ne gri bandha bighn'an zhes bya bas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-19: rdo rje bsdams pa las mtho bo gnyis brkyang ste /
T02TD2589E:173a-20: mnyam par gzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-21: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang bas la bzhag nas 'og phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-22: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam dv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:173a-23: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-25: rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo gnyis brkyang la //
T02TD2589E:173a-26: mdzub mo gnyis mche bar byas bar byas pa 'di ni phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-27: yang na rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi steng du nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-29: rdo rje khu chur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /
T02TD2589E:173a-30: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bzhag pa ni //
T02TD2589E:173a-31: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:173a-32: rdo rje gtsug tor rdo rje dang ldan pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:173a-34: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog ltar mdud de /
T02TD2589E:173b-0: mdzub mo @173b gnyis rtse sprad la yongs su bzlog ste /
T02TD2589E:173b-2: yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:173b-4: rdo rje khu tshur mkhrig ma mdud pa bya ba ni zhags pa'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-5: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phogs bcing bar bya ste //
T02TD2589E:173b-6: aom badzra pra tam ke p'a tam ti ni ra ta /
T02TD2589E:173b-7: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bya //
T02TD2589E:173b-8: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar srin lag phye la mthe'u chung ba dan no //
T02TD2589E:173b-9: rdo rje nag mos byang phyogs bsrung bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:173b-10: hri badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2589E:173b-11: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya nyid khar bzhag la brtan par byas pas ni rdo rje nag mo'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-12: rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:173b-13: aom badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2589E:173b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-15: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcings la ra ba bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-17: yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis ra ba bya ste /
T02TD2589E:173b-18: h'um rdo rje bcing bas rdo rje ra ba bya'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-19: sngags ni badzra bandha zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-20: yang h'um aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis bya ste //
T02TD2589E:173b-21: de la phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no //
T02TD2589E:173b-22: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bskor bas //
T02TD2589E:173b-23: bskor ba 'di ni dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-24: khar bskor ba ni mtshams bcing ba'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-25: snying la 'bar ltar zhugs gyur cing //
T02TD2589E:173b-26: phyogs kun rdo rje me 'bar bas //
T02TD2589E:173b-27: nga yi'ang khro bo chen po yi //
T02TD2589E:173b-28: 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba bya //
T02TD2589E:173b-29: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2589E:173b-30: aom ma h'a badzra tsa kra aa dhi tishtha siddhya h'um zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pa yang byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2589E:173b-31: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-32: aom badzra mandala h'um dzdza: zhes bya ba 'dis gsang b'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor bkug la /
T02TD2589E:173b-34: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis gnyis dang /
T02TD2589E:173b-35: mthe bo rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2589E:173b-36: 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs shing bsgrub par 'gyur la //
T02TD2589E:173b-37: 'jig rten pa rnams kyang zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:174a-0: de la phur bu ni 'di yin te sor brgyad pa'i tshad tsam @174a * //
T02TD2589E:174a-1: gyis seng ldeng gi phur bu tsandan dmar pos byugs la srad bu dmar po dang /
T02TD2589E:174a-2: me tog dmar pos bcings la /
T02TD2589E:174a-3: stod khro bo'i gzugs la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa h'um las bskyed do //
T02TD2589E:174a-4: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bi ghnam bandha h'um phat ces bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshar gyis bzung ste /
T02TD2589E:174a-5: g-yas pas rdo rje tho ba bzung nas //
T02TD2589E:174a-6: des dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:174a-9: sanyts'u rn'a ya sanyts'u rn'a ya /
T02TD2589E:174a-10: badzra badzra bungga ra h'um phat ces bya ba rdo rje tho ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te me tog dmar po dang /
T02TD2589E:174a-11: srad bu dmar pos bcings la /
T02TD2589E:174a-13: des kun du brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:174a-15: bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2589E:174a-16: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag / dkyil 'khor bsrung ba thams cad la //
T02TD2589E:174a-17: rdo rje go chas go cha bya //
T02TD2589E:174a-18: de nas badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la gur kum dang /
T02TD2589E:174a-19: aa ka ru dang tsandan dang /
T02TD2589E:174a-21: gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri dang dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi sngags kyis btab la lha rnams kyi grangs ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02TD2589E:174a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la yid kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags te /
T02TD2589E:174a-23: dkyil 'khor de rnams su rnam par snang mdzad chen po yongs su gyur pas rje btsun 'jam dpal du gyur pa la sogs rang gi snying por bzhag la //
T02TD2589E:174a-24: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD2589E:174a-25: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa sngags kyis mngon par gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:174a-26: de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:174a-27: bam las rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa rtsa ba nag nog med pa /
T02TD2589E:174a-28: lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba /
T02TD2589E:174a-30: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i padma de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2589E:174a-31: der lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rang gi dam tig gis gnas pas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:174a-32: de las byung ba'i byang chub kyis mes kyi chus yongs su bkang bar bsam la //
T02TD2589E:174b-0: @174b rin po che sna lnga dang ldan pa me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i gsang ba'i snying po can mgul pa gos gtsang mas dkris la /
T02TD2589E:174b-1: aa mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa byas la /
T02TD2589E:174b-2: dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bzla zhing /
T02TD2589E:174b-3: aom badzro da ka h'um h'um zhes bya ba stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2589E:174b-4: spos la sogs pas mchod nas dkyil 'khor bskor te /
T02TD2589E:174b-5: bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar bzhag la dkyil 'khor gyi nyin mo dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor du yang bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2589E:174b-6: de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o//
T02TD2589E:174b-7: sang gri bya ghri krita ka rni ka ha sa de ba ste /
T02TD2589E:174b-8: sman rnams kun zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2589E:174b-9: lda po 'di dag shes par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:174b-10: 'bras kyi so ba mon sran gre'u dang /
T02TD2589E:174b-11: nas dang gro dang til dang lnga //
T02TD2589E:174b-12: 'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2589E:174b-13: las rnams kun la di dag gsungs //
T02TD2589E:174b-14: byi ru gser ni sa le sbram //
T02TD2589E:174b-15: dung dang mu tig nor bu ste /
T02TD2589E:174b-16: rin chen kun zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2589E:174b-17: snga po 'di dag shes par bya //
T02TD2589E:174b-18: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas //
T02TD2589E:174b-19: las thams cad ba'i bum pa la mngon par bsngags la /
T02TD2589E:174b-20: de bzhin du me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:174b-21: dkyil 'khor gyi sgor gzhag par bya //
T02TD2589E:174b-22: de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:174b-23: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02TD2589E:174b-25: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2589E:174b-26: a'a na ya go: bha ga b'an badzra h'um phat /
T02TD2589E:174b-27: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2589E:174b-28: mthe'u chung rtse mo mdud byas la /
T02TD2589E:174b-29: mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgrad ba dag /
T02TD2589E:174b-30: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag rgya 'di'o zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:174b-31: gsol ba 'di ltar gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:174b-32: ji srid dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa de srid du 'dir 'dug pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par bzlog tu gsol zhes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:174b-33: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste /
T02TD2589E:174b-34: dad cing gus par phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2589E:174b-35: slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:174b-36: de la re zhig slob ma legs par khrus byas shing //
T02TD2589E:174b-37: gos gtsang ma gon la lag na me tog thogs pas slob dpon la phyag bya ste /
T02TD2589E:175a-2: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2589E:175a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2589E:175a-4: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:175a-5: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2589E:175a-6: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2589E:175a-7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2589E:175a-8: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2589E:175a-9: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2589E:175a-10: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2589E:175a-11: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar h'um las rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2589E:175a-12: khu tshur g-yas pas bzung nas //
T02TD2589E:175a-13: rdo rje de snying gar snying po bzhag ste /
T02TD2589E:175a-14: su ra te sa ma ya stam ho badzra siddha ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2589E:175a-15: de nas de bzhin du de'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag la rdo rje las kyis nying po brjod nas /
T02TD2589E:175a-16: sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:175a-17: de nas ham badzra raksha zhes bya ba las go cha bskyed la /
T02TD2589E:175a-18: rkang ba'i mthar thig gi bar du go cha bskyon par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:175a-19: de nas rdo rje'i dris lag par dri sbyin /
T02TD2589E:175a-20: me tog gis me tog gtor zhing //
T02TD2589E:175a-21: bdug pas bdug pa gtul te /
T02TD2589E:175a-22: me mar nye bar bstan la re re zhing 'di skad ces brjod par byas te /
T02TD2589E:175a-23: deng nas brtsams te bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur pas nye bar gnas par gyis shig //
T02TD2589E:175a-24: de nas slob ma'i gtso bo la bos te /
T02TD2589E:175a-26: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis //
T02TD2589E:175a-27: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2589E:175a-28: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di //
T02TD2589E:175a-29: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD2589E:175a-30: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD2589E:175a-31: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD2589E:175a-32: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02TD2589E:175a-33: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag / de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2589E:175a-34: cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD2589E:175a-35: dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD2589E:175a-36: thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med bsnyes //
T02TD2589E:175a-37: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02TD2589E:175a-38: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2589E:175a-39: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD2589E:175a-40: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD2589E:175a-41: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:175a-42: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2589E:175a-43: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon //
T02TD2589E:175a-44: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02TD2589E:175a-45: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02TD2589E:175b-0: de nas cho ga @175b 'dis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02TD2589E:175b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2589E:175b-7: las kyi rigs su gzugs pa thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:175b-10: gsang sngags dang rig sngags thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2589E:175b-11: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyogs bu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:175b-15: padma dang las ki rigs su gyur pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:175b-18: gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na med pa'i so sor bshags pas so sor bshags pas so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:175b-19: ji ltar dang rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus par gtogs pa'i bsod nams thams cad mkhyen cing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:175b-20: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba de dag la bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul ma 'tshal lo ;
T02TD2589E:175b-21: / gang yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lo bskor ba la nan tan lhur mdzad pa de la sems can gyi khams ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2589E:175b-22: de skad lan gnyis lan gsum brjod do//
T02TD2589E:175b-23: de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma slob dpon du 'os pa yongs su bzung la /
T02TD2589E:175b-24: khas len par bya ba'i phyir bzhin bzang smos shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:175b-25: slob mas kya 'di skad brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:175b-26: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD2589E:175b-27: slob dpon bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02TD2589E:175b-28: tshul khrims ki ni bslab pa dang /
T02TD2589E:175b-29: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2589E:175b-30: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2589E:175b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi brtul zhugs che //
T02TD2589E:175b-32: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2589E:175b-33: skyabs gsum dag kang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2589E:175b-34: rdo rje dril bu phag rgya dang //
T02TD2589E:175b-35: sob dpon nyid ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2589E:175b-36: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la /
T02TD2589E:176a-2: rin chen rigs mchog yid 'ong ba'i //
T02TD2589E:176a-3: dam tshig dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2589E:176a-4: padma'i rigs chen dag pa dang /
T02TD2589E:176a-5: de bzhin las kyi rigs chen la //
T02TD2589E:176a-6: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2589E:176a-7: mgon pos bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02TD2589E:176a-8: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum mo //
T02TD2589E:176a-9: de nas sdom pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:176a-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing mu med pa thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:176a-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing mu med pa thams cad na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2589E:176a-12: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen mchog dang /
T02TD2589E:176a-14: don yod grub pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD2589E:176a-15: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02TD2589E:176a-16: byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du /
T02TD2589E:176a-17: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2589E:176a-18: byang chub tu ni nges pa yi //
T02TD2589E:176a-19: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD2589E:176a-20: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176a-21: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2589E:176a-22: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2589E:176a-23: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2589E:176a-24: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2589E:176a-25: de bzhin brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176a-26: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2589E:176a-27: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2589E:176a-28: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176a-29: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2589E:176a-30: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2589E:176a-31: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2589E:176a-32: de bzhin brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176a-33: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2589E:176a-34: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2589E:176a-35: deng nas bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD2589E:176a-36: sbyin pa rnam bzhir rab tu sbyin //
T02TD2589E:176a-37: byang chub chen po las byung ba //
T02TD2589E:176a-38: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02TD2589E:176a-39: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2589E:176a-40: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176a-41: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2589E:176a-42: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2589E:176b-0: @176b yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176b-1: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus pa bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176b-2: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2589E:176b-3: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02TD2589E:176b-4: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2589E:176b-5: bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2589E:176b-6: ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176b-7: ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176b-8: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2589E:176b-9: sems can mya ngan 'das gzhag bgyi //
T02TD2589E:176b-10: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o //
T02TD2589E:176b-12: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02TD2589E:176b-13: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2589E:176b-14: gzhan dag don ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2589E:176b-15: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
T02TD2589E:176b-16: zhes bya ba 'dis lan gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas la //
T02TD2589E:176b-17: 'dis smon lam 'debs su gzhug par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:176b-18: bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
T02TD2589E:176b-19: 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas gyur par shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
T02TD2589E:176b-20: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las dgrol //
T02TD2589E:176b-22: de nas chos bstan par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:176b-23: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2589E:176b-24: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD2589E:176b-25: khyod rnams 'dir ni dong bas na //
T02TD2589E:176b-26: rang byung skal ba chen po pa //
T02TD2589E:176b-27: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD2589E:176b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:176b-29: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02TD2589E:176b-30: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02TD2589E:176b-31: zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyi //
T02TD2589E:176b-32: rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa //
T02TD2589E:176b-33: spros pa kun dang bral ba ste //
T02TD2589E:176b-34: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
T02TD2589E:176b-35: las dang bya ba la sogs bral //
T02TD2589E:176b-36: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yis //
T02TD2589E:176b-37: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di yi //
T02TD2589E:176b-38: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:176b-39: de nas badzra ha sa ha sa zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i shing gi rtse mo dris bskus shing me tog gis brgyan pa //
T02TD2589E:176b-40: shing mngar po'o ma can las byung ba //
T02TD2589E:176b-41: tshad sor bcu gnyis pa 'cha' ru gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:176b-42: slob ma shar phyogs khang bltas te //
T02TD2589E:176b-43: mi smra bar ni so shing bca' //
T02TD2589E:176b-44: bcas zin nas mi dgos shing //
T02TD2589E:176b-46: so shing mdun du drang por dor //
T02TD2589E:176b-47: de tshe bdag la blta ba'am //
T02TD2589E:177a-2: des na dngos gru ba mchog ces bya //
T02TD2589E:177a-3: de bzhin shar du kha bltas na //
T02TD2589E:177a-4: de yi dngos grub 'bring du bshad //
T02TD2589E:177a-5: mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na //
T02TD2589E:177a-7: so shing dor ba brgya shig las //
T02TD2589E:177a-8: gal te thur ru kha bltas na //
T02TD2589E:177a-9: nges [*des?] ni nges par sa 'og gi / dngos grub 'di la the tshom med //
T02TD2589E:177a-10: de nas aom badzra nam zhes bya ba'i glu'i rdo rje yongs su bzlas pa'i chus 'thor 'thung bya ba'i phyir byin la //
T02TD2589E:177a-11: yang aom hr'i: bi shuddha sarba p'a na ni shts'a sya sho dha ya //
T02TD2589E:177a-12: sarba bi ka la pan ba na ya h'um zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas pa'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug pa'i phyir sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:177a-13: de nas ku sha gcig la aom badzra t'i kshna dham zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas pa byin la 'di ltar mgo bo'i gnas su zhog cig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2589E:177a-14: yang ku sha gzhan dag rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags mngon par bzlas la stan du bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:177a-16: rdo rje gnod sbyin mngon par bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa la yang yi ge brgya pa yang bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2589E:177a-17: dpung pa g-yon pa la bsrung ba bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2589E:177a-18: brtan par bya ba'i phyir bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:177a-19: aom badzra yaksha zhes bya bas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so //
T02TD2589E:177a-20: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya //
T02TD2589E:177a-22: badzra tva tva no pa tishtha /
T02TD2589E:177a-24: su to shyo me bha wa //
T02TD2589E:177a-25: su po shyo me bha wa //
T02TD2589E:177a-26: aa nu rakto me bha wa //
T02TD2589E:177a-29: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02TD2589E:177a-32: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me nunytsa /
T02TD2589E:177a-33: badzr'i wa ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva aada: zhes bya ba ni yi ge rgya ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2589E:177a-34: de nas bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig /
T02TD2589E:177a-35: sang gi nyin mi khyod rnams kyis thar chen po'i rang bzhin gyi grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur gyis //
T02TD2589E:177a-36: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam rnams kyang smos shig ces brjod la slar btang ngo //
T02TD2589E:177a-37: de nang par mtshan mo'i thar rmi lam gang dag mthong ba dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:177a-38: dri ba thos nas rmi lam bzang po'am /
T02TD2589E:177a-39: ngan 'dzem pa med par brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:177a-40: rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba ni //
T02TD2589E:177a-41: yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin //
T02TD2589E:177b-0: mchod @177b rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong //
T02TD2589E:177b-1: de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang /
T02TD2589E:177b-2: dge slong dag la chos nyan tam //
T02TD2589E:177b-3: yang na gzhan las nyan yang rung //
T02TD2589E:177b-4: chos ni rnam par dpyad pa dang /
T02TD2589E:177b-5: de bzhin glegs bam klog pa dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-6: rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-7: yang na dge slob gcig po mthong //
T02TD2589E:177b-8: deng dang 'grogs shing gtam zer dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-9: yang na dge slong dngos por gyur //
T02TD2589E:177b-10: gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-11: de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong //
T02TD2589E:177b-12: rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-13: de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-14: mdza' bo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02TD2589E:177b-15: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2589E:177b-16: rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob //
T02TD2589E:177b-17: de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-18: kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-19: 'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang /
T02TD2589E:177b-20: ri dang glang po dag kyang //
T02TD2589E:177b-21: mthong na yang ni bzang bar bsgrags //
T02TD2589E:177b-22: rgyal po dag ni mthong na shes //
T02TD2589E:177b-23: bde gshegs spyod dang mthun pa yi //
T02TD2589E:177b-24: dka' thub can dang bram ze dang /
T02TD2589E:177b-25: phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-26: ba dang rta ngang ngang pa dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-27: seng ge dang ni rigs rnams //
T02TD2589E:177b-28: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2589E:177b-29: bkra shis pa yi bya rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-30: gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-31: rin po che dang dngul dag dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-32: nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-33: mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-34: mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-35: 'bras bu rnams dang me tog dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-36: rgyan ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-37: kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-38: byis pa dag ni gzhon nu dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-39: bud med gzugs ni bzang po dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang //
T02TD2589E:177b-40: yang na thob cing reg smra dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-41: rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-42: rgyal por gyur cing 'byor ba dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-43: dmag dpon du ni gyur ba dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-44: g-yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-45: gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-46: lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang //
T02TD2589E:177b-47: theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon //
T02TD2589E:177b-48: de bzhin ri dang yang thog 'jigs //
T02TD2589E:177b-49: ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na dge //
T02TD2589E:177b-50: yam shing me lha sbyin sreg byed //
T02TD2589E:177b-51: bya ba bzang po dag la 'jug / chu la rkyal zhing rong las rgal //
T02TD2589E:178a-0: rkun po dag ni tshar gcod @178a * //
T02TD2589E:178a-2: stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-3: gyad stangs rdob cing 'gyed ba dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-4: rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-5: de bzhin rtsal dang spungs byed dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-6: bkra shis dag ni thams cad kyang //
T02TD2589E:178a-7: mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad //
T02TD2589E:178a-8: gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-9: dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-10: sgrub pa bzang po rtsom pa dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-11: de la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni //
T02TD2589E:178a-12: dge ba rnam pa du ma dag / blo yis rnam par dpyad bya zhing //
T02TD2589E:178a-13: de las zlog pa spang bar bya //
T02TD2589E:178a-15: mi dge ba ni mi 'grub bo //
T02TD2589E:178a-16: mi dge ba dag shes nas su //
T02TD2589E:178a-17: de dag mkhas pa spang bar bya //
T02TD2589E:178a-18: dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni //
T02TD2589E:178a-19: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma las //
T02TD2589E:178a-20: gsangs sngags dngos grub rnam gsum mo //
T02TD2589E:178a-22: mi dge ba la zhi ba yi //
T02TD2589E:178a-23: sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2589E:178a-24: ba yi mar las brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD2589E:178a-25: cho ga bzhin du zhi ba bya //
T02TD2589E:178a-26: de nas slob ma sdig bral zhing //
T02TD2589E:178a-27: rnam par dag pa de dag la //
T02TD2589E:178a-28: rjes su brtse ba bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:178a-29: ci 'dod par ni gzung bar bya //
T02TD2589E:178a-30: de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la //
T02TD2589E:178a-31: bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2589E:178a-32: de nas lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje bsams la //
T02TD2589E:178a-33: de'i lte bar yi ge hr'i: las padma rnam par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:178a-34: de'i steng du ram las ting nge 'dzin la nges par bzhugs pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa rnam par bsams la //
T02TD2589E:178a-35: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hr'i: rnam par bkod de /
T02TD2589E:178a-36: aom padmas ra sva ti sa ttyam ya sho dha ya h'um hr'i: ram dz'i zhes brjod la /
T02TD2589E:178a-37: lce byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:178a-38: de nas bdug spos phul la spyan drang ste /
T02TD2589E:178a-39: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2589E:178a-40: sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grangs dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-41: rdo rje rin chen rigs dag dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-42: de bzhin padma las kyi rigs //
T02TD2589E:178a-43: snying po sngags dang rigs rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-44: gang yang lha'i tshogs rnams kun //
T02TD2589E:178a-45: chos kyi byings la nges zhugs la //
T02TD2589E:178a-46: de rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2589E:178a-47: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2589E:178a-48: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:178b-0: @178b bdag ming 'di zhes pa bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2589E:178b-1: yo byad ci 'byor ba yis ni //
T02TD2589E:178b-2: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong khyer mchog / dkyil 'khor sang ni 'dri bar bgyid //
T02TD2589E:178b-3: thugs brtse nye bar bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2589E:178b-4: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2589E:178b-5: de nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo bteg la //
T02TD2589E:178b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams nyid dang shel lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:178b-7: kha sbyar byas la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:178b-8: de la kha sbyar bya ba'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te //
T02TD2589E:178b-9: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes bya ba'i dbus su steng dang 'og dang bar du dkri bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:178b-11: yang steng du bam lnga dang /
T02TD2589E:178b-12: 'og tu yang h'um lnga bsam ste //
T02TD2589E:178b-13: de ltar bdag dang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:178b-14: de nas de nyid du slob ma'i gtso bo dang //
T02TD2589E:178b-15: lhan cig bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i blo dang ldan pas nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:178b-16: nyi ma gnyis pa la nyi ma 'char kar legs par khrus byas shing rgyan thams cad brgyan par rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas spos kyi chus byugs la me tog la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas te //
T02TD2589E:178b-21: dkar po'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i tshon dris bsgos la //
T02TD2589E:178b-22: so so'i srad bu bcos te //
T02TD2589E:178b-23: rim pa bzhin du legs par bzhag la h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa'i rang gi sa bon rnams las byung ba'i srad bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams kyi gan du btang bas 'bar blta zhing lcags kyu rang gi lag pa na gnas pas drangs te //
T02TD2589E:178b-24: de rnams kyi srad bu dbu rnams legs par bkal la //
T02TD2589E:178b-25: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta /
T02TD2589E:178b-26: sarba dha rmma pa ra spha ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dha rmma aatahaya nata aa nu pra bishta sarba dharmma h'um zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:178b-27: de nas tsandan bzang po la sogs pas bskus pa'i gser gyi snod la sogs pa'i nang du legs par bzhag la //
T02TD2589E:178b-29: thig gdab pa'i sngags rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179a-0: de nas bdag po rnams kyang brgya rtsa brgyad @179a * //
T02TD2589E:179a-2: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:179a-3: phyag byas la lang nas yid kyi rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i rang gi snying ga nas grogs po rdo rje las h'um dzdza zhes bya ba 'dis phyung nas /
T02TD2589E:179a-4: ma dang ta las mig g-yas dang g-yon gnyis su nyi ma dang zla ba ser po snang ba bskyed la //
T02TD2589E:179a-5: yi ge dzas grogs po'i lag tu srad bu btang //
T02TD2589E:179a-6: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po srad bu bzung la phyi nas ci bder bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179a-7: mkhas pa dkyil 'khor theg gdab pa //
T02TD2589E:179a-8: shar dang nub kyi phyogs dag dang //
T02TD2589E:179a-9: byang dang lho yi phyogs dag tu ;
T02TD2589E:179a-10: / thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02TD2589E:179a-11: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi don phyir 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes yang dag par bskul la //
T02TD2589E:179a-12: zur bzhi pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis thams cad thig gdab par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:179a-13: chur dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma bldab sboms su sgo'i nyi shu cha'i tshad kyi srab bus dkyil 'khor thams cad rim pa 'dis thig gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:179a-14: de la dang por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la ;
T02TD2589E:179a-15: / yi ge dzdza las sgrub pa po'i grogs mchog de rdo rje las kyi gzugs su byas par btang la //
T02TD2589E:179a-16: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsams nas nub phyogs kyi sgor 'dug ste //
T02TD2589E:179a-17: shar phyogs su mngon par phyogs par byas la /
T02TD2589E:179a-18: lte ba'i phyogs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179a-19: de nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis song la byang du mngon par phyogs te gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179a-21: de bzhin du shar du blta ba dang //
T02TD2589E:179a-22: byang du blta ba bya ste //
T02TD2589E:179a-23: dbus kyis gzhir thig brkyang la //
T02TD2589E:179a-24: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod de gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179a-25: de nas me'i phyogs char 'dug la /
T02TD2589E:179a-26: byang phyogs su mngon par phyogs par phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi ngos su thig gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:179a-27: rlung gi phyogs su gnas nas //
T02TD2589E:179a-29: nub kyi phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:179a-30: de bzhin du 'dug la shar du mngon par phyogs te /
T02TD2589E:179b-0: @179b byang phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:179b-1: yang me'i phyogs char 'dug la nub tu mngon par phyogs te //
T02TD2589E:179b-2: lho'i ngos mngon par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-3: de bzhin du khyams kyi thig dang lha'i gnas kyi thig gdab par shes par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:179b-4: thams cad du'ang slob dpon dang //
T02TD2589E:179b-5: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog g-yas nas bskor ba'i tshul gyi 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-6: de nas me'i mtshams su 'dug la rlung gi phyogs kyi bar du bre bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-7: yang bden bral gyi phyogs su 'dug la //
T02TD2589E:179b-8: dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi bar du srad bu bre bar bya ste //
T02TD2589E:179b-9: thams cad du yang aom badzra sa ma ya s'u dzdzam m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD2589E:179b-10: dza: dza: zhes bya ba'i dza gsum dang /
T02TD2589E:179b-11: sgrub pa po'i grogs mchog gis srad bu drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-12: de la sgo thams cad ni brgyad cha'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-15: lha'i gnas ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad do //
T02TD2589E:179b-16: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni khyams kyi phyed kyi tshad do //
T02TD2589E:179b-17: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pas cha bcur gsungs pa dang //
T02TD2589E:179b-18: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba las chad gur gsungs pa dang //
T02TD2589E:179b-19: bcu drug cha dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2589E:179b-20: cha dgu dag tu bsngags pa yin //
T02TD2589E:179b-22: de la sgro khyud ni sgo'i tshad do //
T02TD2589E:179b-23: de'i phyed ni sgo 'gram dang sgo logs kyi tshad do //
T02TD2589E:179b-24: de'i phyed ni tshon sna lnga'i sa'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-25: khyams dang lha'i gnas ni sgo'i phyed du brtag par bya'o zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i rim pas phyed pa ste 'gal ba med do //
T02TD2589E:179b-26: rta babs kyi tshad ni thams cad du yang sgo'i sum pa lnga ba yin no //
T02TD2589E:179b-27: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-29: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni zur bzhi sgo bzhi pa la rta babs med pa legs par thig btab nas //
T02TD2589E:179b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng gi phur bu smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs la //
T02TD2589E:179b-31: stod rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bu h'um las bskyed nas //
T02TD2589E:179b-32: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bi ghn'ana bandha ya h'um phat ces bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:179b-33: de nas de la btags pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba'i thig btab pa //
T02TD2589E:180a-1: ba brgyad kyi thig kyang de bzhin du gdab par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:180a-2: cha mnyam pa la shar phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig lho'i phyogs kyi char 'dug la byang du bltas te thig gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:180a-3: nub phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni byang phyogs kyi char la 'dug la lho phyogs su blta'o //
T02TD2589E:180a-4: byang phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni nub phyogs kyi char 'dug la shar phyogs su blta'o //
T02TD2589E:180a-5: lho phyogs cha'i ka ba'i thig ni shar phyogs kyi char 'dug la //
T02TD2589E:180a-6: nub phyogs su mngon par bltas te thig gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:180a-7: dbus kyi phur bu la btags pa'i srad bu nyid kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD2589E:180a-8: bskor phyogs su phyi'i rdo rje rigs kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor zlum po dang //
T02TD2589E:180a-10: khor yug chen po dag gi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:180a-11: dkyil 'khor 'dri bar byed pa na gal te 'ga' zhig 'gron tshol zhing bgegs bskyed par byed dam //
T02TD2589E:180a-12: bdag nyid bgegs byed par gyur na dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du grog mkhar gyi sa las lha la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan bya ste //
T02TD2589E:180a-13: brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan rang gi phyogs gnas pa la ai las brgya byin mdog ser po dang //
T02TD2589E:180a-14: de bzhin du me lha la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ram las me lha mdog dmar po //
T02TD2589E:180a-15: aom h'am las gshin tu rje nag po /
T02TD2589E:180a-16: kam las srin po nag po //
T02TD2589E:180a-17: bam las chu lha dkar po //
T02TD2589E:180a-18: yam las rlung lha dung ka //
T02TD2589E:180a-19: phat las lus ngan po ser po //
T02TD2589E:180a-20: sum bha zhes bya ba las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la rdo rje lcags kyus la sogs pas bkug ste bcug la bcings te //
T02TD2589E:180a-21: dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab bo //
T02TD2589E:180a-22: shin tu yang yun ring du bgags med par byed 'dod pas sas ngag ba par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:180a-23: de lta na yang gal te bgegs byed na //
T02TD2589E:180a-24: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bar byas la //
T02TD2589E:180a-25: 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas bcug la bcings te /
T02TD2589E:180a-26: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la //
T02TD2589E:180a-27: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te //
T02TD2589E:180a-28: h'um bam h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa spel ba'i tshul gyis g-yas rkyang ba'i gnas pa 'dug la //
T02TD2589E:180a-29: bgegs byed pa sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te //
T02TD2589E:180b-0: de la phyag rgya 'phangs la nam mkha'i khams @180b thams cad du sprod pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrugs pa dang //
T02TD2589E:180b-1: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis kyang rkang pos brdeg cing bsnun pas sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas par gyur pa bsams te //
T02TD2589E:180b-2: des ni de dag bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:180b-3: yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
T02TD2589E:180b-4: de'i 'og tu aa las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas //
T02TD2589E:180b-5: ham las 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yid kyis thugs ka nas phyung ste //
T02TD2589E:180b-6: badzra ham shandha zhes yid la brjod la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du rlung gi phyogs su dris thig le bdun byas te //
T02TD2589E:180b-7: theg le re re zhing yam re re'i nang du chud par byas la //
T02TD2589E:180b-8: dbus ma yang yam dang thig le bdun dang ldan par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:180b-9: thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun par ri dags la zhon pa //
T02TD2589E:180b-10: mdog nag po 'phags pa mi g-yo bas //
T02TD2589E:180b-11: zhags pas bcings nas bkug par gyur par bsams la //
T02TD2589E:180b-12: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la //
T02TD2589E:180b-13: lhag ma rlung lha drug po ni de la 'khor du bskor te kun nas gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:180b-14: de nas kham phor ma las ri rab tu bsams la //
T02TD2589E:180b-15: de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge ma nyid las thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs pa //
T02TD2589E:180b-16: dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge h'um byung ba dang //
T02TD2589E:180b-17: mtshams rnams su mdung rtse rnam pa bsams la //
T02TD2589E:180b-18: de bzhin du badzra ham bandha zhes brjod de kham phor de rnams kyi ji skad du bshad pa'i yam bdun dgab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:180b-19: de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du aom las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te /
T02TD2589E:180b-20: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g-yon brkyang bas ri rab mnan nas ril gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te //
T02TD2589E:180b-21: de lta bus ni rlung thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:180b-22: de nas chu'i bgegs bzlog pa bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:180b-23: ham las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g-yo bar bdag nyid bskyed la //
T02TD2589E:180b-25: ba lang gi lci bas ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas //
T02TD2589E:180b-27: ram la me'i snying po yod pa bskyed la //
T02TD2589E:181a-0: @181a * // lcags kyu'i rang bzhin can bskyed de /
T02TD2589E:181a-1: lag pa g-yon pas bzung la //
T02TD2589E:181a-2: lag pa g-yas pas lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2589E:181a-3: zhags pas drangs nas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste /
T02TD2589E:181a-4: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas btsir la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:181a-5: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'i /
T02TD2589E:181a-6: tsanna ma h'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um dra ta hom mom zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:181a-8: lan tshva la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la mes gdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:181a-9: de ltar mes gdungs pas de nyid gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med de //
T02TD2589E:181a-10: tshangs pa'am ni brgya byin dag /
T02TD2589E:181a-11: de yi mod la myur du 'tshig / ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2589E:181a-12: las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis 'di'i gsang sngags khri bzlas la'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2589E:181a-14: yang na aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'di yang gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD2589E:181a-16: phyag gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:181a-17: phyag g-yon gnyis na zhags pa dang gtun shing bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:181a-19: khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du gang bar gnas par rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:181a-20: mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2589E:181a-21: sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsams pas 'khrugs pa dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o /
T02TD2589E:181a-22: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02TD2589E:181a-23: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:181a-24: de lta na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na /
T02TD2589E:181a-25: kham phor so ma btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang /
T02TD2589E:181a-26: dud khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02TD2589E:181a-28: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas gsang sngags bris la yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas kham phor kha sbyar te /
T02TD2589E:181a-29: de'i nang du bzhag la me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la /
T02TD2589E:181a-31: sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:181a-32: de nas de dag 'jigs pa'am 'chi ba'am mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:181b-0: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi @181b sbyor bas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas la /
T02TD2589E:181b-1: mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi ba'i tshad tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug nas bcings te /
T02TD2589E:181b-2: gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab po //
T02TD2589E:181b-3: de nas me'i tsha bzhi bar 'dod na /
T02TD2589E:181b-4: me'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2589E:181b-5: de'i steng du padma'i dbus na gnas pa'i 'khor lo //
T02TD2589E:181b-6: de'i steng du bam nyid las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang /
T02TD2589E:181b-7: kunda ltar dkar ba bzhugs te /
T02TD2589E:181b-8: mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu bo bzhi 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyun dgus phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:181b-10: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor gyi ri rab dang /
T02TD2589E:181b-11: phur bu yang dag par bsrungs la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2589E:181b-12: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan dag gis de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la //
T02TD2589E:181b-13: rdo rje bcing bas rdo rje'i dra ba bya'o //
T02TD2589E:181b-14: yang na chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa tsam las byung ba yin la /
T02TD2589E:181b-15: bgegs rnam skyang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas bdag med pa'i mes thal bar byas nas //
T02TD2589E:181b-16: de'i 'og tu phyi dang nang gi bgegs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:181b-17: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la gnas pa'i phur bu yi ge h'um bzhis phung la phur bu'i bu ga tshon sna lngas mnyam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:181b-18: srad bu ni tshon dkar po dri zhim po la sbags nas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:181b-19: de ltar legs par thig gdab nas mig g-yas dang g-yon gnyis su yi ge hri las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2589E:181b-20: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas nas sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02TD2589E:181b-21: de yang hri las byung ba'i nyi ma dang zla ba dag / mig la rnam par bkod de sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02TD2589E:181b-22: khro bo'i lta bar gnas pas kun bltas nas /
T02TD2589E:181b-23: de nas sgo rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD2589E:181b-24: de nas srad bu la bshad pa'i kha dog gi rim pas tshon rtsi rnams blangs la /
T02TD2589E:181b-25: h'um h'am hr'i: aa: aa zhes bya ba 'di rnams las bskyed de /
T02TD2589E:181b-26: rang gi rigs kyi ngo bor bsams la /
T02TD2589E:182a-0: aom dzra ci tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba d'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas stong rta brgyad mngon par bzlas brjod @182a * //
T02TD2589E:182a-2: de la de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:182a-3: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga yi //
T02TD2589E:182a-4: mdzub mo'i rtse mo rab sbyar ba //
T02TD2589E:182a-5: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad la //
T02TD2589E:182a-6: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02TD2589E:182a-8: rdo rje padma'i phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:182a-9: de la 'bar ba'i lta ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:182a-10: rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig //
T02TD2589E:182a-11: mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni /
T02TD2589E:182a-12: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su gsungs //
T02TD2589E:182a-14: de nas tshon mang por bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:182a-15: bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs pa bya ste /
T02TD2589E:182a-16: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams la sangs rgyas rnams sems can rjes su dpag pas chags par mdzad pa'i bden pa des tshon rtsi rnams 'bar bar gyur cig ces bya'o //
T02TD2589E:182a-17: de nas yang dag par mchod la //
T02TD2589E:182a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas tshon dkar po blangs la /
T02TD2589E:182a-19: aom badzra r'a ga sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod de //
T02TD2589E:182a-20: dbus su bkye la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su song ste /
T02TD2589E:182a-21: de bzhin du sngags zlos shing nang du gnas la //
T02TD2589E:182a-22: g-yas na sa bskor ba'i rim pas mnyam zhing rgyun ma 'chad par g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu chur chen pos dang po tshon bkye la //
T02TD2589E:182a-24: de la rim pa 'dis bkye bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:182a-25: sngo po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02TD2589E:182a-26: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste /
T02TD2589E:182a-27: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2589E:182a-28: gzhan dag mar kata lta bur bshad //
T02TD2589E:182a-29: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
T02TD2589E:182a-30: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02TD2589E:182a-31: shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste //
T02TD2589E:182a-32: lho ni ser po legs sbyar ba ;
T02TD2589E:182a-33: / nub kyi char ni dmar po ste /
T02TD2589E:182a-34: byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan //
T02TD2589E:182a-35: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid de //
T02TD2589E:182a-36: shel ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02TD2589E:182a-37: rdo rje dril bu rtag 'chang zhing //
T02TD2589E:182a-38: shin tu mnyam bzhag legs par bri //
T02TD2589E:182a-39: gsang sngags de nyid yongs bzlas shing //
T02TD2589E:182a-40: tshon gyis thig ni yongs su dgang //
T02TD2589E:182a-41: nang gi 'khor lo tshon dkar pos bri'o //
T02TD2589E:182a-42: gnyis pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni tshon sna lngas bri'o //
T02TD2589E:182a-43: gsum pa ni tshon gyi phye ma lngas bri'o //
T02TD2589E:182a-44: phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni tshon dkar po dang /
T02TD2589E:182b-0: @182b khor yug chen po'i thig ni dkar po'am //
T02TD2589E:182b-2: de nas phyi rol kun du dri zhim po'i dris nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2589E:182b-3: me tog gi sil ma gtor te /
T02TD2589E:182b-4: yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa'i chus dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2589E:182b-5: phyi dang nang du bcas pa bsang gtor bya'o / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'khor lo'i phag rgya kha'i dbus su bzhag la /
T02TD2589E:182b-6: aom badzra tsakra h'um zhes bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2589E:182b-7: de nas phyi dro'i dus su glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams dang /
T02TD2589E:182b-8: me tog dang spos la sogs pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed pa dang ;
T02TD2589E:182b-9: ci 'dod pa de bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:182b-10: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur po'i dam tshig sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa dmar skya sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol te /
T02TD2589E:182b-11: yi ge phyin ci ma log pas kha sbyar gyi sdom pa gsal bar snang la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bkug la bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas te /
T02TD2589E:182b-12: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa byas la //
T02TD2589E:182b-13: byin gyis brlab cing mnyes par byas nas gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:182b-14: de bzhin du thams cad la'ang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:182b-15: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'ana dzny'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shvar //
T02TD2589E:182b-16: ma h'a pa tsa ga ga na /
T02TD2589E:182b-17: aa ma la su pa ri shuddh dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: zhes bya ba 'dis dbus su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol te /
T02TD2589E:182b-19: aom h'um hr'i: zhes bya ba'i snying pos bzhugs su gsol te /
T02TD2589E:182b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi thun mong yin no //
T02TD2589E:182b-21: yang na rang rang gi sngags kyis bzhugs su gsol te /
T02TD2589E:182b-22: de la aom bhr'um aushn'i sha /
T02TD2589E:182b-23: shar gyi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la'o //
T02TD2589E:182b-24: aom te dzo ra shi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:182b-26: aom ma ma ma ma h'um /
T02TD2589E:182b-30: aom gle sha aashta ni h'um phat /
T02TD2589E:182b-34: audgha ta aashn'i sha dhu na dhu na h'um /
T02TD2589E:182b-38: aom dzva la dzva la aushn'i sha /
T02TD2589E:183a-3: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes bya ba'i snying pos mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2589E:183a-6: don yod par grub pa ste /
T02TD2589E:183a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:183a-12: aom rdo rje rin chen no //
T02TD2589E:183a-13: aom rdo rje gzi brjid do //
T02TD2589E:183a-14: tram rdo rje rgyal mtshan no //
T02TD2589E:183a-22: h'um rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02TD2589E:183a-23: bam rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02TD2589E:183a-26: sgo rnams su dza: rdo rje lcags skyu'o //
T02TD2589E:183a-28: bam rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02TD2589E:183a-30: aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD2589E:183a-31: rdo rje shugs kyis byung la /
T02TD2589E:183a-32: gnyis pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2589E:183a-33: aom bh'u mi bi sho dha ni sarba aartha pa ri p'u ra ni bam tam zhes bya bas shar dus rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:183a-34: aom sarba p'a ra mi t'a aartha pa ri p'u ra ni ao pra h'um ham zhes bya bas lho phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dgod do //
T02TD2589E:183a-35: aom sarba ba shi te hram ru h'um zhes bya bas nub tu dbang thams cad dgod do //
T02TD2589E:183a-36: aom kha sa m'a: sarba dharma kham zhes bya bas byang du gzungs thams cad dgod do //
T02TD2589E:183a-37: de nyid du sgo rnams su dza: rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02TD2589E:183a-39: bam rdo rje lcags sgog go //
T02TD2589E:183a-41: mtshams su ho rdo rje sgeg mo'o //
T02TD2589E:183a-42: l'a rdo rje phreng ba ma'o //
T02TD2589E:183a-45: rdo rje shugs kyis rgal la rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor du shar nas kun du bzang po la sogs pa dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:183a-46: aom sa manta bha dra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-48: aom aa ksha ya karmma a'a bar na bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-49: ku kshi ha ra dz'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-50: aom kha a'a k'a sha garbha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-51: lho phyogs su aom ga ga n'a g'a na dz'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-52: aom rtan b'a ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-53: aom s'a ga ra ma ti sam ha ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-56: aom hr'i: aom sth'a me sth'a me ma h'a sth'e me ba ti sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:183a-57: tsandre su tsa nbre bya ba lo gi te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-58: aom dzva la ni ma h'a dzva la ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183a-60: aom aa mri te pra bhe aa mri ta ba ti h'um /
T02TD2589E:183b-0: aom bra ti @183b bha ne bra ti bha na ku te h'um /
T02TD2589E:183b-1: aom sarba sho ka ta mo ni ra ha ta ma hi h'um /
T02TD2589E:183b-2: aom sarba ni ba ra na bishkam bi na h'um /
T02TD2589E:183b-7: aom aa mri ta kunda li bighna nta ka h'um /
T02TD2589E:183b-11: grihn'a pa la ya grihn'a pa la ya h'um a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'an bidya r'a dza h'um phat //
T02TD2589E:183b-12: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:183b-13: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um /
T02TD2589E:183b-15: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hr'i sarba dushta sa ma ya mutta bra bha sta tsakra h'um phat //
T02TD2589E:183b-29: sgo'i mtshams kyi le'u co rnams su'o //
T02TD2589E:183b-30: rdo rje shugs kyis phyung la /
T02TD2589E:183b-31: phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du tshangs pa la sogs aom dang sv'a h'a gnyis par du ming dang ldan par dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:183b-32: aom bra hma ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:183b-34: zhes thams cad la sbyar ro //
T02TD2589E:183b-35: de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la //
T02TD2589E:183b-36: lha'i 'khor lo phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bsgoms nas //
T02TD2589E:183b-37: de'i gsang sngags brjod la dkyil 'khor len bdun bskor ba bya ste /
T02TD2589E:183b-38: rdo rje dril bu dkrol la me tog sngon po'i phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2589E:183b-39: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas bskor ba lan gsum byas la nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la /
T02TD2589E:183b-41: gar byas nas blangs la rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:183b-42: de'i 'og rdo rje slob dpon mnyam par gzhag pas dbus su 'dug la yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:183b-43: aom badzra audbha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um //
T02TD2589E:183b-44: 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje mdzu ba mo legs pa ni //
T02TD2589E:183b-45: sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02TD2589E:183b-46: rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni //
T02TD2589E:183b-47: sgo 'byed pa yi mchog yin no //
T02TD2589E:183b-48: de'i 'og tu phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa bzung bar byas la //
T02TD2589E:183b-49: gos dmar po la rdo rje sems dpa' dang gtsug tor yongs su bzlas pa'i se'u ka bcings te /
T02TD2589E:184a-2: rdo rje go chas go gon zhing ze'u ka la sogs pa bcings pa'i slob dpon 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la //
T02TD2589E:184a-3: aom badzra sa ma ya pra be sha mi zhes brjod do //
T02TD2589E:184a-4: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid 'jug par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:184a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2589E:184a-7: phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la //
T02TD2589E:184a-8: rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong g-yogs dgrol chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2589E:184a-9: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2589E:184a-14: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la //
T02TD2589E:184a-15: bcom ldan 'das las blang bar bya zhing //
T02TD2589E:184a-16: de kho na nyid dang chos kyi sdom pa dang /
T02TD2589E:184a-17: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs rnams kyang blangs nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:184a-18: sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de //
T02TD2589E:184a-19: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen por mthong na /
T02TD2589E:184a-20: manydzu gho sha ham zhes rang gi ming brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:184a-21: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ma lus par bsgrub ra bya'o / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs ji lta bur ni bka' nod do //
T02TD2589E:184a-22: de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod //
T02TD2589E:184a-23: de nas rdo rje sgrub par bgyi //
T02TD2589E:184a-24: zhes bya bas sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:184a-26: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam par gzhag ste /
T02TD2589E:184a-27: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2589E:184a-28: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2589E:184a-29: rjod rje se gol brdab bgyis la //
T02TD2589E:184a-30: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:184a-31: aom badzra sa ma ya dza dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:184a-32: de nas mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi //
T02TD2589E:184a-33: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2589E:184a-34: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2589E:184a-35: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02TD2589E:184a-37: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184a-38: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184a-39: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184a-40: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184a-41: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184a-43: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-3: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-5: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-7: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-8: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-10: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-11: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-12: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2589E:184b-14: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rang rang gi sgo nas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:184b-17: dbang du bya ba byas la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2589E:184b-19: dri shya ho zhes brjod do //
T02TD2589E:184b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho nya ham /
T02TD2589E:184b-21: de nas rang gi gsang sngags brjod do //
T02TD2589E:184b-22: de ltar na grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:184b-23: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bstan par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:184b-24: dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni //
T02TD2589E:184b-25: rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na //
T02TD2589E:184b-26: de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yi //
T02TD2589E:184b-27: bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya //
T02TD2589E:184b-28: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa las byung ba ni gtsug gtor rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:184b-29: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag la ral gri lta bur bzhag //
T02TD2589E:184b-30: mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la mthe bo'i steng du bcag nas gzhag pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:184b-31: mthe'u chung srin lag khu tshur bya //
T02TD2589E:184b-32: gung mo dag ni rab tu brkyang //
T02TD2589E:184b-33: mdzub mo mthe bo sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2589E:184b-34: 'khor los sgyur nyid ster byed pa'o //
T02TD2589E:184b-35: rab tu brkyang nas sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2589E:184b-36: gtsug tor dkar po yin par bshad //
T02TD2589E:184b-37: srin lag mthe bong legs sbyar zhing //
T02TD2589E:184b-38: gung mo gnyis ni rnam par brtag //
T02TD2589E:184b-39: gzi brjid phung po de bzhin du //
T02TD2589E:184b-40: ral gri sbyar ba rnam rgyal yin //
T02TD2589E:184b-41: de nyid rgyal ba zhes grags pa'i //
T02TD2589E:184b-42: rdo rje dkrol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2589E:184b-43: khu tshur nang du ldan byas la //
T02TD2589E:184b-46: mi bskyed pa yis la reg //
T02TD2589E:184b-47: de bzhin mchog sbyin rin chen 'byung //
T02TD2589E:184b-48: bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med //
T02TD2589E:184b-49: don yod grub kyi mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02TD2589E:185a-1: mo gnyis ni sbyar ba mchog //
T02TD2589E:185a-2: mthe bong mthe chung rab tu brkyang //
T02TD2589E:185a-3: lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba dang //
T02TD2589E:185a-4: legs so zhes ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD2589E:185a-5: dbus ma rin chen rdo rje mchog //
T02TD2589E:185a-6: mdzub mo rnams phye gzi brjod mchog //
T02TD2589E:185a-7: rgyal mtshan gsan sus nges sbyar dang //
T02TD2589E:185a-8: bzhad pa'i dus su rab sbyar te //
T02TD2589E:185a-9: rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che //
T02TD2589E:185a-10: gung mo padma rab bskum pa'o //
T02TD2589E:185a-13: kha 'byed gyur pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-14: rdo rje smra ba 'ba' zhig gi //
T02TD2589E:185a-15: las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-16: sna tshogs rdo rje gar byed pa'o //
T02TD2589E:185a-17: go cha gon pa'i tshul dag ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-18: rdo rje srung ba'i mche ba gnyis //
T02TD2589E:185a-19: rnam gtsigs rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi //
T02TD2589E:185a-20: khu tshur bsdus pa khu tshur gyi //
T02TD2589E:185a-21: thal mo khong stong sbyar nas ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-22: mthe bong gnyis ni gzhi bas nas su //
T02TD2589E:185a-23: mdzub gnyis mig gi dbyibs 'drar byas //
T02TD2589E:185a-24: sangs rgyas spyan ni yin par bshad //
T02TD2589E:185a-25: mdzub mo mthe bo rdo rje nyid //
T02TD2589E:185a-26: m'a ma k'i yi yin par bshad //
T02TD2589E:185a-27: padma'i thal mo gos dkar mo //
T02TD2589E:185a-28: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba //
T02TD2589E:185a-30: mthe'u chung gnyis ni legs mdud la /
T02TD2589E:185a-31: mdzub mo dag ni lcags kyur sbyar //
T02TD2589E:185a-32: de nyid zhags pa lta bu dang //
T02TD2589E:185a-33: lcags sgrog 'dra ba dag tu'ang brtag //
T02TD2589E:185a-34: bzhi pa rdo rje dril bur ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-35: srin lag nang bcug khu tshur ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-36: mdzub mo gnyis ni legs sbyar ba //
T02TD2589E:185a-37: rdo rje chen po zhes grags te /
T02TD2589E:185a-38: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar sbyar //
T02TD2589E:185a-40: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la //
T02TD2589E:185a-41: mdzub mo gnyis rgyal tu bkug ste /
T02TD2589E:185a-42: rin po che 'dra bar gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-43: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:185a-44: sor mo thams cad brkyang la /
T02TD2589E:185a-45: padma lta bur gzhag pa ni dbang thams cad kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:185a-46: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid ni gzungs thams cad kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:185a-47: rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag la //
T02TD2589E:185a-48: rdo rje sgeg mo yin par bshad //
T02TD2589E:185a-49: spyi bo'i gnas su thal sbyar ba //
T02TD2589E:185a-50: rdo rje phreng bar rnam par bsgrags //
T02TD2589E:185a-51: thal mo sbyar ba khar bud pa //
T02TD2589E:185a-52: rdo rje glu ma yin par bshad //
T02TD2589E:185a-53: gar brdung ba yi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2589E:185a-54: bskor nas 'jog par gar gyi yin //
T02TD2589E:185a-55: padmo'i thal mo thur du ldugs //
T02TD2589E:185b-0: @185b thal mo spyi bor 'jog pa ni me tog gi'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-1: snying gar mthe bong bsnyams pa ni mar me'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-2: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa ni byugs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-3: gzugs kyi phyag rgya ni steng du lag pa gnyis rab tu brkyang ba'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-4: rna ba'i thad kar brkyang pa ni sgra'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-5: dri rnam par bkod pa'i tshul ni dri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-6: khar thal mo sbyar ba ni ro'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-7: nam mkha' la reg pa'i tshul ni reg gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-8: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste /
T02TD2589E:185b-9: rin po che ltar byas pa ni kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-10: thal mo legs par brkyang nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa lta bu ni blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-11: sa gnon gyi phyag rgya nyid ni sa'i snying po'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-12: mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug la /
T02TD2589E:185b-13: ral gri ltar byas pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-14: gar brdung ba'i tshul gyis rin po che'i rdo rje snying gar gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2589E:185b-16: lag pa gnyis legs par brkyang pa ni phyag na rin chen gyi'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-17: lag pa gnyis mtsho'i rlabs ltar bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i blo gro skyi'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-18: rdo rje rtse lang ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snying po'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-19: gar byed pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang la padma ltar bya ba ni phyag na padma'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-20: ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul du lag pa gnyis brkyang ba ni ma thu chen thob pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-21: mthe bo dang mdzub mo zla ba 'dra bar byas pa ni zla 'od kyi'o//
T02TD2589E:185b-22: 'od 'phro ba gtong ba lta bu ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-23: dbang bskur ba ster ba'i tshul ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-24: se gol brdebs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni sbobs [?] pa rnam par brtsegs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-25: thal mo sbyar ba 'byed pa ni mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-26: ral gri brdebs pa'i tshul du byed cing gnas pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:185b-27: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis gzhibs la srin lag gnyis kyi g-yas pa'i mdzub mos g-yon pa'i srin lag dang /
T02TD2589E:185b-28: g-yon pa'i mdzub mos g-yas pa srin lag bzung la zlum par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:185b-29: mthe bong gnyis mngon par phyogs par byas la //
T02TD2589E:185b-30: kha'i tshul du gzhag pa ni gshin rje gshed kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-0: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa @186a * //
T02TD2589E:186a-1: las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la //
T02TD2589E:186a-2: lag pa g-yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar mdud nas mdzub mo gzhi bas te bsgreng ba las ldog nas dpral bar gzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-4: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos mthe bo chung gi sen mo mnan nas dpung mgo'i drud du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du byas te gzhag pa ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya nyid ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-6: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams dbus su 'bar bltar byas nas mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ba ni rdo rje ltar me 'bar ba'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-7: rdo rje bcing ba las mdzub mo gnyis dam du mdud la mthe bong gung mo rdo rje ltar dpral bar gzhag pa ni khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-8: sna tshogs rdo rje ba dan gsum pa bsgreng ba ni rta mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-9: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lag ba gcig mdung rtse gsum pa ltar byas la //
T02TD2589E:186a-10: mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan pa dbang ldan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-11: de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa steg ste //
T02TD2589E:186a-12: rdo rje 'dra bar byas la ni brgya byin gyi phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-13: aom zhes bya ba'i lag pa la mthe bos dbus su bzhag pa ni me lha'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-14: mdzub mo dang mthe bo sbyar nas dbyig par byas pa ni gshin rje'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-15: de nyid las 'khor lo lta bur byas nas gzhag pa ni khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-16: lag pa gcig na thod pa thogs pa lta bu ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-17: sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni srin po rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-18: mdzub mo dang mthe bo sbyar ba zhags pa ltar bya ba ni chu lha'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-19: mdzub mo dang grung mo gnyis rgyal mtshan ltar bsgreng pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste rlung lha'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-20: gung mo gcig tu bsgrengs nas dbyig pa ltar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni lus dan po'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-21: mchod sbyin thogs kyi phyag rgya ni tshangs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-22: mdung gi phyag rgya ni drag po'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-23: glang po'i sna ni tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-24: bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor lta bu ni zla ba'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186a-25: 'od zer stong 'gyed pa lta bu lag pa gnyis kyis bstan pa ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-0: @186b pi wang brdung zhing glu len pa lta bu ni dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-1: rdza rnga brdung ba lta bu ni dga' byed dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-2: 'khar dkrol thogs pa lta bu ni mi'am ci'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-3: rtag par rnga brdung ba lta bu ni rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-4: lag pa gnyis gdengs ka ltar bya ba ni klu rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-5: gzhan dag ni phyag rgya chen po nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2589E:186b-6: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje bsgoms nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-7: lce la yi ge hri las padma de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje //
T02TD2589E:186b-8: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar po bsams la //
T02TD2589E:186b-9: sngags kyi yi ge thams cad brjod pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-10: aa las sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor bsams la gar las byung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2589E:186b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa la mchod pa la 'jug par byed pa rdo rje khu tshur bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-12: phyag rgya chen po yang ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su mthun par sa bon gyi yi ge rnams las byung bar blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-13: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa'i lha'i 'khor lo rnams rnam par bsgoms pa la bum pa gang ba la sogs bas ma don par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-14: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa //
T02TD2589E:186b-15: aom ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha sam yo da ka siddhya aa bhishinytsa sarba su ga so man s'u ni aa dad tu ku ru ku ru dza:h'um bam ho: aa: zhes bya bas 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi dam tshig phyag rgya rgyas bzung la /
T02TD2589E:186b-16: me tog gi yal ga las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la /
T02TD2589E:186b-17: mgon po 'jam ba'i dbyangs kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-18: bum pa gzhan dag kyang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du aom badzra kro dha da ka h'um zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2589E:186b-19: gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'bum mam khri 'am //
T02TD2589E:186b-21: so so zhing re re zhig gam /
T02TD2589E:186b-22: spyi la de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:186b-23: de nas rim pa 'dis me tog la sogs par byang dag par mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:187a-0: me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par @187a * //
T02TD2589E:187a-3: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid las byung ba'am //
T02TD2589E:187a-5: thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:187a-6: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:187a-7: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:187a-9: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang /
T02TD2589E:187a-10: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:187a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpa p'u dza me gha sa su dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:187a-12: bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:187a-13: gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na //
T02TD2589E:187a-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa'am //
T02TD2589E:187a-16: yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:187a-17: ma lus shing lus pa mad ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:187a-18: snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:187a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa bu dra spha ra nna sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:187a-20: mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:187a-22: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba'am //
T02TD2589E:187a-23: rin po che'i 'od dam mar me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:187a-24: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:187a-25: snying po dang phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2589E:187b-0: gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams @187b cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:187b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ka p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:187b-2: dri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:187b-4: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi dri bye brag lhan cig skyes pa'am yang dag par sbyar ba'am //
T02TD2589E:187b-5: yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:187b-6: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mchod pa'i las byas pa'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2589E:187b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:187b-8: snying po dang phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2589E:187b-10: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:187b-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha p'u dza me gha sa mu sra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:187b-12: thal mo khong stod du sbyar la bcings la /
T02TD2589E:187b-15: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na rin po che'i ri bo'am //
T02TD2589E:187b-16: rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste //
T02TD2589E:187b-17: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:187b-20: gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:187b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dhyam ga ratna ne aa langk'a ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:187b-22: bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:187b-24: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na dgod pa dang /
T02TD2589E:187b-27: rtsed mo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:188a-0: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sngas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa @188a * //
T02TD2589E:188a-1: thams cad dang snying po dang phyag rgyas dang /
T02TD2589E:188a-2: gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:188a-3: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta h'a sya l'a sya ra ti kr'i da soo khya aa nutat ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:188a-4: bzhad pa'i phyag rgya de nyid rdo rje thal mo bskor ba 'di spyi bor bzhag la //
T02TD2589E:188a-5: yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:188a-7: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na dpag bsam gyi shing ngam //
T02TD2589E:188a-8: gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:188a-9: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2589E:188a-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:188a-14: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:188a-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bo dhi aa langk'a ra bastra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:188a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2589E:188a-17: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran par byas la /
T02TD2589E:188a-18: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed de //
T02TD2589E:188a-19: ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2589E:188a-20: ma grol ba rnams dang dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2589E:188a-21: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2589E:188a-22: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2589E:188a-23: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2589E:188a-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dham tsitta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:188a-25: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:188a-26: sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig //
T02TD2589E:188b-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzrod bha ba d'a na p'a ra @188b mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:188b-1: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:188b-2: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyis mtha' thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig / dge ba'i lus dang dag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra ma h'a bo dhi ha ra sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra naa sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:188b-3: rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:188b-4: sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byang thams cad kyis lus yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:188b-5: rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang //
T02TD2589E:188b-6: zhe 'gras pa med pas zhugs shing mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02TD2589E:188b-7: chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu tta ra ma h'a dha rma aa ba bhi dhi ksh'an ti p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:188b-8: rdo rje gar mkhan pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:188b-9: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i sbyod pa la mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /
