T02TD2589E:188b-10: sangs rgyas nyid la yongs su gzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs su spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta tha' ga ta sa na sr'a pa ri tyam ga aa nutta ra ma h'a b'i rya p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:188b-11: me tig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:188b-12: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:188b-13: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur cig / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2589E:188b-16: mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T02TD2589E:188b-17: rig pa thams cad dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu tta ra ma h'a soo khya bi h'a ra dhy'a na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa nu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:188b-18: bdug sbos kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:188b-19: sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang /
T02TD2589E:188b-20: ye shes rnam dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig //
T02TD2589E:188b-21: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob ste /
T02TD2589E:189a-1: bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang ldan la //
T02TD2589E:189a-2: gsang ba'i cho ga shes dang /
T02TD2589E:189a-3: de kho na nyid mthong ste nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:189a-4: shes bya'i sgrib pa yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu tta ra kle sha tstse da sarba dharmma sa manta dzny'a na ma h'a pra dzny'a b'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:189a-5: lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs rung du mos pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:189a-6: aom sarba ta tha' ta k'a ya ni r++y'a ta na p'u dza me gha samu dra spha ra na sa na ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:189a-7: rdo rje thal mos bskor bas shis par brjod pa'i tshul du bcings la /
T02TD2589E:189a-8: thams cad du lce brgya stong prag snyed kyi sgo nas mnyam nyid mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pas mchod par lhag par mos par byas la 'di sked ces brjod par byas te /
T02TD2589E:189a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka ni ry'a p'u dza me gha sa bu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:189a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:189a-11: bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyor bas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las lhag par mos pa byas la /
T02TD2589E:189a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsi tat ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2589E:189a-13: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2589E:189a-15: smon pa med pa rnam par lhag par mos pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o /
T02TD2589E:189a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:189a-19: ba dan sna tshogs pas rnam par bkra ba brgya stong la sogs pa'i grangs snyed dam //
T02TD2589E:189a-20: 'byor pa ci yod pa rnams dbul bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:189a-21: ro brgya ba'i lha'i zhal zas dang /
T02TD2589E:189a-22: sva sti ka la sogs pa'i bza' ba sna tshogs pa 'bum mam //
T02TD2589E:189a-23: brgya stong snyed dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:189a-24: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD2589E:189a-25: a'adya nu tpa na na tv'at ces brjod la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:189a-26: rol mi bcu phrag stong dam //
T02TD2589E:189a-27: rol mo brgya phrag stong ngam //
T02TD2589E:189a-29: aom h'um hr'i: zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:189a-30: rnam pa bcu po 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:189b-3: mi dang ga dang rnga rings dang /
T02TD2589E:189b-5: ti ma la zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2589E:189b-6: shin tu brtags pa'i rta dang glang po che dang /
T02TD2589E:189b-7: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyang //
T02TD2589E:189b-8: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya bas mngon par bzlas la dbul bar ba'o //
T02TD2589E:189b-9: de ltar dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod nas //
T02TD2589E:189b-10: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:189b-11: 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas //
T02TD2589E:189b-12: 'bras chan ma tog chu dang bcas //
T02TD2589E:189b-13: sran chan bcas shing mang du bya //
T02TD2589E:189b-14: mar dang tsag tseg [?] bcas pa yi //
T02TD2589E:189b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la /
T02TD2589E:189b-16: aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2589E:189b-17: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpan na dv'a ta /
T02TD2589E:189b-18: aom badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2589E:189b-21: grihna pa ya grihn'a ba ya h'um /
T02TD2589E:189b-22: a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags la /
T02TD2589E:189b-24: lan gsum gsum dbul ba dang /
T02TD2589E:189b-28: mar me dang ldan par dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:189b-29: de yang ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o ;
T02TD2589E:189b-31: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan la mchod yon dbul zhing spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de //
T02TD2589E:189b-33: de nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2589E:189b-34: de la 'di dag gi phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:189b-35: shar phyogs su kha bltas te ;
T02TD2589E:189b-36: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas //
T02TD2589E:189b-37: lag pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya bstan la /
T02TD2589E:189b-38: g-yas ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su gzhag ste /
T02TD2589E:189b-39: g-yas pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni brgya bi yin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:189b-40: de las mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pa ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:189b-41: rkang pa g-yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni //
T02TD2589E:189b-44: na mo badzra sya de shi de shi badzra p'a ni raksha raksha sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:190a-0: me'i phyogs su bltas nas lag @190a * //
T02TD2589E:190a-1: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste /
T02TD2589E:190a-2: gung mo'i tshig gsum par btsugs la mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha sbyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-3: spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bo'i ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-4: phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs te /
T02TD2589E:190a-5: phyir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-6: de'i sngags ni aa gni ao hi ka pi l'a ka po l'a /
T02TD2589E:190a-7: dzva la dzva la ha ha shi ki ti li bi r'u paksha sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:190a-8: gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa bdun du gzhag ste //
T02TD2589E:190a-9: sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshul bcangs nas srin lag gnyis bsgrengs pa gzhi bas la g-yas te /
T02TD2589E:190a-10: yang nang du bzhag pa ni gshin rje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-11: srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du de bzhin du gshibs te bsgrengs la snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-12: de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-13: sngags ni sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:190a-14: bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang ba mnyam pas 'dug la lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs la las mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri dang 'dra bar gzhibs la bsgrengs te bzhag //
T02TD2589E:190a-15: lag pa g-yon pa yang de ltar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:190a-16: sta zur logs su bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste /
T02TD2589E:190a-17: g-yas pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-18: phyag rgya de nyis las lag pa g-yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri dang 'dra bar gzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dan tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-19: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang pa ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190a-20: snags ni sarba bh'u ta bha ya ka ra /
T02TD2589E:190a-21: ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:190a-22: chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam pas 'dug la lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bo dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te /
T02TD2589E:190a-24: g-yon pa'i lhu tshur yang de ltar byas te /
T02TD2589E:190a-25: snying gar bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus g-yab sa pa ni chu lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-0: phyag rgya de nyid las g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pas las zhags mig @190b ltar bya ba ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-1: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-2: sngags ni tri hri pu ta /
T02TD2589E:190b-3: tri tri shi kho ti bi su p'aksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:190b-4: rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor to btsugs la lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te sta zur longs su bzhag cing mthe bo bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-5: de nyid las mthe bo snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-6: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bo brkyang pa ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-7: sngags ni aom sva sam kha khu khu kha sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:190b-8: ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du ldog ste /
T02TD2589E:190b-9: mthe'u chung gnyis gzhibs nas brkyang la de'i rgyal tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste //
T02TD2589E:190b-10: g-yabs pa ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-11: phyag rgya de nyid las gud mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-12: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-13: sngags ni aom ku be ra ye sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:190b-14: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bas la srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol la gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng ba'i rgya ba logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya /
T02TD2589E:190b-15: mthe bo gnyis rab tu gzhibs te bzhag la de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun sen mo sprad nas nang du g-yabs pa ni dbang ldan gyi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-16: de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
T02TD2589E:190b-17: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni lar gtang pa'i phyag rgya //
T02TD2589E:190b-18: sngags ni aom dzum dzum sh'i ba sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:190b-19: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te /
T02TD2589E:190b-20: mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:191a-0: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar @191a * //
T02TD2589E:191a-1: gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:191a-2: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:191a-4: aur dham brahma ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:191a-5: s'u ry'a gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:191a-6: tsandra ya na kasha tra aadhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:191a-7: rkang pa na nyam par gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te /
T02TD2589E:191a-8: sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar /
T02TD2589E:191a-9: mthe bo zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te /
T02TD2589E:191a-10: sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:191a-11: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:191a-12: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:191a-13: sngags ni aa dhva pri thvi bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:191a-14: aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:191a-16: de nas sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la /
T02TD2589E:191a-17: las 'dis rang gi slob ma'i tshogs dang bdag la bgegs med par mdzod cig / dngos grub dam pa yang stsol cig ces byas nas thams cad slar gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:191a-18: yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:191a-19: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02TD2589E:191a-20: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02TD2589E:191a-21: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-22: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02TD2589E:191a-23: bu smad tshogs bcas g-yog 'khor bcas pa la /
T02TD2589E:191a-24: bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
T02TD2589E:191a-25: thal mo sbyar te khyed la gsol 'debs kyis //
T02TD2589E:191a-26: gnas nas phan gdags slang du 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-27: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-28: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-29: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-30: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-31: rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-32: mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu ngogs dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-33: g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-34: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
T02TD2589E:191a-35: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-0: gtsug lag khang @191b ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam //
T02TD2589E:191b-1: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
T02TD2589E:191b-2: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-3: lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-4: gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung //
T02TD2589E:191b-5: dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-6: seng ge dred dang gcan zan gnas dag dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-7: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-8: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-9: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02TD2589E:191b-10: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2589E:191b-11: phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang //
T02TD2589E:191b-12: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba //
T02TD2589E:191b-13: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
T02TD2589E:191b-14: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD2589E:191b-16: de ltar gtor ma sbyin pa thams cad ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba'am /
T02TD2589E:191b-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bya'o //
T02TD2589E:191b-18: de nas nye reg byas la lhag dang ma tshang ba'i cho ga'i nyes pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2589E:191b-19: sbyan la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2589E:191b-20: phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:191b-21: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:191b-22: las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
T02TD2589E:191b-23: rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:191b-24: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan te /
T02TD2589E:191b-25: shin tu byang bar bslabs pa'i slob ma dang /
T02TD2589E:191b-26: rang nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:191b-27: gal te dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag 'byor pa yod na dkyil 'khor las ha cang mi ring bar bsnyen bkur dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas shar du bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:191b-28: lhor ni rin po che tog gi mdo /
T02TD2589E:191b-29: nub tu sdong pos brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2589E:191b-30: byang du zla ba'i sgron ma'i mdo bklag par bya zhing /
T02TD2589E:191b-31: phyi rol du gar byed du gzhug pa la sogs pa ltad mo pa rnams kyang phyogs bzhir byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:192a-0: de nas lus khrus byas shing dris bsgos pa me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa gdong dri zhim pos byugs shing bdag nyid rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas mgo bo 'jam pa'i dbyangs @192a * //
T02TD2589E:192a-1: kyi phyag rgya'i mchog gis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba ni /
T02TD2589E:192a-2: byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas nas 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:192a-3: 'jug pa'i tshe slob ma la sogs pas 'di ltar glu blang ngo //
T02TD2589E:192a-4: aom pra bi sha bha ga b'an ma h'a su kha mo kasha bu ram /
T02TD2589E:192a-5: sarba si ddhi ma h'a su kh'a ra mya pa ra su kho tta ma si ddhya dza: h'um bam ho: pra sviddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:192a-6: zhugs nas rol cing dga' ba dang //
T02TD2589E:192a-7: sgeg pas mgon la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2589E:192a-8: phyag byas nas ni dkyil 'khor der //
T02TD2589E:192a-9: lan gsum bar du bskor bar bya //
T02TD2589E:192a-10: ma h'a ra ta su ti dha su su to shya /
T02TD2589E:192a-11: su khu kho manydzu na tha bya si ddha m'a ma zhes kyang brjod do //
T02TD2589E:192a-12: de nas yang mdun du 'dug la de kho na nyid 'di lan cig brjod do //
T02TD2589E:192a-13: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2589E:192a-14: rdo rje chen po rin che ba //
T02TD2589E:192a-15: ye shas chen po las che ba //
T02TD2589E:192a-16: 'jam pa'i rdo rje de dag grub //
T02TD2589E:192a-17: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la /
T02TD2589E:192a-18: khro bo'i khu tshur rdo rje sems ma'i khu tshur gyis phye la bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:192a-19: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes byas la bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mi bskyod pa la sogs bas bdag nyid gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2589E:192a-20: yi ge brgya pa brjod na babs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:192a-21: de nas dbab pa'i phyag rgya snying po 'dis snying gar dgrol lo //
T02TD2589E:192a-22: aom tishtha badzra dzri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2589E:192a-23: sh'a shva to me bha ba aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2589E:192a-24: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2589E:192a-27: sarba si ddhim me phra ya tstsha /
T02TD2589E:192a-28: sarba ka rmma su tsa me ci ttam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: de nas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por snying po 'dis dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:192a-29: aom pa ra ma su kh'a sh'a ya su la li ti bi l'a sa na mi te na ma mi bha ga b'a na dza: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi pra t'i tstsha badzra ku su ma aa nydza lin n'a tha ho /
T02TD2589E:192a-30: de nas phreng ba bcing ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:192a-31: dngos grub kyi rdo rje blang ba'i bar du byas la //
T02TD2589E:192a-32: rdo rje tha la mo bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas 'og nas bshad pa'i cho gas sdom pa 'dzin pa'i bar du byas pa kho nang yang lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:192a-33: de nas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa cho ga rnams byas nas /
T02TD2589E:192a-34: phyir byung la slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:192a-35: slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob ma las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la /
T02TD2589E:192b-0: rdo rje @192b sems dpar byin gyis brlab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la /
T02TD2589E:192b-1: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar pos stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bskon la /
T02TD2589E:192b-2: aom badzra tishthi h'um phags ces mngon par bsngags pa gos dmar po las byas pa'i gtsug tor dang /
T02TD2589E:192b-3: sgo srung bzhi'i snying po yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02TD2589E:192b-4: yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su gzung ste /
T02TD2589E:192b-8: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang /
T02TD2589E:192b-9: rin po che dang padma dang /
T02TD2589E:192b-10: sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba'i steng du de'i sa bon gyis rnam par bkod la /
T02TD2589E:192b-11: shar gyi sgor rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad phab pas /
T02TD2589E:192b-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pasth'a n'a ya a'a tma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2589E:192b-13: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva /
T02TD2589E:192b-14: aa dhi ti shtha sva m'am zhes brjod la phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:192b-15: de nas rang gi bdag po las gnang ba thob cing rdo rje sems dpas rang gi rigs kyi bdag nyid can dang 'dra bar sprul la /
T02TD2589E:192b-16: de'i snying gar bcug nas byin gyis brlab par rnam par bsam mo /
T02TD2589E:192b-17: de nas phyogs kyi sgor 'dug la rdo rje thal mo snyid gar sbyar nas /
T02TD2589E:192b-18: dpral ba sa la reg par phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:192b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya /
T02TD2589E:192b-20: a'a tma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02TD2589E:192b-21: de nas rdo rje rin po ches de bzhin du rin po che'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i nus pa bskyed pa nyid du de byas par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:192b-22: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor 'dug la rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyor du gcug ste /
T02TD2589E:192b-23: kha sa la reg pa'i phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:192b-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza bra bar ta na ya /
T02TD2589E:192b-25: a'a dma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2589E:192b-26: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dha rmma bra bar ta ya m'am /
T02TD2589E:192b-27: des kyang de bzhin du rdo rje chos kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus pa bskyed par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:192b-28: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgor 'dug la rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyor du bcug la ;
T02TD2589E:192b-29: mgo bo sa la reg bar phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:192b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karmma ni a'a tma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2589E:192b-31: sarba ta th'a g'a ta badzra ka rmma ku ru m'am /
T02TD2589E:192b-32: des kyad [*kyang?] de bzhin du rdo rje las kyis byin gyis brlabs pas /
T02TD2589E:193a-0: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed nus par byin gyis brlabs par @193a * //
T02TD2589E:193a-2: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhag la de bzhin du sdom pa sbyin no //
T02TD2589E:193a-3: aom bo dhi tsi tta autp'a da y'a mi zhes brjod do //
T02TD2589E:193a-4: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2589E:193a-5: dam pa dag gis bskyed nas su //
T02TD2589E:193a-6: de yi snying gar rdo rje ni //
T02TD2589E:193a-7: snying pos rab tu gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:193a-8: de nas su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho /
T02TD2589E:193a-9: siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes bskul lo //
T02TD2589E:193a-10: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes pa'i sngags kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug cing /
T02TD2589E:193a-11: de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:193a-12: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang nyid 'jug pas zhugs pa la yang lan gsum pa skor ba byas nas /
T02TD2589E:193a-13: 'dod chags chen po'i bde ba che //
T02TD2589E:193a-14: rdo rje chen po rin che ba //
T02TD2589E:193a-15: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02TD2589E:193a-16: 'gro kun bdag nyid grub par mdzod //
T02TD2589E:193a-19: bskul bas me tog dor ba la sogs pa cho ga thams cad rjes su bsgrubs la ;
T02TD2589E:193a-20: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:193a-21: 'dis bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:193a-22: sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02TD2589E:193a-23: sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs //
T02TD2589E:193a-24: sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid //
T02TD2589E:193a-25: 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o //
T02TD2589E:193a-26: mgon po bden pa 'di yis ni //
T02TD2589E:193a-27: bdag la khyed kyis 'dod rdzogs shog / ces bya'o //
T02TD2589E:193a-28: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi byin rlabs dang //
T02TD2589E:193a-29: dam tshig kyang ni dgongs pa yis //
T02TD2589E:193a-30: dngos grub thams cad thob pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:193a-31: thugs rjes 'gro kun don mdzod cig / ces bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD2589E:193a-32: slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir bka' nod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:193a-33: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2589E:193a-34: rdo rje slob dpon brtul zhugs che //
T02TD2589E:193a-35: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:193a-36: slob ma 'di ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2589E:193a-37: rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i //
T02TD2589E:193a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2589E:193a-40: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2589E:193a-42: sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod de slob ma bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:193b-0: ma h'a ra ta pu ti dha su to shya su su kho badzra satva daya siddhya mam zhes smos shig / de nas @193b 'di skad ces kyang bsgo'o //
T02TD2589E:193b-1: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis //
T02TD2589E:193b-2: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang thob na /
T02TD2589E:193b-3: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2589E:193b-4: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2589E:193b-5: de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:193b-6: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis /
T02TD2589E:193b-7: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:193b-8: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyang mna'i chu'i snying po sa lan cig bsngags la slob ma 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:193b-9: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:193b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khyod kyi //
T02TD2589E:193b-11: snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis //
T02TD2589E:193b-12: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2589E:193b-13: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2589E:193b-15: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2589E:193b-16: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2589E:193b-17: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD2589E:193b-18: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'grub //
T02TD2589E:193b-19: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2589E:193b-20: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02TD2589E:193b-22: dad pa med la rten la bstan //
T02TD2589E:193b-23: de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo zhing /
T02TD2589E:193b-24: deng phyid chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02TD2589E:193b-25: ngas 'di gyis shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02TD2589E:193b-26: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2589E:193b-27: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2589E:193b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2589E:193b-29: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur ba nyid du sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:193b-30: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2589E:193b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2589E:193b-32: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2589E:193b-33: de ring nyid du 'bab bar shog / aom badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes brjod do //
T02TD2589E:194a-0: de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas de'i @194a * //
T02TD2589E:194a-2: rdo rje sems ma babs par gyur par bsams na babs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:194a-3: yang na ho aa ho zhes bya bar yang rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la bkod de /
T02TD2589E:194a-4: se'u 'bru'i me tog dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying po las nges par phyung la /
T02TD2589E:194a-6: zhes bya bas de'i snying ga phye la der bcug ste /
T02TD2589E:194a-7: rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la sngags brjod de /
T02TD2589E:194a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bar gyur bar bsams na yang babs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:194a-9: khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems mas phye na yang babs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:194a-10: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bdun nam brgyad brjod pas kyang babs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:194a-11: slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying gar rdo rje bya //
T02TD2589E:194a-12: yi ge brgya pas mnyam gzhag stan byas nas //
T02TD2589E:194a-13: bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo dbye zhing //
T02TD2589E:194a-14: snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta //
T02TD2589E:194a-15: sngags kyi bdag po yi ge aa dmar gzugs //
T02TD2589E:194a-16: brjod pas yang dag chags pas g-yo bar blta //
T02TD2589E:194a-17: slob ma'i lus 'dir sgo ni dbye byas par //
T02TD2589E:194a-18: zhugs nas rdo rje byas pa'i snying la gnas //
T02TD2589E:194a-19: ma lus lus la kun du bkang nas su //
T02TD2589E:194a-20: rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan nas ni //
T02TD2589E:194a-21: sngags pas slob ma'i rkang pa de la dbab //
T02TD2589E:194a-22: kun du dril bu'i sgra ni yang dag dkrol //
T02TD2589E:194a-23: lag pa'i padma 'bab pa'i phyag rgya byas //
T02TD2589E:194a-24: mi bskyod rin chen la sogs bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD2589E:194a-25: rang gi phyogs rtogs las byon 'od babs pas //
T02TD2589E:194a-26: legs babs gyur pas rang gi bu la blta //
T02TD2589E:194a-27: gang zhig des kyang babs par ma gyur na //
T02TD2589E:194a-28: lag pa g-yas pas til gyi sa bon gzhag / dbus su yi ge h'um yang rab bkod de //
T02TD2589E:194a-29: rdo rje 'od 'bar ba ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD2589E:194a-30: g-yon pa'i mthe ba mdzub phyag rgyar byas pa yis //
T02TD2589E:194a-31: blangs par bsams la me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2589E:194a-32: lus ni thal bar byas pas rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD2589E:194a-33: bsod nams lus la'ang sngags kyi 'od kyis dgang //
T02TD2589E:194a-34: ye shes babs pa nyid du bsams nas ni //
T02TD2589E:194a-35: rdzas bzhin 'bab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:194b-0: la la dag gis bshad pa mche ba'i myu gu cung zad @194b gtsigs pa'i rtse mo'i 'od dkar g-yo zhing dgod pa'i zhal /
T02TD2589E:194b-1: smin ma 'debs pas rol cing ma lus 'brug sgra lta bur h'um ni 'jigs pa'i skra //
T02TD2589E:194b-2: sangs rgyas me tog chu phreng gnyis btags 'od chen tshogs ldan rang gi lus bsgoms la //
T02TD2589E:194b-3: de yis rang gi slob ma'i rnyog pa rnams sbyang sngags pa'i mchog gis bskyod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:194b-4: de'i 'og tu rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2589E:194b-9: kri ta bi kri ta bi dhu dzi hva dur danta dam ka / sa dr'a ha si ta lam po dha ra ka ha ka ha /
T02TD2589E:194b-14: badzra badzra aom ga / badzra ne tra /
T02TD2589E:194b-20: si pra bi sha / badzra nee hri da yam /
T02TD2589E:194b-21: aa bi sha gh'u rna gh'u rna /
T02TD2589E:194b-22: gh'u rn'a pa ya gh'u rn'a ba ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-25: pa ta ya mo ta ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-29: sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a dzny'a ka ra /
T02TD2589E:194b-30: pra ba ra dha rmma ba la ta /
T02TD2589E:194b-31: bi dza la he he bha ga b'ana /
T02TD2589E:194b-33: h'um kri ta ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:194b-34: sbyor ba 'di nyidkyis sngags 'di yang gdon par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:194b-35: badzra h'um ka ra ma h'a ba la pa ra kra ma /
T02TD2589E:194b-38: a'a kranta ha ra shi ra ka p'a la m'a l'a dha ra /
T02TD2589E:194b-39: ma h'a roo dra aatta ha sa bi kri t'a n'a ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-40: mo na da nu dha ra /
T02TD2589E:194b-41: ka ra ha dha n'a h'um /
T02TD2589E:194b-43: pra tsa li ta n'a ya na /
T02TD2589E:194b-47: kam pa kam pa kam pa ya hi /
T02TD2589E:194b-48: phra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-51: sarba kin ni ba ra sha pda /
T02TD2589E:194b-54: tr'a ta tr'a ta tr'a ta /
T02TD2589E:194b-58: ma h'a badzra h'um ka ra /
T02TD2589E:194b-62: ki li ki li shabda nar tva ba ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-64: tree lo kya bi dza ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-65: aa dzi ta na dza ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-77: tree lo kya bi dza ya /
T02TD2589E:194b-78: aa smin man r'a ma dhye /
T02TD2589E:194b-79: sarba ta th'a ga ta n'am /
T02TD2589E:194b-84: ba shi ku ru dza: h'um bam ho: tsa tur h'um ka ra ma h'a ba la /
T02TD2589E:194b-85: pa r'a kra ma sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:194b-86: ma las mig ni nyi zlar byas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:195a-1: ba'i phyogs su mdzes pa'i ra gnas pa //
T02TD2589E:195a-2: sngags pas rang gi bu yi mig phye ste //
T02TD2589E:195a-3: 'khor lo 'di dag ma lus bstan par bya //
T02TD2589E:195a-4: gang tshe des der ci yang ma mthong na //
T02TD2589E:195a-5: ra las byung ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02TD2589E:195a-6: de snying snang bar byas la de nas ni //
T02TD2589E:195a-7: de ni nyis 'gyur mig tu zhugs par bsam /
T02TD2589E:195a-8: de yi 'od kyis mig gnyis bskul bas na //
T02TD2589E:195a-9: de tshe cung zad de yis mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:195a-10: des kyang de bzhin mtshan ma ma mthong na //
T02TD2589E:195a-11: rjes mthun gnas las bden pa'i byin rlabs bya //
T02TD2589E:195a-12: 'gro ba'i don la chags bral ma mdzad ces //
T02TD2589E:195a-13: brtul zhugs can gyis de sogs kyis bskul zhing //
T02TD2589E:195a-14: pus mo gnyi ka sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02TD2589E:195a-15: gzugs mthong phyir na mchod yon dbul bar bya //
T02TD2589E:195a-16: de nas babs te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur /
T02TD2589E:195a-17: ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02TD2589E:195a-18: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i snying ga'i phyag rgya dgrol la /
T02TD2589E:195a-19: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:195a-21: dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug na //
T02TD2589E:195a-22: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /
T02TD2589E:195a-26: rigs ni gang gi snod 'gyur dang //
T02TD2589E:195a-27: bsod nams mthun ni gang yod pa //
T02TD2589E:195a-29: de nas aom pa ra ma su kh'a sh'a ya su la la ti bi la s'a na mi ti na m'a mi bha ga w'ana /
T02TD2589E:195a-30: dza: h'um pam ho: hi hi hi hi /
T02TD2589E:195a-31: pra t'i tstsha badzra ku su ma aanydza li n'a tha ho:/
T02TD2589E:195a-32: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis phreng ba de dkyil 'khor du dor ro //
T02TD2589E:195a-33: de nas dngos grub rab 'bring me tog babs pa las brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:195a-34: lha rnams kyi khyad par dang gnas kyi khyad par las brtag ste /
T02TD2589E:195a-35: gad tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi //
T02TD2589E:195a-36: dbul me tog babs gyur na //
T02TD2589E:195a-37: de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
T02TD2589E:195a-38: spyan la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang //
T02TD2589E:195a-40: stod du babs na phyogs rnams 'grub //
T02TD2589E:195b-0: ro smad phyogs su @195b babs na ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-1: dngos grub pa la rnams 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:195b-2: bar gyi sku la babs na ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-4: smad du babs par gyur na ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-6: rim pa de dag thams cad ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-7: rigs bzhi rnams las shes par bya //
T02TD2589E:195b-8: de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang //
T02TD2589E:195b-9: dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD2589E:195b-10: gal te lha yi gzugs dag las //
T02TD2589E:195b-11: me tog ring du lhung gyur na //
T02TD2589E:195b-12: de yi dngos grub yun ring 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:195b-13: nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02TD2589E:195b-14: gsang sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag / gang du bkram pa tshun chad ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-15: de yis sa ris de yin te //
T02TD2589E:195b-16: me tog der lhung de yi rigs //
T02TD2589E:195b-17: lha gnyis kyi ni bar ngag tu //
T02TD2589E:195b-18: gal te me tog babs gyur na //
T02TD2589E:195b-19: gang du nye bar gyur pa ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-20: de ni de yi rigs su bshad //
T02TD2589E:195b-21: gal te la la'i me tog ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-23: de la dngos grub pa la 'grub cing//
T02TD2589E:195b-24: da ni dad pa'ang rab tu chud //
T02TD2589E:195b-25: gal te me tog dor ba dag / ra ba'i ri mo la babs na //
T02TD2589E:195b-26: zhi bar byas nas de nas gdod //
T02TD2589E:195b-27: nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug / de ste the tshom gyur na ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-28: mkhas pas bzlas te 'dor mi gzhug / de ni gar yang nges med pas //
T02TD2589E:195b-30: gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang //
T02TD2589E:195b-31: don med phyi rol lhung na ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-32: zhi ba'i spyin sreg byas nas su //
T02TD2589E:195b-33: de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug / snying por me tog babs na ni //
T02TD2589E:195b-34: rtag tu don med mi 'gyur bshad //
T02TD2589E:195b-35: srad bu ngag gi cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2589E:195b-36: de yi nye 'khor shes par bya //
T02TD2589E:195b-37: de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02TD2589E:195b-38: me tog rnams ni bor ba la //
T02TD2589E:195b-39: bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ba //
T02TD2589E:195b-40: de la zi ba brtsams par bya //
T02TD2589E:195b-41: sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas //
T02TD2589E:195b-42: de ni slar yang 'dor du gzhug / lan gsum spogs te bor na yang //
T02TD2589E:195b-43: gal te legs par ma babs na //
T02TD2589E:195b-44: re thag bcad de slar gtad ngo ;
T02TD2589E:195b-45: / de nas me tog babs pa las /
T02TD2589E:195b-46: lha yang ngag par shes par byas nas /
T02TD2589E:195b-48: aom pra ti gri hna ta mi mi sa tva ba la zhes brjod nas de'i mgo la bcing ngo //
T02TD2589E:195b-49: ye shes babs pa'i mtshan ma las nye bar mtshon nas //
T02TD2589E:195b-50: de la mig gis ji ltar mthong ba zhes dris te /
T02TD2589E:196a-0: @196a * // des ji ltar mthong ba de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:196a-1: gal te dkar po rnam par mthong na ni //
T02TD2589E:196a-2: de la dngos grub mchog bslab bo //
T02TD2589E:196a-3: gal te ser po mthong na de la don 'byung ba'i ye shes bslab po //
T02TD2589E:196a-4: gal te dmar po mthong na de la rjes su chags pa'i ye shes bslab bo ;
T02TD2589E:196a-5: /'on te nag por mthong na de la mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo //
T02TD2589E:196a-6: gal te sna tshogs par mthong na de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02TD2589E:196a-7: de nas snying po 'dis gdong g-yogs bkrol te /
T02TD2589E:196a-8: aom badzra satva sa ma yi te dya tsaksh'u dgha ta ta tpa ra /
T02TD2589E:196a-9: audhga ta ya ti sarb'a ksho badzra tsaksh'u ra nu tta ram /
T02TD2589E:196a-10: de nas he badzra pa shya zhes brjod do //
T02TD2589E:196a-11: de nas gdong g-yogs dgrol nas ni //
T02TD2589E:196a-12: dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:196a-13: de nas bla ma dgar gyur nas //
T02TD2589E:196a-14: slob ma de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2589E:196a-16: de ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD2589E:196a-17: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2589E:196a-18: sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2589E:196a-19: 'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang //
T02TD2589E:196a-20: thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:196a-21: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs //
T02TD2589E:196a-22: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02TD2589E:196a-23: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:196a-24: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi snyoms //
T02TD2589E:196a-25: dran dang dbang pos sgo bzhi ste //
T02TD2589E:196a-26: bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi //
T02TD2589E:196a-27: ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya //
T02TD2589E:196a-28: khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje dag / gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02TD2589E:196a-29: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yin //
T02TD2589E:196a-30: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD2589E:196a-31: gdul byas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin //
T02TD2589E:196a-32: me long ye shes rtag me tog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD2589E:196a-33: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla bar yang dag ldan //
T02TD2589E:196a-34: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02TD2589E:196a-35: bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o //
T02TD2589E:196a-36: de ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2589E:196a-39: dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i //
T02TD2589E:196a-40: rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin //
T02TD2589E:196a-41: theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems //
T02TD2589E:196a-42: mdo sde'i 'khor lo bskor bas na //
T02TD2589E:196b-0: rdo rje @196b thig gis yongs btab cing //
T02TD2589E:196b-1: thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD2589E:196b-2: gang du 'jug pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2589E:196b-3: mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa dang //
T02TD2589E:196b-4: bde ba chen por rab grub phyir //
T02TD2589E:196b-5: de dag dag par yang dag 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:196b-6: de nas phyag rgya dad snying po yang bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:196b-7: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02TD2589E:196b-8: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bar du bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:196b-9: de nas yon blangs la gang du me tog babs par gyur pa de'i rigs dang //
T02TD2589E:196b-11: de'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2589E:196b-12: snying po 'di dang rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2589E:196b-14: de nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur la /
T02TD2589E:196b-15: gang gi mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba lag tu byin te /
T02TD2589E:196b-16: mtshan ma dang rjes su mthun par sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:196b-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2589E:196b-18: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2589E:196b-19: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02TD2589E:196b-20: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2589E:196b-21: rang gi mtshan mas bdag po'i dbang //
T02TD2589E:196b-22: snying po 'dis sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:196b-23: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2589E:196b-24: aa bhi shinyts'a mi ti shtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2589E:196b-25: de nas snying po 'dis dril bu sbyin no //
T02TD2589E:196b-26: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am /
T02TD2589E:196b-28: de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2589E:196b-29: aom badzra sa tva stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD2589E:196b-30: badzra n'a ma aa bhe she ka ta /
T02TD2589E:196b-31: kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod ba de la der skye zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:196b-32: de nas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2589E:196b-33: spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2589E:196b-34: sngags bskul ba'i tshigs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i sngags byin la /
T02TD2589E:196b-35: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes rig pa'i dbang bskur bas /
T02TD2589E:196b-36: bslab par bya ba ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2589E:196b-37: slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo bskor ba byas la phyag bya ste /
T02TD2589E:196b-38: phreng ba bcing ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:196b-39: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2589E:196b-40: de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon bzang po phul la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:197a-0: aom sarba buddha par ratna mam dza ya @197a * //
T02TD2589E:197a-1: dh'u pa d'i phya ma ku ta ya n'a ma /
T02TD2589E:197a-2: aa bhi shi nytsa phra ba ra badzra dha ra shr'i badzra sa tva sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2589E:197a-3: zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor bas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02TD2589E:197a-4: slob dpon rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid du gyur pas ;
T02TD2589E:197a-5: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02TD2589E:197a-6: slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i skur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:197a-7: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:197a-8: yang na dkyil 'khor las khru gsum tsam yongs su dor bar dbang bskur ba'i sgo la mngon par byas par nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tsam la zur bzhi pa sgo nub phyogs su bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la /
T02TD2589E:197a-9: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri /
T02TD2589E:197a-10: de'i steng du seng ge'i gdan la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ras kyi bkab pa dang ;
T02TD2589E:197a-11: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bre zhing g-yas logs su dar dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs rtse mo dkar ba dang /
T02TD2589E:197a-12: dmar ba la gtsug tor gdugs dkar po yongs su bzlas pa /
T02TD2589E:197a-13: g-yon du dar dang ras sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan aom yongs su bzlas pa'i legs par bzhag la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2589E:197a-14: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2589E:197a-17: ru dud la sogs pa'i rol mo phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:197a-18: phyi rol du gar dang glu la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:197a-19: sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing /
T02TD2589E:197a-20: bkra shis kyi glu len cing dril bu dgrol bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i bum pa'i chu rnams kyis de'i sngags gdon pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid dang /
T02TD2589E:197a-21: rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:197a-22: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:197a-23: ji srid rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar du dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2589E:197a-24: de nas de'i mgor yang 'jam pa'i sku gzugs de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung la /
T02TD2589E:197a-25: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satvam dza: h'um bam ho: su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:197b-0: shes rab @197b yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i //
T02TD2589E:197b-1: byang chub sems kyis 'jam dbyangs phyad chub de dbang bskur //
T02TD2589E:197b-2: rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02TD2589E:197b-3: des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02TD2589E:197b-4: dpal ldan rdo rje sems tshogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing //
T02TD2589E:197b-5: srid pa'i snying por rnams rol sgeg mo la sogs pas //
T02TD2589E:197b-6: bde byed rab mchog legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang //
T02TD2589E:197b-7: des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul byung ma lus pas //
T02TD2589E:197b-8: sems can bde gshegs rtogs mdzad bcom ldan dbang bskur la //
T02TD2589E:197b-9: dpag med lha yi mchog gis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02TD2589E:197b-10: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la //
T02TD2589E:197b-11: 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal por rgyal mchog dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2589E:197b-12: lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang //
T02TD2589E:197b-13: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na padmo yis //
T02TD2589E:197b-14: rdzogs sangs rin chen cod pan bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur //
T02TD2589E:197b-15: padma'i 'dod chags rnams legs pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2589E:197b-16: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / nam mkha'i snying po nor bu rin chen 'byor pas nyams dga' zhing //
T02TD2589E:197b-17: don rnams kun grub bde sbyin dbang bskur chen po la //
T02TD2589E:197b-18: dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs bkra shis gang ;
T02TD2589E:197b-19: ; des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog las bkra shis shog /'khor los sgyur drug dge ba'i bkra shis glu blangs las //
T02TD2589E:197b-20: bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa //
T02TD2589E:197b-21: des ni kun son 'byor ba'i dbang bskur chen po la //
T02TD2589E:197b-22: 'jam dpal grags bcas 'jig rten rnam par dag gyur cig / de nas gos la sogs pas brgyan te /
T02TD2589E:197b-23: sangs rgyas kyi cod pan dang dar dbyangs la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bar dbang bskur la /
T02TD2589E:197b-24: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:197b-25: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:198a-1: mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2589E:198a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2589E:198a-3: kun du bzang po thams cad bdag //
T02TD2589E:198a-4: rdo rje'i snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag //
T02TD2589E:198a-5: ces bya ba ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de /
T02TD2589E:198a-6: ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:198a-7: de nas hi zhes brjod la de bzhin du bdag po nyid du dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2589E:198a-8: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta ces brjod la dril bu byin te chos bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:198a-9: dngos rnams rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:198a-10: ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas //
T02TD2589E:198a-11: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02TD2589E:198a-12: dam pa'i dngos po byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:198a-13: de nas yi ge dh'i: brjod la //
T02TD2589E:198a-14: ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:198a-15: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2589E:198a-17: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD2589E:198a-18: sdug bsngal mang po zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:198a-19: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD2589E:198a-20: de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis //
T02TD2589E:198a-21: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02TD2589E:198a-22: ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du //
T02TD2589E:198a-23: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2589E:198a-24: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD2589E:198a-25: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2589E:198a-26: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02TD2589E:198a-27: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD2589E:198a-28: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD2589E:198a-29: gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig thabs //
T02TD2589E:198a-30: bsod nams byin rlob sgrub byed pa //
T02TD2589E:198a-31: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
T02TD2589E:198a-32: sems can don ni ston par byed //
T02TD2589E:198a-34: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:198a-35: phyag rgya dam tshig yin par grags //
T02TD2589E:198a-36: gang gis lus kun brtan pas na //
T02TD2589E:198a-37: phyag rgya yin par rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2589E:198a-39: de nas shr'i brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:198a-40: de nas spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o ;
T02TD2589E:198a-41: / slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2589E:198a-42: de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni //
T02TD2589E:198a-43: rjes su gnad pa'i sbyin brtson pas //
T02TD2589E:198a-44: slob ma rdzogs par shes nas ni //
T02TD2589E:198a-46: shin tu gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyid //
T02TD2589E:198a-47: rdo rje slob mas gsol byas te //
T02TD2589E:198b-0: de nyid la ni yon gyi @198b mchog / dam pa phul nas gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2589E:198b-1: 'di zhes bya ba'i rdo rje can //
T02TD2589E:198b-2: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa //
T02TD2589E:198b-3: slob dpon zhabs kyi padmo la //
T02TD2589E:198b-4: dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba 'tshal //
T02TD2589E:198b-5: slob dpon rab tu rmad byung ba //
T02TD2589E:198b-6: rgyal ba rnams kyi dbang bskur nyid //
T02TD2589E:198b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub thob byed pa //
T02TD2589E:198b-8: skal ba chen pos bdag la stsol //
T02TD2589E:198b-9: gang gis sems can thams cad kyi //
T02TD2589E:198b-10: rnyog med don ni bdag bgyid cing //
T02TD2589E:198b-11: brtul zhugs bzang khyod drin gyis ni //
T02TD2589E:198b-12: sangs rgyas kun don mdzad pa'ang bgyid //
T02TD2589E:198b-13: slob dpon phan par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2589E:198b-14: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2589E:198b-15: khams gsum kun gyis byas pa //
T02TD2589E:198b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2589E:198b-17: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2589E:198b-18: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas shing //
T02TD2589E:198b-19: khams gsum ye shes las byung ba //
T02TD2589E:198b-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin //
T02TD2589E:198b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams ;
T02TD2589E:198b-22: / yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2589E:198b-23: phyi rol dri sogs dam tshig gi / sprin ltar brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom //
T02TD2589E:198b-24: yang na rdo rje dbyings kyi ni //
T02TD2589E:198b-25: ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD2589E:198b-26: dam tshig mchog gi bum pa yang //
T02TD2589E:198b-27: 'dzin par mkhas pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD2589E:198b-28: rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2589E:198b-29: de tshe de la dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2589E:198b-30: rdzogs sangs rdo rje lha mo rnams //
T02TD2589E:198b-31: rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:198b-32: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:198b-33: aom dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi she ka stvam /
T02TD2589E:198b-35: sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam //
T02TD2589E:198b-36: dri bho me bha pa siddhya na ma: te bha ga w'ana ma h'a badzra ha ra su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2589E:198b-38: aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi yang dag par mchod de sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:198b-39: me tog ma'i gzugs can gyis me tog gis gtor la /
T02TD2589E:198b-40: deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ces pas mchod na khyod mchod pa'i yan lag brtsams kyis /
T02TD2589E:199a-0: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan ba byed pa'i skur mthong bar @199a * //
T02TD2589E:199a-2: de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:199a-3: gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la 'jug par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:199a-4: de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:199a-5: deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yang dag par 'bar bas //
T02TD2589E:199a-6: ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang bar byed par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2589E:199a-7: / de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:199a-8: deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:199a-9: 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2589E:199a-10: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:199a-11: de nas lha mo sgeg mo'i gzugs can gyis me tog cig sgeg pa dang bcas pas 'phangs la 'di skad ces brjod do /
T02TD2589E:199a-12: deng nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa thams cad 'dod pas mchod cing /
T02TD2589E:199a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'i rol pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rol bar gyis shig / de nas lha mo phreng ba ma'i gzugs can gyis phreng ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:199a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng bas rgyun du mchod pa la skyo ba med par gyis shig 'di lta ste /
T02TD2589E:199a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba 'di ni /
T02TD2589E:199a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng brgyan rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin no //
T02TD2589E:199a-17: de nas lha mo glu ma'i gzugs can dang /
T02TD2589E:199a-18: aom badzra satva su sam gra ha ta ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:199a-19: glu blangs la 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:199a-20: deng nas brtsams te chos thams cad sgrogs shid //
T02TD2589E:199b-0: ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par @199b sdud pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:199b-1: de nas lha mo gar mkhan ma'i gzugs kyi gar gyi lag pas sad par byas la 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02TD2589E:199b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar la rab tu 'jug cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gar gyi rjes su dgyes par gyis shig /
T02TD2589E:199b-3: de nas rin po che'am gser gyi thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:199b-4: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2589E:199b-5: 'jig rten rab rib bsam ba ltar //
T02TD2589E:199b-6: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2589E:199b-7: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2589E:199b-8: de nas mig tu pra bkod la me long blangs nas //
T02TD2589E:199b-9: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:199b-10: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2589E:199b-11: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD2589E:199b-12: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2589E:199b-13: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD2589E:199b-14: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2589E:199b-15: de ltar chos rnams shes nas su //
T02TD2589E:199b-16: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2589E:199b-17: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02TD2589E:199b-18: de nas ho: zhes bya bas gzhu byin la //
T02TD2589E:199b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:199b-20: phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phan du gzhug cing /
T02TD2589E:199b-21: steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:199b-22: de nas sha dha ban dzdza ka byin la 'dis dngos grub thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul la nye bar longs spyod cing /
T02TD2589E:199b-23: gzhan dag la yang byin cig / de nas rgyal mtshan byin la 'dis ni dgra thams cad dang 'thab pa las nye bar rgyal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
T02TD2589E:199b-24: de nas rdo rje ste mas ma'i phyag rgya byin la /
T02TD2589E:199b-25: 'dis ma rungs pa thams cad sgrubs shig ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:199b-26: gzhan yang aa badzra satva zhes bya bas me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:199b-27: rdo rje sems ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD2589E:199b-28: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD2589E:199b-29: bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas //
T02TD2589E:199b-30: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid yin //
T02TD2589E:199b-33: gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kye sems rdo rje ni 'di nyid yin par rtogs shing /
T02TD2589E:199b-34: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing /
T02TD2589E:200a-1: lag pa g-yas par byin te /
T02TD2589E:200a-2: chos kyi 'khor lo dang smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la 'di skad ces brjod do /
T02TD2589E:200a-3: ded nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2589E:200a-4: skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2589E:200a-5: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2589E:200a-6: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02TD2589E:200a-7: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2589E:200a-8: dogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02TD2589E:200a-9: gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02TD2589E:200a-10: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2589E:200a-11: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2589E:200a-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
T02TD2589E:200a-13: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2589E:200a-14: rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2589E:200a-15: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas //
T02TD2589E:200a-16: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD2589E:200a-17: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02TD2589E:200a-18: de bas 'dod la chags bral ba khyod kyis kyad [*kyang] ni ma byed cig / gsang ba bsgrags nas thal mo dang bcas pas dang por 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2589E:200a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2589E:200a-20: rdo rje mgon po rab sgrub mdzad //
T02TD2589E:200a-21: rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od //
T02TD2589E:200a-22: rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200a-23: rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po //
T02TD2589E:200a-24: dpal kun gyi ni rgyal po mchog / spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200a-25: rdo rje las dang rdung ba che //
T02TD2589E:200a-26: gnod sbyin gtum po gdon chen po //
T02TD2589E:200a-27: rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya chen //
T02TD2589E:200a-28: sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200a-29: byang chub sems dpa' 'byang chub che //
T02TD2589E:200a-30: sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2589E:200a-31: rdo rje ye shes ye shes che //
T02TD2589E:200a-32: theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200a-33: don kun gyi ni de nyid don //
T02TD2589E:200a-34: sems can don chen kun rig pa //
T02TD2589E:200a-35: kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de //
T02TD2589E:200a-36: kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200a-37: rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog / rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2589E:200a-38: dam tshig chen po'i de nyid don //
T02TD2589E:200a-40: rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che //
T02TD2589E:200a-44: rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje dgu //
T02TD2589E:200b-0: rig mchog @200b mchog dang mi yi mchog / rdo rje dam pa mchog chen po //
T02TD2589E:200b-1: rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200b-2: rdo rje dbyings dang gsal ba che //
T02TD2589E:200b-3: rdo rje gsang ba rang gsang 'chad //
T02TD2589E:200b-4: rdo rje phreng ba bsam gtan che //
T02TD2589E:200b-5: rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200b-6: sangs rgyas mchog gsang rdo rje mchog / sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che //
T02TD2589E:200b-7: sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che //
T02TD2589E:200b-8: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2589E:200b-9: sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che //
T02TD2589E:200b-10: sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchog pa //
T02TD2589E:200b-11: thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che //
T02TD2589E:200b-12: rdo rje grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200b-13: ta th'a ga ta'i glu chen po //
T02TD2589E:200b-14: ta th'a ga ta'i gsung dbyangs te //
T02TD2589E:200b-15: ta th'a ga ta sems chen po //
T02TD2589E:200b-16: rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal khyod //
T02TD2589E:200b-17: sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan //
T02TD2589E:200b-18: sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyed //
T02TD2589E:200b-19: rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab //
T02TD2589E:200b-20: zhi khro ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2589E:200b-21: ta th'a ga ta de nyid che //
T02TD2589E:200b-22: yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul //
T02TD2589E:200b-23: pha rol phyin pa'i kun mkhyen pa //
T02TD2589E:200b-24: don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal la //
T02TD2589E:200b-25: kun du bzang dang spyod pa mchog //
T02TD2589E:200b-27: kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen //
T02TD2589E:200b-29: sangs rgyas h'um ste h'um zhes pa //
T02TD2589E:200b-31: phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2589E:200b-32: phyag rgya brjod cing brjod pa dang //
T02TD2589E:200b-33: rim gror ta th'a ga tas khyab //
T02TD2589E:200b-34: gang phyir rdo rje sems bstan pa //
T02TD2589E:200b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya khyod /
T02TD2589E:200b-36: rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus //
T02TD2589E:200b-37: kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te //
T02TD2589E:200b-39: ta th'a ga ta khyod kyis bsgrubs //
T02TD2589E:200b-40: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni //
T02TD2589E:200b-41: glu blangs gang zhig stod byed cing //
T02TD2589E:200b-43: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni ;
T02TD2589E:200b-44: / sems can don kun mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:200b-45: rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod //
T02TD2589E:200b-46: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis //
T02TD2589E:200b-47: mgon po khyod la bstod bgyis pas //
T02TD2589E:200b-48: theg pa chen po rtogs pa yis //
T02TD2589E:200b-49: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02TD2589E:201a-2: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD2589E:201a-4: rdo rje 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02TD2589E:201a-6: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i rdo rje 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:201a-7: de nas rdo rje rin chen du bsgoms nas /
T02TD2589E:201a-8: de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2589E:201a-9: de bzhin du chus dbang bskur la //
T02TD2589E:201a-10: rin po che'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2589E:201a-11: rin po che'i rdo rje khu tshur mnyam par bcings la mthe bo dang mdzub mo rtse sbyar ba'i phyag rgyas rin po che byin la /
T02TD2589E:201a-12: de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:201a-13: nyi ma 'di ni mchog yin te //
T02TD2589E:201a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong //
T02TD2589E:201a-15: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2589E:201a-16: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2589E:201a-17: hri de nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur te /
T02TD2589E:201a-18: de bzhin du aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am zhes bya bas dril bu byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:201a-19: bsam pa thams cad grub pas na //
T02TD2589E:201a-20: don gyi bsam grub bla na med //
T02TD2589E:201a-21: de yang 'dod pa rab grub phyir //
T02TD2589E:201a-22: 'dod dang thar pa'i bde chen po //
T02TD2589E:201a-23: dh'i: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la /
T02TD2589E:201a-24: de bzhin du bzhag nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:201a-25: 'dod dang bde ba thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:201a-26: mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya zhing //
T02TD2589E:201a-27: bdag nyid dang ni pha rol gyi //
T02TD2589E:201a-28: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis //
T02TD2589E:201a-31: aom dza: h'um ho: ma h'a su kha badzra ratna aa bhi she ka stvam /
T02TD2589E:201a-32: sarba ratna aa dhi pa ti stvam dri dho me bha ba //
T02TD2589E:201a-35: ma h'a ratna sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2589E:201a-37: aom bhur bhu ba sva: hes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis kyis rin po chen byin la //
T02TD2589E:201a-38: de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de //
T02TD2589E:201a-39: rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2589E:201a-40: dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang nye bar bstan nas /
T02TD2589E:201a-41: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2589E:201a-42: sangs rgyas don la sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2589E:201a-43: pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni //
T02TD2589E:201a-44: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur zhes //
T02TD2589E:201b-0: gsang ba brjod nas de @201b bzhin du //
T02TD2589E:201b-1: rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2589E:201b-2: nor gyi tshogs ni bshad du gsol //
T02TD2589E:201b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog / mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du /
T02TD2589E:201b-4: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:201b-5: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2589E:201b-6: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2589E:201b-8: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:201b-9: de nas rdo rje chos su rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:201b-10: de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2589E:201b-11: de bzhin du chus dbang bskur la dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dar dpyangs cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang bskur te padma byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:201b-12: de nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2589E:201b-13: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste //
T02TD2589E:201b-14: gdul ba'i thabs kyi mdzad pa ni //
T02TD2589E:201b-15: dga' ba'i rol mor rab tu 'jug / hri: de nas bdag po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2589E:201b-16: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am a'adya nu tpanna tv'ata /
T02TD2589E:201b-17: ces bya bas dril bu byin nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:201b-18: ji ltar padma dmar bo ni //
T02TD2589E:201b-19: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos ltar //
T02TD2589E:201b-20: de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis //
T02TD2589E:201b-21: 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so //
T02TD2589E:201b-22: dh'i: de nas ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ba byin la /
T02TD2589E:201b-23: de bzhin gzhan nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:201b-24: cho ga dag ni gang dag gis //
T02TD2589E:201b-26: padma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag / de dang des ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2589E:201b-27: shr'i de nas de bzhin du aom dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kham padma ma h'a aa bhi she ka stvam /
T02TD2589E:201b-29: sarba padma aa bhi shinytsa ya ra ha me bha ba /
T02TD2589E:201b-30: siddha na ma te bha ga w'a na ma h'a padma su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2589E:201b-31: aa ham badzra padma aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya bas lag pa gnyis kyis padma byin la /
T02TD2589E:201b-32: de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:201b-33: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas /
T02TD2589E:201b-34: dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la //
T02TD2589E:201b-36: rgyal ba rnams la de phul la //
T02TD2589E:201b-37: sems can don phyir gzhan chung ma //
T02TD2589E:202a-3: de nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:202a-4: dpa' ba khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2589E:202a-5: rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2589E:202a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni //
T02TD2589E:202a-7: thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol //
T02TD2589E:202a-9: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2589E:202a-10: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:202a-11: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2589E:202a-14: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / padma'i rigs kyi bdag po yi //
T02TD2589E:202a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig / ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:202a-16: de la sna tshogs rdo rje can du rnam par bas mas la /
T02TD2589E:202a-17: de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la de bzhin du chus dbang bskur te /
T02TD2589E:202a-18: las thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje cod ban khyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2589E:202a-19: sna tshogs rdo rje byin la de khon nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:202a-20: rtag pa'i 'dod chags las byung khro //
T02TD2589E:202a-21: rdo rje me yi phung po'i gzugs //
T02TD2589E:202a-22: 'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che //
T02TD2589E:202a-24: hr'i: de nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur la /
T02TD2589E:202a-25: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am /
T02TD2589E:202a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dril bu byin nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:202a-27: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2589E:202a-28: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2589E:202a-29: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2589E:202a-31: dh'i: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la //
T02TD2589E:202a-32: de bzhin du bzhag nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:202a-33: thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2589E:202a-34: thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing //
T02TD2589E:202a-35: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab la //
T02TD2589E:202a-36: khams gsum yang ni bza' bar bya //
T02TD2589E:202a-37: shr'i de nas de bzhin du /
T02TD2589E:202a-38: aom dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra karmma aa bhi she ka ta stvam /
T02TD2589E:202a-40: sarba badzra karmma aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2589E:202a-42: siddha na ma te bha ga w'a na ma h'a badzra bishva /
T02TD2589E:202a-45: badzra karmma aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba'i 'dis la gnyis kyis las kyi rdo rje byin la de bzhin du mchod nas rang gi ming brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2589E:202b-0: dam tshig gi @202b phyag rgya nye bar bstan la /
T02TD2589E:202b-1: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:202b-2: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du ni //
T02TD2589E:202b-3: sems can thams cad bsad na yang //
T02TD2589E:202b-4: de yi sdig pas gos mi 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:202b-5: zhes gsang ba brjod la de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:202b-6: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2589E:202b-7: sangs rgyas kun la dbang byed cing //
T02TD2589E:202b-8: sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:202b-9: rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod //
T02TD2589E:202b-11: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2589E:202b-12: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:202b-13: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2589E:202b-14: las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2589E:202b-16: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / las kyi rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2589E:202b-17: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2589E:202b-18: slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2589E:202b-19: de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin du chus dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la //
T02TD2589E:202b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la //
T02TD2589E:202b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje byin nas de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste //
T02TD2589E:202b-22: de nyid du ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2589E:202b-23: de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems //
T02TD2589E:202b-24: lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:202b-26: sna tshogs 'dul bar ston pa ni //
T02TD2589E:202b-27: brtan zhing nges pa'i chos nyid can //
T02TD2589E:202b-28: srid pa shin tu gnas mchog pa'i //
T02TD2589E:202b-29: cho ga la sogs nges par dgos //
T02TD2589E:202b-30: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs la sogs //
T02TD2589E:202b-31: dkon mchog gsum po nyid du rtogs //
T02TD2589E:202b-32: srid pa shin tu legs par grub //
T02TD2589E:202b-33: sna tshogs mkhyen pa dpa' byed mchog / dh'i: de nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur la /
T02TD2589E:202b-34: aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pas dril bu byin te /
T02TD2589E:202b-35: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:202b-36: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2589E:202b-37: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2589E:202b-38: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2589E:202b-39: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD2589E:203a-0: dh'i: de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas @203a * //
T02TD2589E:203a-2: de bzhin du gzhan nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:203a-3: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
T02TD2589E:203a-4: ci 'dod par ni bstan bzhin du //
T02TD2589E:203a-5: dkon mchog gsum mchog mchod pa ni //
T02TD2589E:203a-6: bgyi'o zhes ni rab tu bsam //
T02TD2589E:203a-7: shr'i de nas de bzhin du /
T02TD2589E:203a-8: aom dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kham badzra dh'a tu aa bhi she ka ta stvam /
T02TD2589E:203a-10: sarba th'a ga ta aa dhi pa ti dri me bha ba siddha na ma te bha ga w'a na /
T02TD2589E:203a-11: ma h'a bee to tsa na su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2589E:203a-13: badzra dh'a tu aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya bas lag pa gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje byin la /
T02TD2589E:203a-14: de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:203a-15: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas /
T02TD2589E:203a-16: dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la /
T02TD2589E:203a-17: ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams //
T02TD2589E:203a-18: 'dul gyur de lta de lta bur //
T02TD2589E:203a-19: chags la sogs pas yun ring du //
T02TD2589E:203a-20: de bzhin 'gro ba'i don rnams kyis //
T02TD2589E:203a-23: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2589E:203a-24: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:203a-25: thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2589E:203a-26: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2589E:203a-29: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2589E:203a-30: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:203a-31: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2589E:203a-32: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2589E:203a-34: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:203a-35: 'di ni rjes su gnang zhing dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2589E:203a-38: // / de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la //
T02TD2589E:203a-40: gzengs bstod pas ni dngos po kun //
T02TD2589E:203a-41: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD2589E:203a-42: rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang //
T02TD2589E:203a-43: de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to //
T02TD2589E:203a-44: aom nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan //
T02TD2589E:203a-45: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2589E:203a-46: dngos po mchog tu 'grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:203a-47: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02TD2589E:203a-48: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa //
T02TD2589E:203a-49: siddha sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
T02TD2589E:203a-50: de la gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:203a-51: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag /
T02TD2589E:203b-1: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:203b-2: 'dis phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga lung bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:203b-3: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:203b-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:203b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi dam tshig slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad de /
T02TD2589E:203b-7: 'di nyid kyis gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub mchog grub pa'i byin rlabs dang /
T02TD2589E:203b-8: gsang ba 'di'i stobs la dad par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:203b-9: de nas ji ltar zhugs pa'i rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:203b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:203b-11: rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su mnyes par drangs te /
T02TD2589E:203b-12: 'dir zhugs nas dbang du byas te //
T02TD2589E:203b-13: sgrub pa dang rjes su sgrub pas //
T02TD2589E:203b-14: rdo rje dbyings thams cad kyi brtan pas brtan par gyur cig / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang mnyam par byung la nam mkha'i khams thams cad ltar yangs pa chen po 'dir gnas shing rab tu gnas la //
T02TD2589E:203b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:203b-16: rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon la rag lus shing /
T02TD2589E:203b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbus su dmigs la /
T02TD2589E:203b-18: de bzhin gshegs thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:203b-19: rang gi slob dpon nyid kyis da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo zhes byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:203b-20: rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang mnyam par mgrin gcig tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad do zhes dad par gyis shig /
T02TD2589E:203b-21: mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2589E:203b-22: mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis //
T02TD2589E:203b-23: srid pa kun las rnam grol bar //
T02TD2589E:203b-24: khyod ni deng nyid gnas pa yin //
T02TD2589E:203b-25: bde chen theg pa 'di las ni //
T02TD2589E:203b-26: slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te //
T02TD2589E:203b-27: mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas //
T02TD2589E:204a-2: dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:204a-3: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02TD2589E:204a-4: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:204a-5: ston pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2589E:204a-6: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di //
T02TD2589E:204a-7: rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2589E:204a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02TD2589E:204a-9: dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no //
T02TD2589E:204a-10: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
T02TD2589E:204a-11: phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'o //
T02TD2589E:204a-12: gang 'di skyes pa tsam gyis su //
T02TD2589E:204a-13: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs pa med //
T02TD2589E:204a-14: dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing //
T02TD2589E:204a-15: nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2589E:204a-16: mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis //
T02TD2589E:204a-17: tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD2589E:204a-18: bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su //
T02TD2589E:204a-19: dka' thub can gyis ma gdugs shig / ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //
T02TD2589E:204a-20: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2589E:204a-21: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2589E:204a-22: nam yang yongs su mi gtong zhing //
T02TD2589E:204a-23: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
T02TD2589E:204a-25: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi //
T02TD2589E:204a-26: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
T02TD2589E:204a-27: de ni sangs rgyas smad pas na //
T02TD2589E:204a-28: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
T02TD2589E:204a-29: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nang //
T02TD2589E:204a-30: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtso bo dang //
T02TD2589E:204a-31: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
T02TD2589E:204a-32: bsad nas sems dmyal ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:204a-33: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02TD2589E:204a-34: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
T02TD2589E:204a-35: dge ba rab tu mi sbyoms pa //
T02TD2589E:204a-36: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02TD2589E:204a-37: bla ma la ni gus bcas yon //
T02TD2589E:204a-38: rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2589E:204a-39: des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02TD2589E:204a-40: phyir zhing dbyung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:204a-41: rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni //
T02TD2589E:204a-42: sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang //
T02TD2589E:204a-43: rang srog gis rtag bstan bya na //
T02TD2589E:204a-44: longs spyod g-yo bas smos ci dgos //
T02TD2589E:204a-45: gang phyir bskal ba bye ba ni //
T02TD2589E:204a-46: grangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'o //
T02TD2589E:204a-47: sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la //
T02TD2589E:204a-48: tshe 'de nyid la ster bar byed //
T02TD2589E:204a-49: rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs //
T02TD2589E:204a-50: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD2589E:204a-51: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul//
T02TD2589E:204b-1: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD2589E:204b-2: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:204b-3: de byin pas bsod nams mchog dag gis //
T02TD2589E:204b-4: dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:204b-5: ded khyod skye ba 'bras bcas te //
T02TD2589E:204b-6: gang 'dir legs par gnas pas na //
T02TD2589E:204b-7: dam tshig lha rnams kun dang mnyam //
T02TD2589E:204b-8: rang byung du yang der skyes so //
T02TD2589E:204b-9: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa //
T02TD2589E:204b-10: kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2589E:204b-11: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che //
T02TD2589E:204b-12: rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin //
T02TD2589E:204b-13: deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T02TD2589E:204b-14: grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
T02TD2589E:204b-15: khyed rnams kyi ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2589E:204b-16: deng nyid thob par the tshom med //
