T02TD2589E:204b-17: aa: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba phul du byung ba ste //
T02TD2589E:204b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:204b-19: dpal rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma mchog rnams la //
T02TD2589E:204b-20: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang bcas pas phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas nyid du gyur cig / mchog tu rtag pa yin par khod du chud par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:204b-21: de la gtan tshig ci yod ce na /
T02TD2589E:204b-22: gang khyod kyis thams cad kyi bdag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis /
T02TD2589E:204b-23: phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin la /
T02TD2589E:204b-24: phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis na /
T02TD2589E:204b-25: des pa'i phung po la gnas te /
T02TD2589E:204b-26: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas yin la /
T02TD2589E:204b-27: dus gsum ni mnyam pa nyid yin pas na /
T02TD2589E:204b-28: de ltar byung ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba ste //
T02TD2589E:204b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor zhing //
T02TD2589E:204b-30: thams cad sbyor ba rjes sbyar ldan //
T02TD2589E:204b-31: sangs rgyas nyid du shes bya ste //
T02TD2589E:204b-32: sangs rgyas dam pa rtag pa'o //
T02TD2589E:204b-34: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na //
T02TD2589E:204b-35: khyod kyi bdag nyid thams cad du //
T02TD2589E:204b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2589E:205a-1: tshig yongs su gzung ba ni don yod pas //
T02TD2589E:205a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mngon par rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:205a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dang ldan pa'i dam tshig rjes su bsgrubs pas mchog tu grub pa ni //
T02TD2589E:205a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:205a-5: de bas na dus thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:205a-6: gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal ba dang //
T02TD2589E:205a-7: yid mi bde ba rnams kyi len pas khyed rnams kyis rtag pa nyid du rjes su bsrung bar bya zhing zhig par mi bya'o //
T02TD2589E:205a-8: ji snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:205a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig sbyor bas legs par mchod la bde bar gzung bar bya zhing yang dag par gso bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:205a-10: bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang rig par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:205a-11: gang gis na khyod pha rol mu stegs kyi gzhung gis log pa'i lta ba can du mi 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2589E:205a-13: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad du ltung ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:205a-14: lus 'di shin tu yang mi smra ba nyid dang /
T02TD2589E:205a-15: sems shin tu yang 'gog par mi 'gyur bar gang gis sku gsungs thugs rdo rje thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig gis bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtag par 'gyur bar yang gyis shig / yang smras pa /
T02TD2589E:205a-16: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang //
T02TD2589E:205a-17: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD2589E:205a-18: sdig pa med kyis mi 'jigs shig / dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
T02TD2589E:205a-19: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal te //
T02TD2589E:205a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:205a-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la mchog tu gsang ba'i 'di bka' stsal ba yin no //
T02TD2589E:205a-22: yid ni rab tu dang ba'i rdo rje yis //
T02TD2589E:205b-0: rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde la @205b brten //
T02TD2589E:205b-1: bde ba'i bde ba chung la sangs rgyas ni /
T02TD2589E:205b-2: kun dang 'dra mnyam rtag par khyod gyur te //
T02TD2589E:205b-3: slob mas gus par bla ma yis //
T02TD2589E:205b-4: rkang pa gnyis la phyag bya ste //
T02TD2589E:205b-5: de nas ji skad gsungs pa kun //
T02TD2589E:205b-6: rjes su bsgrub par khas blang ngo //
T02TD2589E:205b-7: de ltar dam bca' byas nas ni //
T02TD2589E:205b-8: cho ga 'di yis rang nyid kyis //
T02TD2589E:205b-9: rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni //
T02TD2589E:205b-10: blangs nas kyang ni de la sbyin //
T02TD2589E:205b-11: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2589E:205b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2589E:205b-13: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2589E:205b-14: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam /
T02TD2589E:205b-15: dha ra ya mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod de //
T02TD2589E:205b-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2589E:205b-18: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
T02TD2589E:205b-19: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2589E:205b-20: byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs //
T02TD2589E:205b-21: zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin no //
T02TD2589E:205b-22: de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni //
T02TD2589E:205b-23: de nas sar pa'i gos rnams bskon //
T02TD2589E:205b-24: me tog dri la sogs pas mchod / mchod phyir gdu bu bcas par bya //
T02TD2589E:205b-25: de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD2589E:205b-26: de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzung //
T02TD2589E:205b-27: thal mo sbyor ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2589E:205b-28: dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug / gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs su //
T02TD2589E:205b-29: spyi bor 'dud de phyag 'tshal gzhug / slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02TD2589E:205b-31: mkhan pos de skad smras nas su //
T02TD2589E:205b-32: gdugs gzhan nas ni slob ma de //
T02TD2589E:205b-33: lag pas legs par blangs nas su //
T02TD2589E:205b-34: de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya //
T02TD2589E:205b-37: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2589E:205b-38: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:205b-39: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:205b-40: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2589E:205b-41: nan tan bskyed de bri bar bgyi //
T02TD2589E:205b-42: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor //
T02TD2589E:205b-43: khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang //
T02TD2589E:205b-44: sems can rnams la mi phan pa //
T02TD2589E:205b-45: nyam nga chen por gyur kyang ni //
T02TD2589E:205b-46: bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o /
T02TD2589E:205b-47: de nas slob ma re re yis //
T02TD2589E:206a-2: mthe bo nas ni bzung nas su //
T02TD2589E:206a-3: zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2589E:206a-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2589E:206a-5: slob ma gus dang ldan pa dang //
T02TD2589E:206a-6: rang gi rigs dang mtshams pa yis //
T02TD2589E:206a-7: sdig pa thams cad sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2589E:206a-8: de ltar byas nas bdag bsrung ste //
T02TD2589E:206a-9: sngags pas slob ma las yon blang //
T02TD2589E:206a-10: slob ma yis kyang de nyid ni //
T02TD2589E:206a-11: ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar bya //
T02TD2589E:206a-12: de nas slob mas 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad do zhes ming du byas la /
T02TD2589E:206a-13: bskor ba lan gsum bya ste /
T02TD2589E:206a-14: phyag byas nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya zhing //
T02TD2589E:206a-15: mchod pa chen pos mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:206a-16: shin tu dga' ba gad dang gang //
T02TD2589E:206a-17: khyad par can ni de dang de //
T02TD2589E:206a-18: de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2589E:206a-19: de dang de ni bla ma sbyin //
T02TD2589E:206a-20: de ni bsod nams tshogs su 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:206a-21: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:206a-22: yang na de ni dgar 'gyur ba //
T02TD2589E:206a-23: de ltar yang dag spyad par bya //
T02TD2589E:206a-24: de ltar yang dag dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2589E:206a-25: slob dpon zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD2589E:206a-26: de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams //
T02TD2589E:206a-27: grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02TD2589E:206a-28: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis mchod de //
T02TD2589E:206a-29: aom badzra satva su sam gra ham /
T02TD2589E:206a-30: aom badzra ratna ma nutta ram /
T02TD2589E:206a-31: aom badzra dharmma g'a ya ne /
T02TD2589E:206a-32: aom badzra karma ka ro ddha ba /
T02TD2589E:206a-33: zhes bya ba rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis phyi dang nang gi mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2589E:206a-34: thams cad ci nus pa dang /
T02TD2589E:206a-36: rjes su mthun par mchod pa rnams dang /
T02TD2589E:206a-37: slob ma rnams mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2589E:206a-38: de'i 'og tu bza' ba dang btung ba dang /
T02TD2589E:206a-39: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag dang gzhan dga' bar mchod cing ci 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa rnams bya'o //
T02TD2589E:206a-40: de nas thams cad su la yang ma smra shig / ces mna'i snying po byin la ji ltar zhugs pa rnams gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:206a-41: de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de /
T02TD2589E:206a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gang bcing bzod pa gsol la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2589E:206b-1: aom kri to ba sarba satv'a rtha //
T02TD2589E:206b-2: siddha ma datt'a y'a nu ga / gatstsha tv'am buddh'a bi sha yam //
T02TD2589E:206b-3: pu na ra ga ma na ya tstsha badzra sa tva mu:/
T02TD2589E:206b-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ba rnams ni /
T02TD2589E:206b-5: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas rang gi lus la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:206b-6: de nas snying gnas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na 'dug pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2589E:206b-7: mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcing ba dang /
T02TD2589E:206b-8: go cha bcing ba snying po 'dis bya ste /
T02TD2589E:206b-9: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD2589E:206b-10: sarba mu dra me dri dha ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na bam /
T02TD2589E:206b-11: go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba bkrol la thal mo sbyar te bdag nyid mnyam pa'i thal mos dgyes pa'i snying po 'di bya'o //
T02TD2589E:206b-13: yi ge brgya pa brjod la rdo rje dga' ba legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
T02TD2589E:206b-14: legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod //
T02TD2589E:206b-15: rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so //
T02TD2589E:206b-16: rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste //
T02TD2589E:206b-17: rdo rje las ni khyod legs so //
T02TD2589E:206b-18: theg pa chen po bla na med //
T02TD2589E:206b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
T02TD2589E:206b-20: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
T02TD2589E:206b-21: mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad //
T02TD2589E:206b-22: aom badzra k'i li k'i li ya //
T02TD2589E:206b-24: badzra dha ra a'adzny'a pa ya /
T02TD2589E:206b-25: h'um h'um h'um h'um phat ces bya bas phur bu bton la 'o mas bkru'o //
T02TD2589E:206b-26: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am a'adaya nutpna tv'a ta ces bya ba 'dis tsho rtse rnams bsdus la 'bad pas chu klung chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:206b-27: de nas gnas kyang ba lang gi lci bas nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2589E:206b-28: bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams //
T02TD2589E:206b-29: ci dga' bar ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD2589E:206b-30: khyi dang bya rog la sogs la //
T02TD2589E:206b-31: cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no //
T02TD2589E:206b-32: yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD2589E:206b-33: slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2589E:206b-34: bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya //
T02TD2589E:206b-35: slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung //
T02TD2589E:206b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun //
T02TD2589E:206b-37: slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad //
T02TD2589E:206b-38: gal te slob mas spyad na ni //
T02TD2589E:206b-39: dam tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:206b-40: gang zhig spyad par mi 'dod na //
T02TD2589E:206b-42: dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du //
T02TD2589E:206b-43: de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul //
T02TD2589E:206b-44: gdugs dang rnga yab dri la sogs //
T02TD2589E:207a-2: ba dan gdug spos dri la sogs //
T02TD2589E:207a-3: dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2589E:207a-4: gos dang yo byad snod la sogs //
T02TD2589E:207a-5: dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2589E:207a-6: de dag las ni slob ma yis //
T02TD2589E:207a-7: cung zad tsam yang mi bskur ro //
T02TD2589E:207a-8: dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin ;
T02TD2589E:207a-9: / yang na dge slong ma la sbyin //
T02TD2589E:207a-10: gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na //
T02TD2589E:207a-11: bsnyen bkur dag la sbyin par bya //
T02TD2589E:207a-12: de nas de yi phyi de nyin //
T02TD2589E:207a-13: nyes byas lhag ma zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:207a-14: mkhas pa yis ni zhi ba yi //
T02TD2589E:207a-15: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02TD2589E:207a-16: slob mas dag zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:207a-17: spyan la sogs pa'i gsang sngags dang //
T02TD2589E:207a-18: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:207a-19: byams pa chen po'ang bsgom par bya //
T02TD2589E:207a-20: nyes byas thams cad zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:207a-21: de nas zhi ba chen po bya'o //
T02TD2589E:207a-22: dad med dman la 'jug la min //
T02TD2589E:207a-23: 'dod la chags dang khro bo'i dbang bskur dang //
T02TD2589E:207a-24: slob ma bu min blo gros dman rnams la //
T02TD2589E:207a-25: cho ga'i bsgrub pa 'di ni sbyin mi bya //
T02TD2589E:207a-26: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i ye shes snang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2589E:207a-27: de nas dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob nas de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:207a-28: dbang skur zhing gnang ba thob pas dus mtshams gsum mam bzhir byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2589E:207a-29: dbang bskur nas dngos grub dang rdo rje blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su bcad pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par mngon sum bzhin bltas la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i srid mtshan ma mthong gi bar du tshig gzhan mi smra bar bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:207a-30: de nas dpyid zla ra ba'i zla ba nya ba la dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor bris la der bzhugs te cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2589E:207a-31: skyil mo krung ma bshig par ji srid nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rje btsun 'jam dpal las 'od zer rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te /
T02TD2589E:207a-32: sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nub par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2589E:207a-33: de'i 'og tu lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i skra zlum por 'khyil ba /
T02TD2589E:207a-34: lus la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2589E:207b-0: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa @207b lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2589E:207b-1: rje btsun 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:207b-2: gal te bag med pas de grub par ma gyur na /
T02TD2589E:207b-3: de tshe dpyid zla tha chungs kyi nya la dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas nas de bzhin du sgrub pa la zhugs na /
T02TD2589E:207b-5: der yang ma grub na ston zla tha chungs kyi zla ba nya ba la de bzhin du sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:207b-6: sgrub pa bdun pa la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
T02TD2589E:207b-7: dngos grub mchog ni sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:207b-8: dngos grub 'bring ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02TD2589E:207b-11: ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:207b-12: de dag kyang de la lhag par mos pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klog cing de'i sgrub pa'i cho gas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:207b-13: dngos grub tha ma ni gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2589E:207b-18: rkang mgyogs la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams te //
T02TD2589E:207b-19: de dag kyang de dang de la mos pas bklags na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:207b-20: dngos grub mchog sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis gal te dngos grub mchog ma grub kyang 'bring ngam tha ma 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:207b-21: dngos grub 'bring sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang de ma grub kyang tha ma grub par 'gyur gyi /
T02TD2589E:207b-22: tha ma la sgrub par zhugs pa rnams kyi mchog dang 'bring ni ma yin no //
T02TD2589E:207b-23: de bas dngos grub mchog gi phyir 'bad par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:207b-24: dngos grub 'bring dang tha ma rnams ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:207b-25: gsang sngags gzhan dag bsgrubs na mtshan gyi don gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi lha'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis bya ste /
T02TD2589E:207b-26: de bas ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas dngos grub thams cad sgrub pas na /
T02TD2589E:207b-27: sngags dang phyag rgya'i lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyis sems cad thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:208a-1: gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs ba yin no //
T02TD2589E:208a-2: de bas na 'di ltar gang ci yang rung ba ma brtags pa dag la sngon dang phyi ma'i don brtag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:208a-3: ji ltar na mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha rnams rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi nges par bstan pa bshad pa ni med kyi rang bzor brtags pa lta bur shes so zhe na 'di ltar bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:208a-4: thams cad ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid du gnas la de bzhin du bshad pa yin gyi rang bzor byas pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2589E:208a-5: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer 'gyed pa'i snang bas dngos po rnams shin tu gsal bar mngon yang /
T02TD2589E:208a-6: dmus long dang mig med pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong ngo //
T02TD2589E:208a-7: de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i blo gros kyi mig ma tshang bas gal te rtsod dus zin kyang de'i tshe nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2589E:208a-8: de lta mod kyi blo gros dman pa rnams kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:208a-9: sngags mchog mnga' bdag bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02TD2589E:208a-10: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02TD2589E:208a-11: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces bya ba la sogs pas ni //
T02TD2589E:208a-12: gtsug tor brgyad bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208a-13: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
T02TD2589E:208a-14: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
T02TD2589E:208a-15: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2589E:208a-17: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
T02TD2589E:208a-18: zhes bya la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug rnams bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208a-19: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
T02TD2589E:208a-20: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02TD2589E:208a-21: zhes bya bas ni sgo srung rnams kyang gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208a-22: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
T02TD2589E:208a-23: zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa bzhi bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208a-24: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor du yang //
T02TD2589E:208a-25: mgon pos sa bcu dbang phyug ste //
T02TD2589E:208a-26: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
T02TD2589E:208b-0: zhes bya bas ni sa @208b rnams bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208b-1: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
T02TD2589E:208b-2: zhes bya bas ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
T02TD2589E:208b-3: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
T02TD2589E:208b-4: zhes bya bas ni dbang rnams so //
T02TD2589E:208b-5: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
T02TD2589E:208b-6: zhes bya bas ni don gyi gzungs dang tshig gi gzungs dang /
T02TD2589E:208b-7: mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs dang /
T02TD2589E:208b-8: sngags kyi gzungs te dran pa zhes bya ba ni gzungs la bya'o //
T02TD2589E:208b-9: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
T02TD2589E:208b-10: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
T02TD2589E:208b-11: zhes bya bas ni dga' ba'i mchod pa ste /
T02TD2589E:208b-12: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa yang bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208b-13: de bzhin du rim pa gsum pa las /
T02TD2589E:208b-14: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
T02TD2589E:208b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pas //
T02TD2589E:208b-17: kun du bzang po la sogs pa //
T02TD2589E:208b-18: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208b-20: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02TD2589E:208b-21: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
T02TD2589E:208b-23: ces bya ba la sogs pas ni //
T02TD2589E:208b-26: bgegs mthar byed rnams de bzhin du bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208b-27: mtshams rnams rdo rje h'um ste h'um /
T02TD2589E:208b-28: zhes sgrogs zhes bya bas ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2589E:208b-29: rdo rje 'bar ba mig ni bzang //
T02TD2589E:208b-30: ces bya bas ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2589E:208b-32: ces bya bas ni rdo rje khrag 'thung ngo //
T02TD2589E:208b-33: hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed //
T02TD2589E:208b-34: ces bya ba ni rta mchog go //
T02TD2589E:208b-35: bdug pa ma la sogs rnams kyang //
T02TD2589E:208b-36: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
T02TD2589E:208b-37: ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin te /
T02TD2589E:208b-38: de dag thams cad kyang yang dag par spros nas sbyar zhing bshad zin pas /
T02TD2589E:208b-40: phyi rol du rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du yang tshangs pa dang drag po dang /
T02TD2589E:208b-41: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa rnams kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba yin pas /
T02TD2589E:208b-42: 'khor nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:208b-43: ji ltar na nang du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas mnan la phyi rol du gzhag ce na /
T02TD2589E:208b-44: 'di la brtsad par mi bya ste /
T02TD2589E:209a-0: dregs pa bsal bar mdzad nas @209a * //
T02TD2589E:209a-1: sprul pa'i gzugs kyis mchod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:209a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag pa yin pas mi mthun pa'i 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2589E:209a-3: gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rnams ci phyir bzhag / ces zer na /
T02TD2589E:209a-4: gsang sngags thams cad skyed pa po ;
T02TD2589E:209a-6: gsang sngags thams cad kyi dgos pa'i khyad par nyid yongs su shes pas na thams cad rjes su mthun par sbyar ba yin no //
T02TD2589E:209a-7: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
T02TD2589E:209a-8: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //
T02TD2589E:209a-13: dngos grub sgrub pa la sogs pa las rab 'byam thams cad rje btsun 'jam dpal gyis sbyor bas thams cad nas thams cad du sbyor bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:209a-14: de bas na bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2589E:209a-15: sngags kyi sbyor ba la yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2589E:209a-16: don dam par de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:209a-17: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
T02TD2589E:209a-18: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2589E:209a-20: las kyi phyag rgya las tha dad pa'i phyag rgya med pas 'di nyid du thams cad bstan pa yin te /
T02TD2589E:209a-21: ji ltar bdag gis sbyar ba de bzhin du sngags dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas pa rnams kyis nges par brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:209a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi dus dang sgrub pa'i dus su sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya dgos te /
T02TD2589E:209a-23: gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la /
T02TD2589E:209a-25: sngags rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2589E:209a-26: sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya //
T02TD2589E:209a-27: sbyin sreg med par las rnams la //
T02TD2589E:209a-29: de bas sbyin sreg las rnams la //
T02TD2589E:209a-30: sngags pas 'bad pa chen po bya //
T02TD2589E:209a-31: de la spyin sreg gi thab khung ni //
T02TD2589E:209a-32: sems can gyi dbye bas ni mtha' yas so //
T02TD2589E:209a-33: rigs kyi dbye ba las ni rnam pa lnga'am /
T02TD2589E:209a-34: bzhi thab khung rnam par dbye ste /
T02TD2589E:209a-35: 'di ni thab khung gtan la dbab pa'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-0: rgya cher rdo rje khro bo snyoms par 'jug pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud las thab khung gi rnam pa brgya @209b rtsa bcur gsungs so //
T02TD2589E:209b-1: las kyi dbye bas 'di lta ste //
T02TD2589E:209b-16: sdig par rab tu gzhig pa dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-17: rig pa rjes su chags par bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-19: rig sngags gzi byin bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-21: de la zhi ba la kun nas zlum po'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-22: rgyas pa la ni zur bzhi'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-23: mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mo //
T02TD2589E:209b-24: dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-25: dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-26: nor dang 'bru dgug pa la ni rin po che lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-27: 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi ni mtshan lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-28: mi snang bar bya ba ni mda' gzhu lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-29: bka' bzhin byed pa ni ral gri lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-30: sdig pa rab tu gzhig pa ni rta babs dang bcas pa'i rtsig pa'am 'obs lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-31: rig pa rjes su chags par bya ba ni rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-32: nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-33: rig sngags kyi gzi byin bskyed pa la ni rab tu 'bar ba lta bu'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-34: dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa ni 'khor lo lta bu ji lta ba nyid dam //
T02TD2589E:209b-35: de'i dkyil 'khor rnams lta bu yin no //
T02TD2589E:209b-36: de bzhin du thun mong gi brko ba'i cho ga las /
T02TD2589E:209b-37: sbyin sreg gi cho ga thams cad la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi zur pa bzhi pa dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-38: sgo bzhi par thig btab la shar phyogs su rdo rjes spras pa dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-39: lhor rin po ches spras pa dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-40: nub tu padmas spras pa dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-41: byang du padma rdo rjes spras par byas la /
T02TD2589E:209b-42: der shar phyogs su padma dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-46: rigs kyi pags pa ste phyag rgya lnga bri'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-47: lho phyogs su mdud rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2589E:209b-50: thor tshugs dang mi ste phyag rgya bri'o //
T02TD2589E:209b-53: ral gri dang phub ste phyag rgya lnga bri'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-5: ra skyes te phyag rgya lnga bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thab khung brkos la thab kyi nang du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya'am /
T02TD2589E:210a-7: dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'i sbyor bas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-8: dkyil 'khor gti cho ga bzhin du ba srung ba la sogs pa thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2589E:210a-9: sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi khad par gyi las dang rjes su mthun par tshim par byas la /
T02TD2589E:210a-10: rang nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-11: zhi la aom sarbba du kho ba sha mi ne sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-12: yungs kar la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-13: rgyas pa la aom badzra pu sha ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:210a-14: zhes bya ba dang 'bras la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-15: mngon spyod la ni aom su mabha ni sumabha h'um /
T02TD2589E:210a-17: grihan'a pa ya h'um a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'ana bidy'a r'a dza m'a ra ya h'um phat ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-18: mi rus kyi phyi ma la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-19: sdig pa rab tu gzhil ba la /
T02TD2589E:210a-20: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:210a-22: til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-23: nor dang 'brul sogs pa dgu ga pa la ni /
T02TD2589E:210a-26: dikam badzra pushta ye sv'aa h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-29: aom aa pra ti ha ta dz'a ya sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-30: ku sha'i myu gu til mar la btags pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-31: tshe 'phel ba la ni aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-32: d'u wa'i myu gu la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-34: aom badzra a'a karsha ya sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-35: ku ba tsa ka'i tsher ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-36: dkyil 'khor bcing ba la ni h'um badzra bha nadha ya bam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-37: lcags kyi phye ba ma sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-39: aom badzra m'a ra ya h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-40: dur khrod kyi thal ba la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-41: dbang du bya ba la ni //
T02TD2589E:210a-42: aom badzra ba shi ku ru ye sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD2589E:210a-43: me tog dmar po la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210a-45: aom badzra k'a ma r'u pe ni aam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210a-46: shing dregs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210b-0: chags par bya ba la ni aom badzra @210b a'a r'a ga na ya ho zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210b-1: me skyur po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2589E:210b-3: aom khe tsa ri ni ha ha ha zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210b-4: mand'a ra pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210b-5: bka' bzhin bsgrub pa la ni /
T02TD2589E:210b-6: h'um badzra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210b-7: rdo rje can gyi me tog la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210b-8: mi snang bar bya ba la ni /
T02TD2589E:210b-9: aom badzra a'a darsha na y'a aam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210b-10: 'bras bu mi snang ba la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210b-11: rigs sngags gzi brjid bskyed pa la /
T02TD2589E:210b-12: aom badzra rtha siddha ye sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210b-14: don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga la ni /
T02TD2589E:210b-15: aom siddhi su siddhi ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:210b-17: dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa la ni /
T02TD2589E:210b-18: aom mandala aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:210b-19: aom mandala siddhi ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:210b-23: aom bhur bhu ba sva: h'a /
T02TD2589E:210b-24: aom sva sti sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:210b-25: sva sti ka'i me tog la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2589E:210b-27: shin tu rgya cher che ba ba ni ma yin no //
T02TD2589E:210b-28: mdor bsdus na ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i me lha rnam pa bcu gnyis su bstan te /
T02TD2589E:210b-30: ye shes me nyid dang dang po ste /
T02TD2589E:210b-31: de ni dbang chen zhes su bsgrags //
T02TD2589E:210b-32: kha dog ser po'i mdog can la //
T02TD2589E:210b-33: mdog dang rgyas dang stobs kyang ster //
T02TD2589E:210b-35: ye shes rdzogs byed shes par bya //
T02TD2589E:210b-36: gnyis pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste //
T02TD2589E:210b-37: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mnyam //
T02TD2589E:210b-38: dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po gon //
T02TD2589E:210b-39: bgrang phreng dang ni gundhe thogs //
T02TD2589E:210b-40: gsum pa rlung zhes bya ba ste //
T02TD2589E:210b-41: kha dog nag po rtsub pa'o //
T02TD2589E:210b-42: bzhi pa dmar po zhes bya ste //
T02TD2589E:210b-43: nub ka'i mtshams kyi dmar thag 'dra //
T02TD2589E:210b-44: lnga pa mi 'da' zhes bya ba //
T02TD2589E:210b-45: spun la kha dog dam pa ste /
T02TD2589E:210b-46: mgrin par ring la gzi brjid che //
T02TD2589E:210b-47: thams cad la ni phan 'dogs pa'i //
T02TD2589E:210b-48: drug pa khro bo zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2589E:210b-49: mi g-yon dud pa'i kha dog can //
T02TD2589E:210b-50: gyen du ska brdzes sgra chen 'byin //
T02TD2589E:210b-51: mche ba bzhi pa stobs po che //
T02TD2589E:210b-52: bdun pa ltos ba zhes bya ste /
T02TD2589E:210b-53: rno la kha dog kun dang ldan //
T02TD2589E:210b-54: brgyad pa zad byed ces bya ste //
T02TD2589E:211a-2: / dgug pa yid las skyes zhes bya //
T02TD2589E:211a-3: sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che //
T02TD2589E:211a-5: sha za'i mi ni de las gzhan //
T02TD2589E:211a-6: bcu gcig par ni shes par bya //
T02TD2589E:211a-7: 'dod med dbang gi las can no //
T02TD2589E:211a-8: rmugs byed ces pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD2589E:211a-9: sems can rmongs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2589E:211a-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las skyes //
T02TD2589E:211a-11: las kyi rjes mthun gsang sngags dang //
T02TD2589E:211a-12: phyag rgya'i sbyor bar ldan pa yi //
T02TD2589E:211a-13: kun dang las don sgrub byed pa'o //
T02TD2589E:211a-14: de nas shin tu bsdus pa ni //
T02TD2589E:211a-15: rnam pa bzhi ru yongs bsgrags pa//
T02TD2589E:211a-16: sems can mos pa'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD2589E:211a-17: cho ga 'di ni bsdus pa yin //
T02TD2589E:211a-18: thab dang lha yi grangs dang ni //
T02TD2589E:211a-19: mdor bsdus 'bring dang rgyas pa ru //
T02TD2589E:211a-20: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:211a-21: 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2589E:211a-22: de las shin tu bsdus pa zlum po la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:211a-26: zla ba phyed pa lta bu la khru gcig pa dang /
T02TD2589E:211a-34: las dang rdzas dang rjes su mthun par thob kyi tshad byas pa yin no ;
T02TD2589E:211a-35: /'dir thab khung rnam pa bzhir rdzas dang las kyi dbye ba las so sor nges pa yin gyi las thams cad pa'i thab khung ni mi snang ngo //
T02TD2589E:211a-38: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi'o //
T02TD2589E:211a-39: dbang ba la ni gru gsum mo //
T02TD2589E:211a-40: mngon spyod la ni gru gsum zla ba phyed pa dang ldan pa'o ;
T02TD2589E:211a-41: / de la gdon dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang /
T02TD2589E:211a-42: rims dang bgegs kyis zin pa zha bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2589E:211a-46: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pas na /
T02TD2589E:211a-47: zhi ba'i las zhes bshad do //
T02TD2589E:211a-56: gser 'gyur gyi rtsi la sogs pa grub pa ni rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:211a-57: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi'am ci dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-0: skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa dang rgyal po bran g-yog @211b dang bcas pa dbang du byed pas na dbang ngo //
T02TD2589E:211b-1: gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-5: yan lag bcad pa ni mngon spyod do //
T02TD2589E:211b-6: las kyi tshogs de dag nges par shes par byas la //
T02TD2589E:211b-7: las thams cad dgug pa'i thab khung du thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2589E:211b-8: de nas yang rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-9: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-10: 'khor los dbus su mtshan pas na //
T02TD2589E:211b-11: las thams cad pa zhes zer mod kyi de ni mi rigs te /
T02TD2589E:211b-12: phyag rgya gang yin pa lha yin la /
T02TD2589E:211b-13: lha gang yin pa de nyid phyag rgya yin pas na /
T02TD2589E:211b-14: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-15: m'a ma k'i'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2589E:211b-16: rin po che ni rin chen 'byung dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-17: rin chen sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2589E:211b-18: padma ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-19: gos dkar mo'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2589E:211b-20: sna tshogs rdo rje ni don yod grub pa dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-21: sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2589E:211b-22: 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-23: sangs rgyas spyan gyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2589E:211b-24: rigs pa 'dis na las thams cad pa nyid de /
T02TD2589E:211b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyid las /
T02TD2589E:211b-26: las thams cad pa 'di ci zhig rigs zhes la la dag zer ro //
T02TD2589E:211b-27: de yang rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyu las ni //
T02TD2589E:211b-28: thab gru bzhi pa de nyid las thams cad pa'i thab khung yin par bshad de //
T02TD2589E:211b-29: de nyid dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las bkag ste /
T02TD2589E:211b-30: rdzing bu'i dbyibs lta bur glu dang gsang ba rnams kyi lus bsreg pa dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-31: yan lag gzhig pa'i don du ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:211b-32: thab khung gru bzhi pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las //
T02TD2589E:211b-33: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2589E:211b-34: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2589E:211b-35: zur bzhi pa la khru gang tsam /
T02TD2589E:211b-36: zabs su de'i phyed tsam brkos te /
T02TD2589E:211b-37: thab khung gi steng du sor bzhi tsam dor bar dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi pa'i kun du mnyam pa'i kha khyer la ;
T02TD2589E:211b-38: phyogs rnams su lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2589E:211b-42: mtshams su zla ba kham pa dang /
T02TD2589E:212a-0: rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes mtshan la thab kyi dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa thab pas cung zad dma' ba 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje brgyad lte ba'i ge sar la rdo rje rtse lnga pa @212a * //
T02TD2589E:212a-1: phyed nub phyed bgreng ba ste /
T02TD2589E:212a-2: 'di dag ni rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD2589E:212a-3: thab khung de nyid rje btsun rnam par snam snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa rgyud chen po dang dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po dang /
T02TD2589E:212a-4: kun nas dbang bskur bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang //
T02TD2589E:212a-5: phyag na rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las gsungs pa ni //
T02TD2589E:212a-6: rdo rje brgyad dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2589E:212a-7: dbus su rdo rje chen po bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2589E:212a-8: rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pas kyang rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las //
T02TD2589E:212a-9: dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag / ces gsungs pas //
T02TD2589E:212a-10: thab khung de nyid las thams cad yin par bshad do //
T02TD2589E:212a-11: dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las ni padma lta bu'i dbyibs can gyi thab khung las thams cad pa yin par bshad do //
T02TD2589E:212a-12: bud med dang rgyal po'i bu mo dang /
T02TD2589E:212a-15: don thams cad ni padma'i dbyibs lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2589E:212a-17: padma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang /
T02TD2589E:212a-18: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las padma'i dbyibs can thab khung de nyid las thams cad pa yin par gsungs te /
T02TD2589E:212a-19: thab khung 'di ni zlum po la khor khor yug khru gang tsam la 'og tu khru phyed par brkos par dbus kyi 'dab ma la padma brgyad kyis bskor ba //
T02TD2589E:212a-20: thab kyi steng du sor bzhi dor ba dpangs dang rgyar song bzhi pa thab khung nas byung ba'i padma kha bye ba lta bu'i kha khyer la //
T02TD2589E:212a-21: kha khyer gyi rgyab tu padma'i phreng bas bskor ba //
T02TD2589E:212a-22: thab kyi dbus kyi phyogs kyi padma rnams la rdo rje dang //
T02TD2589E:212a-25: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgya dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:212a-26: mtshams kyi padma la mig gnyis dang rdo rje rtse gsum dang //
T02TD2589E:212a-28: dbus kyi padma la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dgod do //
T02TD2589E:212a-29: thab khung gi nang gi tha mar rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'i thab khung ni las thams cad pa'i thab bo //
T02TD2589E:212a-30: gzhan dag gis thams cad pa'i thub khung gzhan dag tu yang 'chad do //
T02TD2589E:212a-31: rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa //
T02TD2589E:212b-0: @212b 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni don thams cad rdzogs pa yin par bshad de //
T02TD2589E:212b-3: sku mdog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rten dang brten pa po'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02TD2589E:212b-4: de la shar phyogs kyi zhal ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid de dkar po zhi bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2589E:212b-5: lho'i zhal ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2589E:212b-6: ser po rgyas pa 'phel bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2589E:212b-7: nub kyi zhal ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD2589E:212b-8: dmar po 'gro ba rnams dbang du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2589E:212b-9: byang gi zhal ni bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid de //
T02TD2589E:212b-10: nag po nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams dang /
T02TD2589E:212b-11: bdud kyi dgra bo thams cad zad par mdzad pa ste mngon spyod do //
T02TD2589E:212b-15: mngon spyod kyi las rnams rdzogs par byed pas na //
T02TD2589E:212b-16: thab gcig la las thams cad pa'i thub khung du bshad do //
T02TD2589E:212b-17: de lta na ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba la don med de //
T02TD2589E:212b-18: thab gcig tu las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na ;
T02TD2589E:212b-19: / don med pa ma yin te //
T02TD2589E:212b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis legs par las byed pas na /
T02TD2589E:212b-21: dkyil 'khor thams cad zhi ba'i las la bskur zhing bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas zhi zhes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:212b-22: de bzhin du rgyas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:212b-25: de bas na mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am /
T02TD2589E:212b-26: dgongs pa'i dbang gis nye bar gzung ba yin no //
T02TD2589E:212b-27: thab khung so so'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:212b-28: de la zhi ba la ni sa gzhi dkar po la rgyar khru gang tsam brkos la zhabs su sor bcu gnyis pa de'i dbus su padma'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad pa thab kyi steng bar du song bzhi dor ba dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba la mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2589E:212b-29: thab de sa gzhi dkar po dang ba'i lci bas byugs la /
T02TD2589E:212b-30: yang de gnyis dri dkar pos nye bar byug cing me tog dkar pos gtor ba dus gsum bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213a-0: rgyas pa la ni sa gzhi ser po la rgyar @213a * //
T02TD2589E:213a-1: khru do zabs su khru gang zur bzhi pa'am /
T02TD2589E:213a-2: rin po che zur brgyad pa dang 'dra bar brkos la de'i steng du sor brgyad pa'i kha khyer dbyibs de dang 'dra bar bskor la khung bur 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte ba rdo rje rin po che sor drug pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2589E:213a-3: sa ser po dang dri ser pos thab dang sa gzhi de byugs la /
T02TD2589E:213a-4: me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213a-5: mngon spyod la ni rtsub cing gas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:213a-6: shin tu gnag pa'i sa gzhi la gru gsum pa zla gam gnyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa sor nyi shu pa zabs su sor bcu pa //
T02TD2589E:213a-7: thab kyi mgo byang du blta ba /
T02TD2589E:213a-8: 'og tu rtse gsum pa'i steng du khro bo'i rdo rje sor brgyad pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2589E:213a-9: de'i steng du sor gsum dor bar dpangs dang rgyar sor gsum dor ba //
T02TD2589E:213a-10: kha phyir bltas pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba /
T02TD2589E:213a-11: sa nag po dang ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02TD2589E:213a-12: bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa la sogs pa ci snyed pas byugs la /
T02TD2589E:213a-13: dri mi zhim pa'i dri dang me tog sngon po'am /
T02TD2589E:213a-16: dbang la ni sa gzhi dmar po la thab kyi dbyi bas bha ga lta bu rdo rje dang padmas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2589E:213a-17: dgug pa la ni rdo rje rtse gcig lta bus dbus su rdo rje dang rin po ches mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2589E:213a-18: de dang 'dra ba'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor bas dmar po dang dri dmar pos byugs pa //
T02TD2589E:213a-19: me tog dmar pos nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:213a-20: 'di gnyis kyi zabs dang rgya'i tshad la sogs pa ni zhi ba'i thab khung dang 'dra ba las thams cad pa'i thab khung kyang de bzhin te 'on kyang kha khyer ni padma kha bye ba lta bu la rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba dbus su rdo rje dang /
T02TD2589E:213a-23: sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su 'khor lo dang ldan pas mtshan pa'o zhes pa la la dag brjod do //
T02TD2589E:213a-24: dkyil 'khor ram lha'i khang pa'i shar phyogs su zhi ba'i thab khung /
T02TD2589E:213a-26: nub tu dbang du bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:213a-27: nub tu dbang du bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:213a-29: byang du mngon spyod kyi thab khung bya zhing /
T02TD2589E:213a-30: tshon rtsi rnams kyang las dang rjes su mthun par brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213a-32: de nas thab khung gi gnas rab tu shis pa'i chu shing lo ma'am /
T02TD2589E:213a-33: mtshan dang ldan zhing shin tu sar pa'i gos dang /
T02TD2589E:213b-0: padma'i 'dab mas thab kyi mthar thug bar g-yogs @213b par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-1: de nas ku sha dgram par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:213b-2: rtsa ba nas bton zhing ma nyam pa 'bus ma zos pa shin tu gsar zhing sngo ba'i ku shas g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-3: dang po shar du rtse bstan gzhag / gnyis pa lho phyogs kha ba bltas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-4: gsum pa'i rtse mo nub tu ste //
T02TD2589E:213b-5: bzhi pa rtse mo byang du'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-6: don kun bsgrub pa'i ku sha yis //
T02TD2589E:213b-7: thab kyi shar nas dang por g-yogs //
T02TD2589E:213b-8: 'dir ku sha blang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02TD2589E:213b-9: ai ngam ku sha shu bha dhi bhya p'u ta pra hma bi ba tren /
T02TD2589E:213b-10: buddha dharmm'a sam gha ti pri thvisanydza ta ga rbha aa bi ghn'an ma ma sh'annim kurbandu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:213b-11: gsang sngags 'di ku sha la lan bdun bzlas la sngar bshad pa'i cho gas dgram par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-12: 'dab dang ku sha'i tshogs dgram pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-13: zhib la ni pa la sha dang au dum w'a ra dang /
T02TD2589E:213b-19: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa shing 'o ma can las byung ba /
T02TD2589E:213b-20: 'dab ma dang bcas pa mnyam por bcad pa /
T02TD2589E:213b-21: rtse mo'i cha las byung ba'i mtho gang tsam gyi yam shing la sbreng rtsi dang mar la rtse mo gnyis btags la /
T02TD2589E:213b-22: dri dkar po'i spos chus bkrus pa rtse mo 'dab ma gnyis dang bcas pa ste /
T02TD2589E:213b-23: rtse gcig pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-24: rnying pa dang lo ma med pa dang /
T02TD2589E:213b-34: srog chags dang bcas pa rnams ni spang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-46: pri yang ku'i me tog dang /
T02TD2589E:213b-49: ge sar dang thang chu dri zhim pa ci snyed pa las sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:213b-50: rgyas pa la ni yam shing de rnams de nyid las sboms su chag gang la srid du khru gang tsam 'o ma dang zho dang /
T02TD2589E:213b-51: mar la btags te dri zhim po'i spos chu la sbyangs la //
T02TD2589E:213b-52: mngar gsum la btags pa'i 'bras chan bzang po'i bshos dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-2: zho dang 'bras chan mar dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-9: mngon spyod la ni nim pa dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-14: de las gzhan pa'i shing kha ba dang tshe ma can dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-15: rob ba sregs pa'i thal ba can dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-16: mgal dum gyi yam shing rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba gas pa sor bcu'i tshad tsam //
T02TD2589E:214a-17: dug dang khrag dang yungs ma la btags pa'i rtse mo gnyi ga rno ba dang ;
T02TD2589E:214a-25: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-27: bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-29: bya rog la sogs pa'i gshogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-33: mi rus kyi phye ma dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-34: sbrang rtsi la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-36: rdzas re re zhing dug dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-40: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba la btags pa'i rdzas de rnams thal ba dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-41: sol ba'am phub ma las dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD2589E:214a-42: gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:214a-43: dbang gi las la ni tsam pa ka dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-47: la ku tsa la sogs pa'i yam shing sor lnga pa la 'dab ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-49: me tog skyur po rnams dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-50: gzhan yang rang gi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:214a-51: dgug pa la ni de nyid dang tsher ma lcags kyu lta bu'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:214a-52: au dum w'a ra pa la sha //
T02TD2589E:214a-53: plaksha dang ni n+ya gro dha //
T02TD2589E:214a-54: seng ldeng dang ni aa rka dang //
T02TD2589E:214a-55: aa mra be ta ka ta dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-56: aa ma dya dang sha mi dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-57: aa pa ma rka las byung dang /
T02TD2589E:214a-58: aa shvadtha dang bcas pa ni //
T02TD2589E:214a-59: yam sreg shing ni bcu gnyis bstan //
T02TD2589E:214a-60: gsar zhing drang la mtho gang tsam //
T02TD2589E:214a-61: rtse gnyis dri zhim legs par btags //
T02TD2589E:214a-62: yam shing dag ni rtse gcig tu //
T02TD2589E:214a-63: las rnams kun la bsreg par bya //
T02TD2589E:214a-64: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gang cung zad //
T02TD2589E:214b-0: @214b gang yang rgyas pa'i bsreg bya dang /
T02TD2589E:214b-1: bdag gi zangs te de dag kun //
T02TD2589E:214b-2: nyin re sv'a h'a'i mthar bcas dbul //
T02TD2589E:214b-3: mar la btags pa'i gu gul dang /
T02TD2589E:214b-4: s'a la'i thang chu la sogs pa //
T02TD2589E:214b-5: gsang sngags lha yi bye brag gis //
T02TD2589E:214b-6: sbyin sreg la ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD2589E:214b-7: dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa //
T02TD2589E:214b-8: las thun rang sngags ji bzhin bzla //
T02TD2589E:214b-9: rdzas rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2589E:214b-10: zhi ba la ni mchod sbyin gyi shing srog chags med pa rnams la thab khung las cung zad dma' ba'am /
T02TD2589E:214b-11: dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba'i bud shing bya'o //
T02TD2589E:214b-12: rgyas pa la ni dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba ma gtogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i bud shing rnams 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:214b-13: mngon spyod la ni khab dang /
T02TD2589E:214b-15: dri mi zhim pa'i bud shing dan dur khrod kyi shing ngam /
T02TD2589E:214b-16: bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa'am /
T02TD2589E:214b-18: dbang dbu bya ba la ni ni mba dang /
T02TD2589E:214b-19: aa mra'i shing dang gzhan yang me tog dang bcas pa'i shing ngo //
T02TD2589E:214b-20: dgug pa la ni tsher ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:214b-21: las thams cad pa la ni las dang rjes su mthun pa'i bud shing gis bya'o //
T02TD2589E:214b-22: bud shing gi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2589E:214b-23: gser ram dngul lam rdo'am shing ngam //
T02TD2589E:214b-27: shel las byas pa'i snod legs par bkrus pa dri zhim pa'i spos kyis legs par bdugs pa'i mchod yon gyi snod du chu bo'am /
T02TD2589E:214b-33: bkod ma la sogs pa'i chu ngogs gtsang ma skye bo mang pos bsten pa ma yin pa //
T02TD2589E:214b-34: rgyal po dang nye ba ma yin pa //
T02TD2589E:214b-39: ma he dang glang po che rnams kyis smos par ma byas pa'i chu ngogs las //
T02TD2589E:214b-41: snod gzhan gyis ma reg pa //
T02TD2589E:214b-43: sme sha can dang bcas pas bsten pa'am //
T02TD2589E:214b-44: ngan cing dman pa la 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:214b-49: sha bkra la sogs pa'o nad kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyis ma mthong zhing ma reg pa'i chus mchod yon gyi snod bkang la /
T02TD2589E:215a-1: dz'a ti dang ma li ka la sogs pa'i me tog gis brgyan pa //
T02TD2589E:215a-2: spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa'i mchod yon legs par brdungs pa'i gser gyi gdu bu dang /
T02TD2589E:215a-3: gsang byed la sogs pa btags pa'i lag pa dang /
T02TD2589E:215a-5: rang gi rtog pa las bshad pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la g-yon phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-6: zhi ba la ni dri dkar po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu rang gi lha'i sngags sv'a h'a'i mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-7: de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni ser po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu til dang zho ru bcas pa aom gyi mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-8: mngon spyod la ni dri nag po dang sbyar ba'i chu khrag dang //
T02TD2589E:215a-10: ba gcin dang bcas pa la phat kyi mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-11: dbang la ni dri dmar po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu bo'i mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-12: dgug pa la ni dza'i mtha' dang cas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-13: thams cad du yang dri la sogs pa ni las dang rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-14: mchod yon gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2589E:215a-15: de nas zhin ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin dang //
T02TD2589E:215a-16: rdo rje rtse mo gnyis kyi sngags kyi las thams cad pa'i chu'i snod dang /
T02TD2589E:215a-17: mchod yon gyi snod la bzlas la rang gi g-yon phyogs su bzhag nas de dag nyid dang bzlas pa'i chus bsang ba'i bud shing la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi rdzas rnams rang gi g-yas phyogs su gzhag par bya'o ;
T02TD2589E:215a-18: / gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2589E:215a-19: rnam par dbye ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la ni bsad pa dang /
T02TD2589E:215a-20: dgod pa go bzlog ste bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-21: aom badzra yaksha h'um rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so //
T02TD2589E:215a-22: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung gi rtse mo gnyis mche bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:215a-23: khar gzhag pa 'di ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-24: aom badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so //
T02TD2589E:215a-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri 'degs par bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2589E:215a-26: rdzas gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2589E:215b-0: zhi ba la ni rang gi lha'i chos kyi yi ge las thab khung bskyed la de'i dbus su yi ge ram sum mdo @215b ris mtshan dang bcas pas aom las byung ba'i padma'i steng du gnas pa'i ai las byung ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa dung dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-1: kunda lta bu'i pa pa k'i me mig gsum pa ral pa cod pan du ldan pa lag pa bzhi g-yas pas dbyug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-3: g-yon na gundhe dang phreng ba thogs pa rgyan dang gos dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-4: mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:215b-5: lus kyi yan lag thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer dkar po 'phro bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215b-6: rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du 'od gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus na rgyas pa'i me dbang chen zhes bya ba ral pa dang cod pan thogs pa mig gsum pa //
T02TD2589E:215b-7: phyag bzhi pa g-yas na dbyug pa thogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-8: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa g-yon na phreng ba dang gundhe thogs pa rgyan dang gos dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-9: mchod phyir thogs ser por ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:215b-10: 'od zer ser po gtong ba'i tshogs kyis sems can ma lus pa'i khams kyi stobs dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-12: dpal rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi me bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215b-13: dbang du bya ba la ni de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng kha dog dmar zhing nyi ma 'char ka lta bur 'od zer dmar po rab tu 'gyed pa //
T02TD2589E:215b-14: lag pa bzhi pa g-yas na dbyug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-16: g-yon na zhags pa dang gundhe thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:215b-17: rgyan dang gos dang phreng ba dang /
T02TD2589E:215b-19: mchod phyir thogs pa dmar po dang ldan pa mig gsum pa /
T02TD2589E:215b-21: cod pan dang ldan pa'i dbang gi me dbang gi las la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:215b-22: mngon spyod la ni de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las byung ba'i mig gsum pa /
T02TD2589E:215b-23: lag pa bzhi pa du ba'i mdog can mi g-yo ba /
T02TD2589E:215b-24: g-yas na ral gri dang dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:215b-25: g-yon na zhags pa dang gundhe thogs pa /
T02TD2589E:216a-0: skra kham gyen du 'bar shas cher khro zhing mig dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa @216a * //
T02TD2589E:216a-2: khros shing shas cher 'jigs su rung ba rgyan dang gos dang /
T02TD2589E:216a-3: mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa nag po dang ldan pa /
T02TD2589E:216a-4: 'od zer nag po'i phreng ba rnams kyis srid pa gsum khyed par byed pa'i rlung zhes bya ba'i me gsad pa la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i las rnams la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-5: de la zhi ba la ni 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me'am rgyun bzhag gi me'am /
T02TD2589E:216a-6: bram ze tha mal pa'i mes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-7: rgyas pa la ni rgyal po'am /
T02TD2589E:216a-8: rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i me'am /
T02TD2589E:216a-9: dgon pa'i me'am nags mched pa'i mes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-10: mngon spyod la ni dur khrod kyi me'am /
T02TD2589E:216a-11: rus pa'am rdo las byung ba'i me'am /
T02TD2589E:216a-12: gdol pa'i khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-14: rje'u rigs kyi khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-15: dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang rol mo pa'am /
T02TD2589E:216a-16: lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-18: dgang gzar ni gser ram dngul gyi rgyu las byas pa'am /
T02TD2589E:216a-19: mchod sbyin gyi shing las byas pa padma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs lta bu de'i yu ba skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i mthe bo sor sum cu rtsa bzhi rdo rje khu tshur la sogs pas gzung du rung ba /
T02TD2589E:216a-20: de'i rtse mo'i char sor bzhi pa /
T02TD2589E:216a-22: zabs su sor gnyis pa dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2589E:216a-23: khu ba byung ba'i bu ga sor gcig tsam de'i mchu sor bzhi pa la rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2589E:216a-24: yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po che sor drug pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-25: blugs gzar ni yu ba khru gang tsam padma'i dbyibs lta bu la kha'i rgyar sor gnyis pa /
T02TD2589E:216a-26: zabs su sor gcig pa dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po che bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-27: dgang gzar med na sor mo lnga gzhi bas nas dgang blugs byas la /
T02TD2589E:216a-28: srin lag dang gung mo dang mthe bo gzhibs pas ni sreg blugs cig shos bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216a-29: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2589E:216a-30: de nas legs par khrus byas shing yan lag dris bsgos la ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyan dang /
T02TD2589E:216b-0: gos la sogs pa @216b dang ldan pas zhi ba dang /
T02TD2589E:216b-5: bskrad pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg gi las bya ba dang ldan zhing rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i yid kyis 'jigs pa med par sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pas ji skad du gsungs pa thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216b-6: de la zhi ba la ni gos dang cod pan dang /
T02TD2589E:216b-7: rgyan dkar po dang ldan zhing gsang byed dang bcas pa gdu bu dang bcas pas ji skad du bshad pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod bya zhing byams pa chen po dang ldan pas mi smra bar 'jam zhing bde pa'i stan nang tshangs can la padma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug nas /
T02TD2589E:216b-8: lag pa'i padma gnyis kyi gru mo'i mthar thug gi bar du dri zhim pos legs par byugs la /
T02TD2589E:216b-9: phyi dro'i dus su shar du bltas /
T02TD2589E:216b-10: blos bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
T02TD2589E:216b-11: ji srid bdag gam gzhan zhi bar mngon par 'dod pa zhi bar gyur pa de srid du zhi ba'i las bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216b-12: rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du phreng ba dang /
T02TD2589E:216b-13: byug pa dang gos ser po dang /
T02TD2589E:216b-14: rgyan sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang yid rab tu dga' bas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02TD2589E:216b-15: phyi ma'i nya'i bar du ji srid du mngon par 'dod pa rgyas par gyur pa de srid du byang du kha ba ltas te /
T02TD2589E:216b-16: dga' ba dang ldan pas snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216b-17: mngon spyod la ni khros shing rgyan dang gos sngon po'am /
T02TD2589E:216b-18: khrag gis spags [?] pa'i gos bgos la stan sra ba la lho phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02TD2589E:216b-19: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi brang la mnan pa'am /
T02TD2589E:216b-20: stan med par rkang pas rkang pa mnan zhing /
T02TD2589E:216b-23: gdong gnyer ma bsnyer ba dang /
T02TD2589E:216b-24: snying rje chen pos dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa'i bdud dang dgra rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2589E:216b-25: zla ba mar ngo'i nyin zhag gang yang rung ba la khro bo nyid tshad mar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:216b-26: nyi ma gung ngam mtshan phyed la mngon spyod kyi las bya'o //
T02TD2589E:216b-27: dbang la ni khro ba med pa dang /
T02TD2589E:217a-1: med par sems can ma lus pa gdon pa la chags pas gos rgyan dmar po dang ldan pas stan bde ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
T02TD2589E:217a-2: kha nub bam byang du bltas la dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
T02TD2589E:217a-3: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol gyi sprul pa'i me lha la bod par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:217a-4: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs la de bzlas pa'i chu ku sha'i rtse mos blangs pas skor phyogs su lan gsum bsangs la gtsang zhing skam pa'i rtsva dang bcas pa'i bud shing btsug la rlung yab kyis rlung dang /
T02TD2589E:217a-5: aom dzva la h'um zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis sbar la /
T02TD2589E:217a-6: dam tshig sems dpa' thab kyi dbus su bsams nas /
T02TD2589E:217a-7: phyag rgya 'di sngags dang bcas pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:217a-8: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la /
T02TD2589E:217a-9: mthe bo'i rtse mo srin lag gi tshigs kyi rtsa bar bzhag la dgug pa'i tshul gyis yang dang yang du bskyod la mngon par 'dod pa'i me'i sngags 'don zhing spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:217a-10: ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de bi ra shi dvi dza sa ta ma /
T02TD2589E:217a-11: gri hi tv'a hu ti ma h'a ra smin sanni hi to bha b'a /
T02TD2589E:217a-12: aom p'a pa ka aagna ye nv'a h'a zhi ba la'o //
T02TD2589E:217a-13: rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du /
T02TD2589E:217a-14: aom ma he ndra aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:217a-16: aom ka ma aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:217a-18: aom kro dha aagna ye dza hi tro tra ya h'um /
T02TD2589E:217a-19: che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD2589E:217a-21: sngar bshad pa'i bsang gtor gyi chogs bsangs la mchod yon dbul lo //
T02TD2589E:217a-22: ai yam aa rgham m'a yam da ttam gri hna siddhi mme pra yatstsha sv'a h'a zhes brjod la lag pa gnyis kyis mdun du mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2589E:217a-23: zhabs la zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02TD2589E:217a-24: spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2589E:217a-25: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i bsrung ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2589E:217a-26: rigs thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du gyur pas /
T02TD2589E:217a-27: rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi snying po lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar gyis nye bar gsal bar sbar la /
T02TD2589E:217a-28: de'i lce dang dgang gzar dang blug gzar gyi kha la de nyid kyi sa bon rnam par bkod de /
T02TD2589E:217b-0: pus mo gnyis kyi bar du lag @217b pa bcug la dang por blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum zhi ba dang /
T02TD2589E:217b-1: rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa'i las la zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo //
T02TD2589E:217b-2: mngon spyod la shin tu gdangs par dug dang bcas pa'i yungs mar dbul lo //
T02TD2589E:217b-3: gnas skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD2589E:217b-4: la la ni spyan gnyis la dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:217b-5: bltas pa tsam nyid kyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:217b-6: la la ni dpral bar ro //
T02TD2589E:217b-8: la la ni thugs kar ro //
T02TD2589E:217b-9: la la ni lte ba'i gnas su'o //
T02TD2589E:217b-10: la la ni mdun du dbul bar bya'o zhes sna tshogs par rtog par byed pa'i gnas rab tu dgag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2589E:217b-11: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las gnas kyi nges pa mdzad pa yin te /
T02TD2589E:217b-13: zas ni zos par gyur pa yis //
T02TD2589E:217b-14: yid dga' ba la sogs par 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:217b-15: de bas 'bad pa chen po yis //
T02TD2589E:217b-16: sbyin sreg las ni nges par bya //
T02TD2589E:217b-18: de bas na zas kyi bya ba byed par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:217b-19: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2589E:217b-20: ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po ni rin po che bdud kyi rgyu las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du kha dog dang dri dang ro rnams dang ldan pa phan zhing bde bar rnam par 'ju ba'i zas la spyod par byed do //
T02TD2589E:217b-21: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po yang stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2589E:217b-23: smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i gling chen po bzhir gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mdzad pa /
T02TD2589E:217b-24: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che'i snod du gsang sngags kyi yi ge thams cad dang ldan pa dri nga ba thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri dang ldan pa zhi ba dang /
T02TD2589E:218a-0: drag po la sogs pa'i ro thams cad dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar rnam par @218a * //
T02TD2589E:218a-1: smin pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi la longs spyod do //
T02TD2589E:218a-2: snod rnams ni las dang rjes su mthun par bya ste /
T02TD2589E:218a-3: de la snod kyi nges pa'i rim pa 'di yin no //
T02TD2589E:218a-4: zhi ba la ni dngul gyi snod do //
T02TD2589E:218a-5: rgyas pa la ni gser gyi snod do //
T02TD2589E:218a-6: dbang la ni zangs kyi snod do//
T02TD2589E:218a-7: mngon spyod la ni khar ba'i snod dam lcags kyi snod kyi phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga la brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:218a-8: nang gi sbyin sreg gi rim pa ni 'di yin no //
T02TD2589E:218a-9: 'di ltar phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg la las dang rjes su mthun par snod rnams bsams la lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang /
T02TD2589E:218a-10: mthe'u chung lcags sgrog tu sprel pas /
T02TD2589E:218a-11: blugs gzar bzung la sor mo lhag ma rnams yu ba'i steng du bzhag la /
T02TD2589E:218a-12: shin tu sbyangs shing legs par bzhu ba'i mar gyi dgang blugs phul la dge ba dang mi dge pa'i mtshan ma brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:218a-13: dbyibs dang mdog dang mdog dang dri dag las //
T02TD2589E:218a-14: dge dang mi dge yongs brtags la //
T02TD2589E:218a-15: dang po byas nas shes byas la /
T02TD2589E:218a-16: mtshan ma ngan pa zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:218a-17: zhi ba yi ni cho ga yis //
T02TD2589E:218a-18: mnyam par bzhag la sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2589E:218a-19: nyes pa'i dogs pa las 'das na //
T02TD2589E:218a-20: phyi nas las rnams brtsam par bya //
T02TD2589E:218a-21: dbyibs ni glang po che dang /
T02TD2589E:218a-34: blugs gzar lta bu bsngags so //
T02TD2589E:218a-37: byi ru bcag pa lta bu dang /
T02TD2589E:218a-41: gser zhun ma lta bu dang nyi ma 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2589E:218a-42: g-yas su 'khyil zhing shin tu snum pa bsngags so //
T02TD2589E:218a-43: sgra ni char sprin gyi 'brug sgra dang /
T02TD2589E:218a-56: ngang pa dang rma bya la sogs pa lta bur yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dag bsngags so //
T02TD2589E:218b-5: gla rtsi la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i dri bsngags so //
T02TD2589E:218b-6: de dag las bzlog pa ni bsngags pa ma yin te /
T02TD2589E:218b-7: dbyibs ni mdung rtse lta bu dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-9: ba lang gi mgo lta bu la sogs pa ni mi shis shing smad par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2589E:218b-10: mdog ni kha dog ngan pa dang //
T02TD2589E:218b-17: pa la sha la sogs pa'i mdog ni mi shis so //
T02TD2589E:218b-18: dri ni mi ro'i dri dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-19: dri ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i smad pa'i rdul dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-24: nya'i zhag la sogs pa'i dri ni smad pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:218b-26: khyi dang ce sbyang dang la sogs pa dang 'dra zhing 'ur 'ur po dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-27: sim sim zer ba'i sgra ni mi shis pa yin no //
T02TD2589E:218b-31: cung zad cung zad 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-34: rtsub cing gnag pa sprin dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-35: pa la sha'i mdog can ni smad par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2589E:218b-36: de ltar bgegs dang bcas shes nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas bsang zhing rnam par sbyangs la yang dag par gsungs te /
T02TD2589E:218b-37: mar gyi dgang blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:218b-38: yang rang gi sngags kyis bsangs la /
T02TD2589E:218b-39: dang por blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum mam /
T02TD2589E:218b-40: bdun me'i rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2589E:218b-41: blugs gzar la sogs pas mar la sogs pa'i dgang blugs gsum mam /
T02TD2589E:218b-43: 'dir rim par ni yam shing gis me 'bar ba byas pa la mar dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-45: de'i 'og tu 'bras chan la sogs pa de nas zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal du bya'o //
T02TD2589E:218b-46: yam shing dang mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02TD2589E:218b-47: zho dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang /
T02TD2589E:218b-48: 'thor 'thung dang til la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o //
T02TD2589E:219a-1: yon dang mar me mdun du dbul bar bya'o zhes la la dag zer ro //
T02TD2589E:219a-2: de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2589E:219a-3: me lha thab khung du 'bar ba'i rnam pa'am /
T02TD2589E:219a-4: rang gi gzugs kyis me'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219a-5: 'di la log par bsgrub pa dag yod de /
T02TD2589E:219a-6: la la ni thab kyi phyi rol du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do //
T02TD2589E:219a-7: la la ni gshegs su gsol ba dag byed do //
T02TD2589E:219a-8: la la ni thab khung de nyid kyi nang du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do //
T02TD2589E:219a-9: de las thab kyi phyi rol du 'jog pa dang gshegs su gsol ba ni mi rigs te /
T02TD2589E:219a-10: lha rnams zhal ni me yin te //
T02TD2589E:219a-11: spyin sreg de nyid me la gnas //
T02TD2589E:219a-12: sbyin sreg gis ni tshim byas nas //
T02TD2589E:219a-13: dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:219a-14: zhes gsungs pas mes stong par sbyor sreg byed pa ni mi ro'i khar zan stobs pa dang 'dra bar don med par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2589E:219a-16: me yi gnas ni mi shes par //
T02TD2589E:219a-17: gang zhig sbyin sreg las byed pa //
T02TD2589E:219a-18: de ni sbyin sreg las byas min //
T02TD2589E:219a-21: thab khung gi phyogs gcig tu bkod pa dang /
T02TD2589E:219a-22: 'bar ba'i rnam par yongs su gyur par byas pa la yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha mi snang bar 'gyur bas mi rigs so //
T02TD2589E:219a-23: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi me lce yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa /
T02TD2589E:219a-24: shes par kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las ma lus pa'i gzhir gyur pa /
T02TD2589E:219a-25: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang /
T02TD2589E:219a-26: padma'i steng du rang gi lha'i sa bon gyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan ma las byung ba'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan dang kha dog la sogs pa bsams la /
T02TD2589E:219a-27: yang dag par mchod cing 'thor 'thung sngon du 'gro bas dgang blugs la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219a-29: me gnas kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2589E:219a-30: de la zhi ba la ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg gi yo byad rnams bsangs la /
T02TD2589E:219b-0: me thab kyi dbus su sku @219b mdog dkar zhing zhi ba /
T02TD2589E:219b-1: na bza' dkar po bsnams pa /
T02TD2589E:219b-3: padma dkar po la bzhugs par aom badzra dh'a tu sv'a h'a zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcas pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219b-4: rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan zhal dgyes shing mgu ba /
T02TD2589E:219b-5: na bza' ser po bsnams shing padma ser po la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219b-6: mngon spyod la ni de bzhin du gshin rje gshed du 'dug pa rgyan dang /
T02TD2589E:219b-7: na bza' nag po dang ldan zhing khros pa yi ge h'um las byung ba sngar bshad pa'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219b-8: dbang la ni ho las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pa rgyan dang na bza' dmar po dang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219b-9: dgug pa la ni de bzhin du yi ge dza las rdo rje rgyal po bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219b-10: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219b-11: de nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02TD2589E:219b-14: rdo rje dang rkang mgyogs dang /
T02TD2589E:219b-16: gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud len la sogs pa dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir cho ga 'dis gsang sngags tshim par bya ba dang /
T02TD2589E:219b-18: yang dag par 'bar bar byas la de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:219b-19: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngogs gnyis kyi la las rang gi lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la padma'i sbubs kyi nang du bcug ste /
T02TD2589E:219b-20: tshon gyis byugs nas padma'i skud pas dkris la mar dang sbrang rtsis nang bkang ste /
T02TD2589E:219b-23: padma sar phye mar btags pas gtor la /
T02TD2589E:219b-24: ga phur dang bdug pas bdugs te zhag gcig smyung bar gnas la de'i 'og tu zhag gsum gsang sngags 'di dang dri dkar po dang sbyar ba'i chu rgyun phra bas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2589E:219b-25: aom sarba de ba aa tsa ti tya aa mrirta dha re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:219b-26: aom h'um phat ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:220a-1: gyis thams cad zhugs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2589E:220a-2: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo la bskyon te bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:220a-3: de ltar gsang sngags kyi lha tshim par byas na /
T02TD2589E:220a-4: dngos grub myur du stsol bar 'gyur ro /
T02TD2589E:220a-5: gzi brjid bskyed pa dang tshim par bya ba ni gsang sngags 'dis blugs gzar dang mar gyi sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o /
T02TD2589E:220a-7: de ltar sbyin sreg dang chu la gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD2589E:220a-8: mchod pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:220a-9: de la bsreg par bya ba ni mar dang til dang /
T02TD2589E:220a-13: gshegs su gsol ba'i rdzas ni padma dang /
T02TD2589E:220a-17: dz'a ti'i me tog gi rigs rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:220a-18: me tog de dag nyid kyis mchod pa dang sreg blugs kyang bya'o //
T02TD2589E:220a-19: de nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg gi grangs rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:220a-20: mtha' mar aom h'um hr'i: zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos mar gyi sreg blugs lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gzi brjid bskyed par bya'o /
T02TD2589E:220a-21: de'i mthar dgang blugs phul la /
T02TD2589E:220a-25: yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de /
T02TD2589E:220a-26: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la bzod par gsol te /
T02TD2589E:220a-27: de nas sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2589E:220a-28: aom mu: zhes brjod nas gyen du dkrol te /
T02TD2589E:220a-29: aom kri to ba sarbba sa tv'a tha //
T02TD2589E:220a-30: siddhi ma datt'a ya th'a nu ga //
T02TD2589E:220a-31: gatstsha tv'am buddh'a bi sha yam //
T02TD2589E:220a-32: pu na ra ga ma na yatstsha //
T02TD2589E:220a-33: zhes brjod la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol nas /
T02TD2589E:220a-34: sprul pa'i me thab kyi dbus su bsams la yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2589E:220a-35: bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa sbyin la sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma rnams sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2589E:220a-36: mthar dgang blugs pa dang 'thor 'thung yang byin nas bsang gtor yang byas la mchod nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la /
T02TD2589E:220b-0: me lha sngar bshad @220b pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid bcings la mthe bong bsgreng ste /
T02TD2589E:220b-1: ya hi ya hi zhes bya ba dang gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2589E:220b-2: de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gnas bsrung ba dang bdag bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD2589E:220b-3: yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas nas rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la legs par ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:220b-4: dngos grub ma lus 'byung gnyis mtshor gyur cing //
T02TD2589E:220b-5: dpag med bde bskyed sbyin sreg de nyid ni //
T02TD2589E:220b-6: 'jam bcas mi gnas grags pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD2589E:220b-7: sems can phan phyir yang dag bshad pa yin ;
T02TD2589E:220b-8: / de nyid dam par bshad pa'i kun stong bdag nyid thab khung ni //
T02TD2589E:220b-9: rnam pa kun du thog mtha' med pa'i padma rdo rje ldan //
T02TD2589E:220b-10: nam mkha'i ngos ltar yangs la btags pa tsam gyis sa bon la //
T02TD2589E:220b-11: blo ngan bsregs nas shin tu 'bar la nyon mongs zhir ba zhi //
T02TD2589E:220b-12: bde gshegs sras bcas sngags kyis 'bar ba'i gzi brjid 'phro bas 'khyud //
T02TD2589E:220b-13: srid pa gsum gyis thab tu 'dus byas dngos po thams cad bsreg / blo gros ngan pa shin tu bsregs pas kun rtog kun las grol //
T02TD2589E:220b-14: nyon mongs gdung bzhi bar bshad pa'i zhi ba'i gdugs su bgyis //
T02TD2589E:220b-15: nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu rnam rtog dra ba rnams //
T02TD2589E:220b-16: bsreg par bya zhes thub pa'i zla ba dag gis gsungs //
T02TD2589E:220b-17: bgegs dang dngos grub rnams ni rnam par rtog pa tsam //
T02TD2589E:220b-18: gnyid med de nyid du ni rnam par rtog pa'ang stong pa yin //
T02TD2589E:220b-19: phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis //
T02TD2589E:220b-20: rnam pa gnyis su 'dir bshad pa //
T02TD2589E:220b-21: sbyin sreg cho ga shes pa la //
T02TD2589E:220b-22: rnam pa kun du'ang dga' phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:220b-23: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par rjes 'gro rab gnas chos //
T02TD2589E:220b-24: de bzhin gshegs pas glegs bam rdo rje dril bu dag /'jig rten don dam mi shes 'di na'ang mgon po yis //
T02TD2589E:220b-25: 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas rab gnas mdzad pa yin //
T02TD2589E:220b-29: stang stabs dang bzlas brjod dang /
T02TD2589E:221a-0: slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul la de kho @221a * //
T02TD2589E:221a-1: na bcu yin par gsungs so //
T02TD2589E:221a-2: slob ma de nyid bcu shes shing //
T02TD2589E:221a-3: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD2589E:221a-4: sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga shes //
T02TD2589E:221a-5: las rnams kun la shin tu mkhas //
T02TD2589E:221a-6: lha khang mchod rten sku gzugs dang //
T02TD2589E:221a-7: dam chos glegs bam ras ris dag / zin cing thams cad rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2589E:221a-8: bde ba'i yon tan kun bskyed pa //
T02TD2589E:221a-9: shes nas mtshan nyid la mkhas pas //
T02TD2589E:221a-10: rab tu gnas pa byed par 'os //
T02TD2589E:221a-11: bsod nams 'phel par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:221a-12: gtsug lag khang sogs khyad 'phags bya //
T02TD2589E:221a-13: steng g-yogs mchod rten gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:221a-14: khyim dang lha yi khang par yang //
T02TD2589E:221a-15: sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas pa //
T02TD2589E:221a-16: cho ga las gsungs bzhin du bya //
T02TD2589E:221a-17: cho ga nyams par mi bya ste //
T02TD2589E:221a-18: rab gnas rtag tu smod pa dang //
T02TD2589E:221a-19: tshe 'dir sdug bsngal chen po dang //
T02TD2589E:221a-21: de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2589E:221a-22: bdag nyid kyis ni ci nus dang //
T02TD2589E:221a-23: de bzhin cho ga gsungs tshul gyis //
T02TD2589E:221a-24: kun nas rab tu 'bad de bya //
T02TD2589E:221a-25: de ltar byas na bsod nams che //
T02TD2589E:221a-26: mthong dang ma mthong skye 'gyur la //
T02TD2589E:221a-27: sngags pa bzang pos sku gzugs ni //
T02TD2589E:221a-28: dgos par gyur pa de las byung //
T02TD2589E:221a-29: gang du sku gzugs zin nas ni //
T02TD2589E:221a-30: yun rings nas kyang ma mchod na //
T02TD2589E:221a-31: ji srid mchod gnas ma gyur pas //
T02TD2589E:221a-32: de nas mi shis skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:221a-33: ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig / rigs dang mtshan nyid med pa dag //
T02TD2589E:221a-34: 'jig rten kun gyis bkur mi byed //
T02TD2589E:221a-35: sku gzugs dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:221a-36: sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas par //
T02TD2589E:221a-38: sngags dang bral bas thal bar ni //
T02TD2589E:221a-39: sbyin sreg byas bzhin 'bras bu med //
T02TD2589E:221a-40: de bzhin 'dir ni sngags me gnas //
T02TD2589E:221a-41: mchod gnas mchod par byed pa gang //
T02TD2589E:221a-42: las de yi ni rnam smin gyis //
T02TD2589E:221a-43: skye ba kun du mchod mi 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:221a-44: byang chub sems dpas gsol pa //
T02TD2589E:221a-45: bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir rab tu gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la rgyal bas rab tu gnas par mdzad //
T02TD2589E:221a-46: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2589E:221b-0: sangs rgyas @221b kun du gnas gyur kyang //
T02TD2589E:221b-1: de ni gang la'ang gnas pa med //
T02TD2589E:221b-2: nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du //
T02TD2589E:221b-3: gnas pa thams cad rab tu brtag /'jig rten kun rdzob la gnas nas //
T02TD2589E:221b-4: rab tu gnas par yongs brtags kyi //
T02TD2589E:221b-5: don dam tshul du gang zhig la //
T02TD2589E:221b-6: gang gis gang du rab gnas bya //
T02TD2589E:221b-7: gzod nas zhi zhing skye med la //
T02TD2589E:221b-8: 'di lta'i rab gnas ji ltar bya //
T02TD2589E:221b-9: sems can dang po'i las can gyi //
T02TD2589E:221b-10: rgyud rnams yang dag sbyang phyir byas //
T02TD2589E:221b-11: de la dang po re re zhig yongs su brtag pa'i gnas nye bar sbyangs par gdugs dang /
T02TD2589E:221b-15: spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:221b-16: mchog tu gsol bas gsol ba btab pa'i slob dpon gyi nyi ma shis pa dang skar ma bzang po la slob dpon shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas /
T02TD2589E:221b-17: sbyan [*spyan] 'byed kyi nang du song na rigs lngar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la phyag byas te /
T02TD2589E:221b-18: de dang 'brel pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin du sa yongs su bzung ba dang //
T02TD2589E:221b-19: thig gdab cing gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2589E:221b-20: tshon gyi las la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de //
T02TD2589E:221b-21: mchod yon phul la sa ma ya stam //
T02TD2589E:221b-24: zhes bya ba sngags 'di lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2589E:221b-25: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02TD2589E:221b-26: dga' ldan na ni bzhugs pa las //
T02TD2589E:221b-28: de bzhin gzugs 'dir khyed bzhugs mdzod //
T02TD2589E:221b-29: 'dir zhugs rtag tu mgon por ni //
T02TD2589E:221b-30: gyur nas me tog la sogs 'di //
T02TD2589E:221b-31: byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:221b-32: che ge mo'i don du bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2589E:221b-33: sku gzugs lhag par gnas byas la //
T02TD2589E:221b-34: de nas dbang bskur brtsam par bya //
T02TD2589E:221b-35: slob ma smyung bar gnas pa yis //
T02TD2589E:221b-36: bya ba 'di dag thams cad spyad //
T02TD2589E:221b-37: sngags pa gang dag ci sgom dang //
T02TD2589E:221b-38: cho ga mchod la sogs pa bya //
T02TD2589E:221b-39: g-yo med pa yis byas gyur na //
T02TD2589E:221b-40: mchod sbyin chen po'i 'bras bu thob //
T02TD2589E:221b-41: spyan drangs gdan la bzhugs gsol dang //
T02TD2589E:222a-0: de bzhin mchod yon me tog @222a * //
T02TD2589E:222a-2: / spos dang mar me lha bshos te /
T02TD2589E:222a-3: mchod pa sngags dang ldan par dbul //
T02TD2589E:222a-4: sku gzugs shar du zhal bstan la //
T02TD2589E:222a-5: ras ni ser pos g-yogs par bya //
