T02TD2589E:222a-6: sbyang bas legs par bsal bya zhing //
T02TD2589E:222a-7: de nas sngags 'dir yung skar ni //
T02TD2589E:222a-8: chu 'am yang na me nang du ;
T02TD2589E:222a-9: / lan cig yongs su gtang bar bya //
T02TD2589E:222a-10: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:222a-12: de nas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i skur bsams la dbu la yi ge aom /
T02TD2589E:222a-13: zhal la yi ge hr'i: thugs kar yi ge h'um dgod do //
T02TD2589E:222a-14: yang na gang dang gang gi sa bon gang yin pa de //
T02TD2589E:222a-15: de'i thugs kar dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:222a-16: de nas der ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:222a-19: dbang du byas la bsgrub bo //
T02TD2589E:222a-20: de nas til mar dri chen gyis bskus la d'ur wa'i pir gyis sbyang zhing bkru'o //
T02TD2589E:222a-21: til mar gyi sngags ni aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:222a-22: bum pa lnga'am brgyad rin po che lnga dang /
T02TD2589E:222a-23: 'bru lnga sman ldan dang ldan zhing dri zhim po'i spos chus yongs su gang ba /
T02TD2589E:222a-24: mgul pa ras bzang pos bcings la //
T02TD2589E:222a-25: aa mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa dbang bskur ba'i don du bsngags mngon par bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:222a-26: aom bi shuddha badzrod ka h'um /
T02TD2589E:222a-27: aom dzin dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:222a-28: aom a'a ro li ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:222a-30: zhes rigs kyi dbye bas mngon par bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:222a-31: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2589E:222a-32: de bzhin rig pa sbyang dang ni //
T02TD2589E:222a-33: bkra shis zhes grags yid 'od pa'i //
T02TD2589E:222a-34: tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02TD2589E:222a-35: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2589E:222a-36: lha rnams kun gyis khrus gsol ba //
T02TD2589E:222a-37: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2589E:222a-38: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02TD2589E:222a-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um spyan gyi sngags ni //
T02TD2589E:222a-40: aom ru ru sphu ru tishatha siddha lo tsa ne //
T02TD2589E:222a-41: sarbb'a rtha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:222a-42: lugs ma khrus ni bya bar gsungs //
T02TD2589E:222a-43: ri mo me long dag la bkru //
T02TD2589E:222a-44: ras ris cu ni med bya'am //
T02TD2589E:222a-45: lag pa slar yang bsang gtor bya //
T02TD2589E:222a-46: ga phur gur kum bcas pa yi //
T02TD2589E:222a-47: ras dkar zung gis dgab par bya //
T02TD2589E:222a-48: aom badzra bha ba se sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:222b-0: aom badzra @222b aa bhirna bi bhu sha ne sv'a h'a //
T02TD2589E:222b-1: dkyil 'khor dbus su bcug nas ni //
T02TD2589E:222b-2: de nas rang gi dam tshig bsgrags //
T02TD2589E:222b-3: sngags dang phyag rgyas rab bskur bas //
T02TD2589E:222b-4: ci rigs par ni dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2589E:222b-6: de bzhin du ni cod pan dang dar dbyangs bcing ba byas la bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2589E:222b-7: de yang 'og tu shin tu dung pa dang /
T02TD2589E:222b-8: de ni mi yo drang por ni //
T02TD2589E:222b-9: sku gzugs yang dag gzhag bya ste //
T02TD2589E:222b-10: de ltar min na nyes bskyed 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:222b-11: mar tog spos dang de bzhin dri //
T02TD2589E:222b-12: de bzhin mar me na bza' ste //
T02TD2589E:222b-13: de kun gsang sngags ldan par ni //
T02TD2589E:222b-14: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//
T02TD2589E:222b-18: sngags kyis bsang byas bshos bsngogs te /
T02TD2589E:222b-19: gser las byas pa'i thur ma yis //
T02TD2589E:222b-20: spyan ni dbye ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2589E:222b-21: zhal zas de ni mkhas pas bstabs //
T02TD2589E:222b-22: aom badzra tsa kashu sa manta tsa kashu bi sho dha ni sv'a ha'/
T02TD2589E:222b-23: aom di bya aan sa m'a d'i dhya na pri na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:222b-24: de ltar byas nas de nas yang //
T02TD2589E:222b-25: shes rab can gyi slob ma gzhug //
T02TD2589E:222b-26: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i //
T02TD2589E:222b-27: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
T02TD2589E:222b-28: ji skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa //
T02TD2589E:222b-29: de ni ngas bcas byed du bcug //
T02TD2589E:222b-30: khyed kyis de ni kun rdzogs pas //
T02TD2589E:222b-31: ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis //
T02TD2589E:222b-32: de bas dbang bskur dam tshig la gnas par byas nas //
T02TD2589E:222b-33: sbyin blugs stong ngam de'i phyed dam de'i phyed kyi mngar gsum dang bsres pa'i 'bru thams cad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2589E:222b-34: bdag nyid dang ni slob ma kun //
T02TD2589E:222b-35: zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bya'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:222b-36: thab khung zur ni bzhi pa la //
T02TD2589E:222b-37: 'o ma can shing bud shing bya //
T02TD2589E:222b-38: de yi yam shing 'o ma mar //
T02TD2589E:222b-39: bshos kyi lhag ma dbul bar bya //
T02TD2589E:222b-40: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga las gsungs pa bzhin zhi ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:222b-41: gtsug lag khang ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2589E:222b-43: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs par yid kyis sngags 'dis bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223a-0: aom h'um hr'i: de nas lhag par @223a * //
T02TD2589E:223a-2: mchod pa la sogs pa byas la //
T02TD2589E:223a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma byin te /
T02TD2589E:223a-4: yang mchod pa byas nas rab tu gnas pa bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223a-5: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:223a-6: aom h'um hr'i: bhu kham badzr'i bha ba dri dha tishtha bhu kham zhes bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223a-7: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2589E:223a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas rdo rje ltar mi phyed cing legs par rab tu gnas pa bsams la bus pa lnga'am //
T02TD2589E:223a-9: brgyad dam bcu drug spos chus yongs su gang zhing //
T02TD2589E:223a-10: mngon par bsngags pas gtsug lag khang ma lus par bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223a-11: de'i sngags ni aom badzrod ka aa bhi shinytsa //
T02TD2589E:223a-12: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngar bstan pa'i cho gas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223a-13: de nas gtsug lag khang skyong du dang po chen po dgug pa dang /
T02TD2589E:223a-16: dbang du bya ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lung bsgo bar bya ste //
T02TD2589E:223a-17: ji srid gtsug lag khang 'di gnas pa de srid kyi bar du khyod kyis srungs shig //
T02TD2589E:223a-18: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi bka' yang khyod kyis sgrubs shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223a-19: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i mchod rten yang lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:223a-21: mchod pa la sogs pa dang por byas la //
T02TD2589E:223a-22: yi ge bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2589E:223a-23: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bskyed cing //
T02TD2589E:223a-25: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la //
T02TD2589E:223a-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2589E:223a-28: rig pa'i lha thams cad spyan drangs te //
T02TD2589E:223a-29: bcug la mchod rten du bzhag ste mnyes par byas la khrus dang mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de //
T02TD2589E:223a-30: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhisheka sa ma ya shri ye h'um //
T02TD2589E:223a-31: aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2589E:223a-32: aom h'um hr'i: bh'um tri tra tishtha zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223a-33: de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223b-0: lhag ma @223b ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2589E:223b-1: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam rab tu gnas par bya ba ni 'di ltar bya ste //
T02TD2589E:223b-2: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang /
T02TD2589E:223b-3: ras ris dang glegs bam dag ni me long nyid la bkru'o //
T02TD2589E:223b-4: lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge'i rnam pa yongs su gyur nas //
T02TD2589E:223b-6: kun rdzob dang don dam par ston par bsams la //
T02TD2589E:223b-7: aom pradznye shru te ma rti bi dza ye sv'a h'a zhes pa dang //
T02TD2589E:223b-8: aom h'um hr'i: tham zhes bya bas kyang rab tu gnas pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223b-9: sngags ston pa'i glegs bam ni rdo rje chos yi ge'i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa las sngags kyi gzugs kyi skus 'khor ba na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2589E:223b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2589E:223b-11: rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02TD2589E:223b-13: gtor ma la sogs pa ni sku gzugs spyan dbye ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2589E:223b-14: de nas sil snyan dang rol mo byas la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2589E:223b-15: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang //
T02TD2589E:223b-16: de sras tshangs sogs lha tshogs kun //
T02TD2589E:223b-17: gang zhig cho ga'i bya ba ni //
T02TD2589E:223b-18: nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs //
T02TD2589E:223b-19: sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang //
T02TD2589E:223b-20: bde legs chen po kun mdzad de //
T02TD2589E:223b-21: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2589E:223b-22: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2589E:223b-24: bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas zhing //
T02TD2589E:223b-25: sa dang me dang chu dang ni //
T02TD2589E:223b-26: rlung las lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs //
T02TD2589E:223b-27: slob dpon slob ma bcas pa dang //
T02TD2589E:223b-28: bu dang tsha bo rnams bsrungs te //
T02TD2589E:223b-29: rab dga' yid bder gyur nas ni //
T02TD2589E:223b-30: rab gnas bzang po dag tu bzhud //
T02TD2589E:223b-31: shes rab ye shes dri med pa'i //
T02TD2589E:223b-32: mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD2589E:223b-33: rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD2589E:223b-34: bye brag rnams ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2589E:223b-35: gser sogs las byas rdo rje ni //
T02TD2589E:223b-36: rtse lnga 'od zer bcas pa la //
T02TD2589E:223b-37: chang gzungs cha gsum mdzes pa dang //
T02TD2589E:223b-38: ra dang rtse mo'i bye brag can //
T02TD2589E:223b-39: tshad ni sor bzhi dag dang ni //
T02TD2589E:223b-40: brgyad dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD2589E:224a-0: @224a * // bcu drug de bzhin nyi shu ste //
T02TD2589E:224a-1: de las nyung dang lhag par min //
T02TD2589E:224a-2: rdo rje brgyad po nges pa yi //
T02TD2589E:224a-3: tshad yin par ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD2589E:224a-4: mdzes shing ma zhag 'jam pa dang //
T02TD2589E:224a-5: brtan zhing ma gas sra bar 'gyur //
T02TD2589E:224a-6: sor bzhi pa yi tshad dag ni //
T02TD2589E:224a-7: de las nyes 'gyur tha ma yin //
T02TD2589E:224a-8: sum 'gyur rdo rje bar ma ste //
T02TD2589E:224a-9: bzhi 'gyur dag ni mchog yin no //
T02TD2589E:224a-10: chur ni gsum du byas pa yi //
T02TD2589E:224a-11: dbus ma'i cha ni zlum por bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-12: dkyil ma brgyad chas mtho bar bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-13: zlum po ra rtse gsum pa la //
T02TD2589E:224a-14: cha gcig dbus su gnas par bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-15: khro gnyer sna tshogs ldan pa dang /
T02TD2589E:224a-16: rin chen 'dab ma myu gu dang //
T02TD2589E:224a-17: padma de bzhin gnyis su bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-18: ra ni cha gsum gnas pa las //
T02TD2589E:224a-19: cha gcig dag ni dkyil du gzhag //
T02TD2589E:224a-20: sor gcig brgyad car bya ba ni //
T02TD2589E:224a-21: dbus ma'i ra yi bar zhes bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-22: gzhan rnams cho ga ji bzhin bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-23: zur bzhi shin tu rno ba dang ;
T02TD2589E:224a-24: / dkyil sbom rtse mo phra ba la //
T02TD2589E:224a-25: 'og dpag gsum dang ldan zhing rdzogs //
T02TD2589E:224a-26: dbus ma lhag bcas mdzes par bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-27: de bzhin phyogs kyi char bzhag pa'i //
T02TD2589E:224a-28: ra gzhan dag ni yan lag bzhi //
T02TD2589E:224a-29: phra zhing dbus su gug pa dang //
T02TD2589E:224a-30: dbus ma'i ra la 'dud pa ste //
T02TD2589E:224a-31: rgya ni dbus ma'i ra yi phyed //
T02TD2589E:224a-32: nas 'bru tsam gyis ma reg pa'o //
T02TD2589E:224a-33: chu srin mche ba gtsigs 'dra ba'i //
T02TD2589E:224a-34: chu srin kha nas dbyung bar bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-35: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ra //
T02TD2589E:224a-37: rno dang mi rno gyes pa dang //
T02TD2589E:224a-38: zhi ba dag dang rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD2589E:224a-39: phyi rol ra ni rgyar gyur pa //
T02TD2589E:224a-40: gang zhig de yi dbus ma mtshungs //
T02TD2589E:224a-41: gsang ba'i rdo rje rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2589E:224a-42: mtshan nyid dag gi khyad par ni //
T02TD2589E:224a-43: nang gi dbus ma'i ra dag ni //
T02TD2589E:224a-44: bzhi cha yis ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-45: phyi rol gri gug dbyibs 'dra la //
T02TD2589E:224a-46: rno zhing rtse mo gyes par bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-48: chu srin gdong gis zin par bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-49: rdo rje rtse gsum gang yin par //
T02TD2589E:224a-50: mtshams dag tu ni gnas par bya //
T02TD2589E:224a-51: de bzhin sna tshogs par gyur pa //
T02TD2589E:224a-52: rdo rje rgya gram min par bshad //
T02TD2589E:224a-53: de yang dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las //
T02TD2589E:224a-54: sgrub pa pos ni nges par 'chang ba yi //
T02TD2589E:224b-0: rdo rje gang yin de ni 'dir @224b bshad bya ;
T02TD2589E:224b-1: / sor bcu bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad dang //
T02TD2589E:224b-2: mchog gi tshang ni sor yang nyi shu'o //
T02TD2589E:224b-3: gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni //
T02TD2589E:224b-4: sa ni thob par bya phyir rab tu shis //
T02TD2589E:224b-5: rgyal po'i don du dngul ni mchog yin te //
T02TD2589E:224b-6: zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i glu bskul la //
T02TD2589E:224b-7: lha min dbang po 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang //
T02TD2589E:224b-8: phub tu 'gro ba rdo yi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2589E:224b-9: don kun bsgrub pa la ni lcags gsum gyi //
T02TD2589E:224b-10: gnod sbyin sde 'joms pa la lcags kyi'o //
T02TD2589E:224b-11: don gzhan la ni sed ldeng dpal dang tshe //
T02TD2589E:224b-12: nad med nor rdzas la ni bil ba'o //
T02TD2589E:224b-13: gnod sbyin ma bsgrub pa la ma dhu'i shing //
T02TD2589E:224b-14: chos kyi don du aa shvad las byas shing //
T02TD2589E:224b-15: gsal zhing rtse mo dgar rnams gzhig pa la //
T02TD2589E:224b-16: mi rnams pa sang pa la ni mi rus kyi //
T02TD2589E:224b-17: shel las byas pa'i mig 'phrul chen po la //
T02TD2589E:224b-18: dbye phyir nim pa las byas rab tu shis //
T02TD2589E:224b-19: bsad cing skam la ba ru ra yi shing //
T02TD2589E:224b-20: sha za bsgrub pa la yang rtag tu shis //
T02TD2589E:224b-21: lha dang gnod sbyin dri za bsgrub pa la //
T02TD2589E:224b-22: sgron shing las ni byas pa'i rdo rje'i //
T02TD2589E:224b-23: ji ste rlung ni dbang du byed 'dod na //
T02TD2589E:224b-24: de tshe klu shing rtsa las byed pa'o //
T02TD2589E:224b-25: gzugs bsgyur pa la sa las byas pa'o //
T02TD2589E:224b-26: ro langs bsgrub pa la ni ka dam pa'i //
T02TD2589E:224b-27: bu nam ga dang ra ja aarka dang //
T02TD2589E:224b-28: aa shvad shing gi rdo rje nor gyi phyir //
T02TD2589E:224b-29: bla ba aa mra shri barna ba //
T02TD2589E:224b-30: aardzu la sogs pa las byas pa ni //
T02TD2589E:224b-31: mi rnams g-yul las rgyal bar bya phyir ro //
T02TD2589E:224b-32: yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2589E:224b-33: tsandan dkar po dang ni dmar po ste //
T02TD2589E:224b-34: dbyibs legs 'jam zhing ma nyams rma med pa'o //
T02TD2589E:224b-35: rdo rje rtse lnga sra ba bcang bar bya //
T02TD2589E:224b-36: dang po zlos tshe de ni thogs nas su //
T02TD2589E:224b-37: bzlas brjod zin na myur ba kho nar ni //
T02TD2589E:224b-38: dad pa'i sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis //
T02TD2589E:224b-39: mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba'i zhabs drung gzhag //
T02TD2589E:224b-40: nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags sgrub pa pos //
T02TD2589E:224b-41: rdo rje med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2589E:224b-42: de las gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur na //
T02TD2589E:224b-43: khu tshur bcangs la rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas //
T02TD2589E:224b-45: lcags gsum las byas dril bu mthar //
T02TD2589E:224b-46: phyi la padma ba lang kha //
T02TD2589E:224b-47: rdo rje padma bde gshegs rigs //
T02TD2589E:225a-0: @225a * // las mchog dgu ni skyed par byed //
T02TD2589E:225a-1: rdo rje la sogs ma ldan dang //
T02TD2589E:225a-2: khong stong lce dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2589E:225a-3: gru bzhi mnyam pa'i kha cher dang //
T02TD2589E:225a-4: rtse mo mdung gi gnas dang bcas //
T02TD2589E:225a-5: cha bzhi rnam par spangs pa ni //
T02TD2589E:225a-6: bil ba dpal nor rgyas pa thob //
T02TD2589E:225a-8: khong stong rkang pa drug dang ldan //
T02TD2589E:225a-10: zhi dang rgyas pa'i don ston te //
T02TD2589E:225a-11: cha gsum yongs su dor bar ni //
T02TD2589E:225a-12: mtshan ma phreng ba ska rags bcas //
T02TD2589E:225a-13: skye med don gyi zab pa dang //
T02TD2589E:225a-14: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gro dbyangs //
T02TD2589E:225a-15: 'og pu ska rags ldan pa yi //
T02TD2589E:225a-16: ba lang kha ni mchog tu bshad //
T02TD2589E:225a-17: dril bu zur bzhi mnyam pa dang /
T02TD2589E:225a-18: sor ni bdun dang brgyad dang bcu //
T02TD2589E:225a-19: rigs ni lnga po kun la yang //
T02TD2589E:225a-20: dngos grub thams cad ster byed gsungs //
T02TD2589E:225a-21: de ltar dril bu gsum mnyam par //
T02TD2589E:225a-22: rdo rje padma sogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD2589E:225a-23: bum pa dang ni ldan pa ru //
T02TD2589E:225a-24: blugs pas dngos grub ster bar bshad //
T02TD2589E:225a-25: 'di ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2589E:225a-26: nam mkha' dri med dkyil 'khor legs bris pa'i //
T02TD2589E:225a-27: rnam par dkar ba'i dge ba gang yin des //
T02TD2589E:225a-28: 'gro kun lta ngan sprin tshogs rnams bsal te //
T02TD2589E:225a-29: phyogs rnams kun du nyi zla ltar gyur cig /
